story:
Vote for us on Steam Greenlight!

    

Follow us in social media:

          

Also on IndieDB:        

We've recently started the Steam Greenlight campaign and we need YOUR help! Please, support us!

   

     

Welcome to the crowd funding campaign for Ghosts’ Joy, the original free-to-play strategy game with RPG elements by BLAM! GAMES. We’ve been working on the development for quite a while, but now we’re lacking of funding. We’re launching this campaign to power up, complete and release Ghosts’ Joy and to make it even bigger and more ambitious than anything we’ve ever made! So we need YOUR help. More we raise, more we can bring to you. Develop this game together with us! Ghosts’ Joy will be released as a FREE GAME on PC, MAC, iOS, Android for you and with your help. How can you help make this game complete? You can help us by FUNDING, SHARING and FOLLOWING the campaign. Also check for updates above!

      

Have you ever noticed anything strange in your house?  Do you believe in ghosts? Don’t you? Only in our unique game, you become the one, who will make citizens believe in them. The entire city is at your disposal. Find the way to scare every townsfolk in the city.

“Ghosts’ Joy” is a new free-to-play strategic game with RPG elements, where you are presented as the ghost lord, who has to fear all citizens of this lovely and peaceful town.

In For Ghosts’ Joy you can enter any house, where you scare it’s inhabitants with the help of your ghosts. Each ghost can study unique spells on different in-house objects. The inhabitant’s level of fright will grow up after each usage. Player’s main goal in each house is to move them out of the house and to get resources – fear points and plasma. Manage these resources to upgrade conquered buildings, restore and develop your ghosts and compete in PvP.

Enjoy our cinematic trailer:
     

Enjoy our gameplay trailer #2:
     
           
  • Think Globally! - Global map. The player interacts with the city, where each building can be scared and conquered. Currently there are 20 ordinary and 10 special big houses on global map. With YOUR help we’ll add up to 50+ ordinary and 30+ special big houses. This will make Ghosts’ Joy much more interesting to play, will add tons of diversity and of course Joy for YOU!

      

  • Conquer and build! Conquer and upgrade buildings on global map. Player can build and upgrade his own buildings after capture of the house.

       

  • Every object is interactive - Hundreds objects to interact inside houses that have unique spells to be used on them, presented with amazing animations and effects. If you fund us, you will choose what additional object you’d like to see in the game! Want to see your favorite kitchen toaster – it will be in game!

       

  • Spell master - Tons of spells to learn. Each object has up to 6 original spells, that can be studied at the spell laboratory. Fund us, and we’ll add your ideas about spells into the game!

        

  • Every character is unique - 50 funny characters, with their own behavior and personality. Each of them has fun and fantastic animations and unique reaction to each spell. Limited amount of funders will meet themselves in this game! Hurry up and become one of the citizens of this lovely town.

       

  • Roger that! - Unique ghosts that you develop throughout the game. There are three ghosts ruled and operated by you in each house. All of them can study new spells at laboratory. Each ghost could be unlocked at certain level, while the first one will start the game together with player.

       

  • Be a champion! - PvP tournaments. PvP is presented by arena 1vs1 and tournaments, in which players will compete in a single-elimination tournament system. At the release date there will be only arenas 1vs1, but if we raise our goal we’ll add a tournament, where up to eight players can compete each other and get incredible prizes.

       

  • Single day without a quest - Lots of memorable quests to solve. Every citizen has his own secret, and they will ask you to find them out. There are also joyful daily quests.

        

  • You decide how to scare! 2 unique gameplay modes. Real-time mode is presented for casual and mid-core players, while tactical mode is harder to play, so players will get more resources and experience.

        

  • No step without friends! - Social aspects of the game. Social features are presented by achievements, game action, where players can sell and buy different in-game elements, Facebook integration, adding friends and in-game friend’s help.

        

Blam! Games is based in Odessa, Ukraine. We have five year experience in creating engaging casual games, released on PC, MAC, as well as mobile devices – iOS, Android. Our team unites professional game designers, programmers, 2D and 3D artists.

While developing Ghosts’ Joy we pay attention to great emphasis on thorough of elaboration of game mechanics, reverent attitude to detail, seamless and harmonious of all elements to our games. We wish to give players many hours of fun and unforgettable stay, give them bright impressions and full immersion in the game world of Ghosts’ Joy. We develop our games with soul and love and do our best to satisfy most discerning players. We’ve chosen a free-to-play model for this game because we wish you to play this game ABSOLUTELY FREE!
       
Our team is passionate about developing interesting and creative projects, and our main goal is to bring fun and joy to players. Funny movies, cartoons, comics about ghosts, afterlife, and fearing – it’s not the complete list of things, that inspired us to create Ghosts’ Joy. We see a Scary movies genre as a way to entertain players, and have a good laugh over funny situations. Core idea of this project as a parody of ghost theme was born during one of discussions of most absurd ideas for our next project. We did not wish to create an ordinary “farm”, filling the market with clichéd product, we wish anyone finds something interesting for him personally in this game, fill game world with funny and charming characters, create simple, but original good-working gameplay, that would have fascinated players for lots of hours. Thus we came up to a free-to-play model: anyone can play Ghosts’ Joy for free, and get dozens of fun, without thinking, that everything will end at an interesting place. We hope you will play this game happily, getting boost of energy, fun and good mood, because we wish that the most. All our creativity is focused at entertaining our players. Well, fellows, it’s time to show who is the boss in this town! Are you ready to scare? Leave all doubts behind and go on! You’re not afraid of ghosts, aren’t you?
               
         
As we’ve already mentioned above, we’ve been developing Ghosts’ Joy for quite a while, but now we’re lack of funding to finish this game. Ghosts' Joy is a unique game, that has no analogues among millions of games, released or being under development. IndieGoGo is a unique place, where such indie projects have to start their campaigns and proceed till the release date! We need more money to finish this project, and thanks to you to make it more interesting and exciting, with more characters, houses, NPCs, in-house objects, spells, etc.  Your support will help us to make this game much better and awesome. Your support will help us to make this game much better and awesome. We apologize for not including the PayPal payment method in this campaign because this system doesn't work properly in our country. Sorry for this inconvenience.

       

         

Do we have Stretch Goals for this campaign? Yes we do! In addition to our goal of a multi-platform release, we have plans for additional content and features that we would like to offer our players.

Our first two Stretch Goals are simple: to release Ghosts’ Joy on PC, MAC, iOS, Android and make it even cooler, than it is now. If this campaign reaches a funding goal we complete the game and release it in the way it had been conceived plus all additional content, added during the campaign. 

We'll talk about other goals as the campaign gets closer to the full funding goal. Please wish us luck!

     

         

To support our campaign, we added some rewards for everyone who backed us. Here’s the list of individual rewards we’re offering:

                           

                                            

                                                        PACK OF GEMS

Ghosts’ Joy is a free-to-play game, where you can buy resources for in-game currency. That’s not necessary, but this pack of gems will speed your game up increasingly!

                     

                                              

                                                         WALLPAPERS

Our excellent artists and graphic designers will make some wonderful wallpapers, that decorate desktop on your favorite PC, MAC of handled devices.

                       

                                            

                                              BRONZE BACKER SIGN

You’ll get a special bronze baker sign under your avatar in this game.

                           

                                          

                                              SILVER BACKER SIGN

You’ll get a special silver baker sign under your avatar in this game.

                         

                                          

                                             GOLDEN BACKER SIGN

You’ll get a special golden baker sign under your avatar in this game.

                       

                                         

                                          PLATINUM BACKER SIGN

You’ll get a special platinum baker sign under your avatar in this game.

                             

                                           

                                         DIGITAL OST DOWNLOAD

A digital copy of Ghosts’ Joy soundtrack that includes all main themes of this game.

                         

                                      

                                            PREMIUM ACCOUNT

You will get a premium account for a limited term – 1, 3, 6 and more months. Thanks to premium account the amount of resources, experience, spells you get in game will be increased significantly.

                                           

                                         

                                                   FRIDGE MAGNET

This wonderfull magnet will decorate your fridge, or desk, and will summon some ghosts!


                                              

                                      DIGITAL ART BOOK with making materials

A digital version of Ghosts’ Joy art book, where you’ll find sketches of this game and fantastic art from this game.

                         

                                           

                                                        POSTCARD

Fantastic Ghosts’ Joy postcard that you can send your friends, or leave to decorate your desk.

                           

                                            

                                                EXCLUSIVE POSTER

An exclusive poster with an absolutely new art on it. What will it be? Fund us, and you’ll find out.

                             

                                                    EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT

An exclusive T-shirt with a stylish, simplistic art on it. What will it be? Fund us, and you’ll find out.

                               

                                             

                                                    YOU are in Ghosts’ Joy!

You become one of the Ghosts’ Joy citizen! We’ll create a special character from your photo and settle you in one of the houses.

                           

                 

                                                YOUR HOME in Ghosts’ Joy! 
 Your home will become one of the houses in this game! Millions of players will enter your house and try to fear you out of this.


       

                                                                   

        

  Thank you so much for the contribution.

       

You get the satisfaction of having helped to make this game a reality. And a thank you in credits of this game. Also you’ll get premium account for 1 month.

       

Get all of the above plus a pack of Hi-Res Wallpapers.

       

Get all of the above plus your avatar will be decorated with a fantastic Bronze Baker sign.

    

        

Get all of the above plus 3-month premium account and a digital copy of Ghosts’ Joy soundtrack.

      

        

Get all of the above plus a DIGITAL ART BOOK with making materials, in-game currency gems for the sum of $25, and one of fantastic postcards.

      

        

Everything from $100 TIER, for a SPECIAL PRICE! Hurry up, this offer is limited.

      

        

Get all of the above plus premium account for 6 month, in-game currency for $50, your avatar will be decorated with an amazing SILVER BAKER sign, and A2 poster.

      

       

Get all of the above plus T-Shirt with Ghosts’ Joy logo, fridge magnet, premium account for 1 year, your avatar will be decorated with an amazing GOLDEN BAKER sign.

       

        

 Get all of the above plus you bring your ideas into this game – we’ll add a unique objects, you’d like to see in this game. What to see your kitchen toaster, you'll see it in this game as an active object with unique spells, or any other object.

       

      

Get all of the above plus GET INTO THE GAME! One of the citizens of this town will be drawn from YOU! Also your avatar will be decorated with an amazing PLATINUM BAKER sign, and your name will be in special thanks credits.

       

       

Get all of the above plus BUILD YOUR OWN HOUSE IN THE GAME! We’ll make one of in-game houses look exactly the same as your real flat /apartment/house, but up to 6 rooms or part of your house, depending on the size.   

        

  • The cost of production – Ghosts’ Joy has a significant cost in terms of man-hours and budget. The total cost of production of this game is much bigger than we’ve asked from you in this campaign. Due to this difficulties, we had to cut some features, ideas, additional content that made this game a little worse, but with your help we’ll create everything that was planned. In addition, if this campaign is  successful, we’ll add a new district in this game, where it will be much more fun and joy for you. Shortly, we always finish our games, and the more support we receive in this campaign from you, the more we’ll add in this game! And we’ll make these improvements quickly and efficiently. That is the difference your support makes, and it is a big one.
  • Objects’ spells – You rule three ghosts in this game. Each of them can cast a spell over any object in the house. Currently there’re up to 100 objects with up to 6 spells in each. But in the scale of this game, that’s not so many. With your help we’ll add lots of new spells with unique and fun animation and art. The more spells and objects will be in this game, the more diverse and interesting game will be. Same story with characters – the more characters with unique funny animation there will be in this game, the more interesting it will be to play this game. You will never get bored in this game, because each time you will see something new in each house.
  • Multiple Platforms – Another challenge is to release this game on multiplatform. We’ve already released our games on PC, MAC, iOS, Android, but Ghosts’ Joy is much harder to make work smoothly on both computers and devices. Due to lots of objects, characters, animations it’s a great challenge to keep the same rate of fps at all platforms. In short – via this campaign we need your help to port and optimize this game.
  • What happens if we don’t meet our goal? 

    • We have a long-standing and well-earned reputation after up to five years of game development. We support our players for as long as possible. We listen to our players, and we implement every suggestion they give us. When we have secured enough funding to proceed, you will help us to get closer to the release date – fall 2014 with all content, that we declared. 

    Of course, there is the possibility that we may not meet our goal. In that case we’ll finish this game, but much more later then it’s declared and with a limited amount of content.

                   

1.  Q: Will this game be free or paid?

     A: Ghosts’ Joy is a free-to-play game, which you can play totally free. Of course             if you want to move forward much faster you’ll need to make in-game                           purchases, but that’s not necessary at all.

2.  Q: When do we get perks?

      A: You’ll get your perks after the release of this game. The release date will be                announced after the finish of this campaign.

3.  Q: How do I tell you my t-shirt size and tell which postcard\fridge magnet I’d like            to get?

      A: In your comment please leave the t-shirt size (S, M, L, XL) and the                                  postcard\fridge magnet you’d like to get.

4.  Q: Is the shipping cost included in the perk price?

      A: No, you should add a shipping cost in amount $20 to the amount of money                  you fund in this project.

5.  Q: Can I upgrade my donation to get a higher tier?

     A: Yes. Just donate the additional amount to bring you up a tier level if you want.           Then, you’ll receive everything in that tier as well as all of the tier sizes below.

version of Ghosts’ Joy art book, where you’ll find sketches of this game and

                                                                                                                             POSTCARD
Fantastic
Ghosts’ Joy postcard that you can send your friends, or leave to decorate your
desk.
                                                                                                                       EXCLUSIVE POSTER
An exclusive
poster with an absolutely new art on it. What will it be? Fund us, and you’ll
find out.
                                                                                 EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT
An exclusive
T-shirt with a stylish, simplistic art on it. What will it be? Fund us, and
you’ll find out.
                                                                                                                                YOU are in Ghosts’ Joy!
You become one
of the Ghosts’ Joy citizen! We’ll create a special character from your photo
and settle you in one of the houses.
                                                                                            YOUR HOME in Ghosts’ Joy!  Your home will become
one of the houses in this game! Millions of players will enter your house and
try to fear you out of this.




       

                                                                   

        
  Thank you so much for the contribution.
       

You get the satisfaction of having
helped to make this game a reality. And a thank you in credits of this game.
Also you’ll get premium account for 1 month.

       
Get all of the above plus a pack of
Hi-Res Wallpapers.


       

Get all of the above plus your avatar
will be decorated with a fantastic Bronze Baker sign.

    
        

Get all of the above plus 3-month
premium account and a digital copy of Ghosts’ Joy soundtrack.

      
        

Get all of the above plus a DIGITAL ART BOOK with
making materials, in-game currency gems for the sum of $25, and one of
fantastic postcards.

      
        

Everything from $100 TIER, for a SPECIAL PRICE! Hurry
up, this offer is limited.

      
        
Get all of the above plus premium account for 6 month,
in-game currency for $50, your avatar will be decorated with an amazing SILVER
BAKER sign, and A2 poster.

      
       
Get all of the above plus T-Shirt with Ghosts’
Joy logo, fridge magnet, premium account for 1 year, your avatar will be decorated
with an amazing GOLDEN BAKER sign.

       
        
 Get all of the above plus you bring your ideas
into this game – we’ll add a unique objects, you’d like to see in this game.
What to see your kitchen toaster, you'll see it in this game as an active
object with unique spells, or any other object.

       
      
Get all of the above plus GET INTO THE GAME! One of
the citizens of this town will be drawn from YOU! Also your avatar will be
decorated with an amazing PLATINUM BAKER sign, and your name will be in special
thanks credits.

       
       
Get all of the above plus BUILD YOUR OWN HOUSE IN THE
GAME! We’ll make one of in-game houses look exactly the same as your real flat
/apartment/house, but up to 6 rooms or part of your house, depending on the
size.   

        


The cost of production – Ghosts’ Joy has a significant cost in terms of
man-hours and budget. The total cost of production of this game is much bigger
than we’ve asked from you in this campaign. Due to this difficulties, we had to
cut some features, ideas, additional content that made this game a little
worse, but with your help we’ll create everything that was planned. In addition, if this campaign is  successful, we’ll add a
new district in this game, where it will be much more fun and joy for
you. Shortly, we always finish our games,
and the more support we receive in this campaign from you, the more we’ll add in
this game! And we’ll make these improvements
quickly and efficiently. That is the difference your support makes, and it is a
big one.


Objects’ spells – You rule three ghosts in
this game. Each of them can cast a spell over any object in the house.
Currently there’re up to 100 objects with up to 6 spells in each. But in the
scale of this game, that’s not so many. With your help we’ll add lots of new spells with unique and fun
animation and art. The more spells and objects will be in this game, the more
diverse and interesting game will be. Same
story with characters – the more characters with unique funny animation there
will be in this game, the more interesting it will be to play this game. You
will never get bored in this game, because each time you will see something new
in each house.


Multiple Platforms – Another challenge is to release this game on
multiplatform. We’ve already released our games on PC, MAC, iOS, Android, but
Ghosts’ Joy is much harder to make work smoothly on both computers and devices.
Due to lots of objects, characters, animations it’s a great challenge to keep
the same rate of fps at all platforms. In short – via this campaign we need
your help to port and optimize this game.


What happens if we don’t meet our goal? 

We have a long-standing and well-earned reputation
after up to five years of game development. We support our players for as long
as possible. We listen to our players, and we implement every suggestion they
give us. When we have secured enough funding to proceed, you will help us to
get closer to the release date – fall 2014 with all content, that we declared. 
Of
course, there is the possibility that we may not meet our goal. In that case
we’ll finish this game, but much more later then it’s declared and with a
limited amount of content.
               

1. 
Q:
Will this game be free or paid?
     A: Ghosts’ Joy is a free-to-play game, which you can
play totally free. Of course             if you want to
move forward much faster you’ll need to make in-game                           purchases, but that’s not
necessary at all.
2. 
Q:
When do we get perks?
      A: You’ll get your perks after the release of this
game. The release date will be                announced after
the finish of this campaign.
3. 
Q:
How do I tell you my t-shirt size and tell which postcard\fridge magnet I’d
like            to get?
      A: In your comment please leave the t-shirt size (S,
M, L, XL) and the                                  postcard\fridge magnet you’d like to get.
4. 
Q:
Is the shipping cost included in the perk price?
      A: No, you should add a shipping cost in amount $20 to
the amount of money                  you fund in this project.
5. 
Q:
Can I upgrade my donation to get a higher tier?
     A: Yes. Just donate
the additional amount to bring you up a tier level if you want.           Then, you’ll
receive everything in that tier as well as all of the tier sizes below.

story:
Wonder Works Comics, Cards, and Collectables is a brand new hobby shop coming to Jackson, Mo! Specializing in all things comics, whether it be DC, Marvel, IDW, Image, or whoever; we're going to have it. There's more than just that! We plan on having a massive variety of collectable trading card games like: Magic the Gathering, Yu-Gi-Oh!, Pokemon, plus more! If comics and cards aren't your thing, than our selection of other awesome products from companies like Games Workshop, Konami, Namco Bandai, and Hasbro; will definitely sate your appetite! Plus if you enjoy subtitles, we got you covered with a large selection of anime and manga!


Products We Carry:

  • Comics: DC, Marvel, Image, IDW, Dynamite, Dark Horse, and others!
  • Trading Card Games: Magic the Gathering, Yu-Gi-Oh!, Pokemon, My Little Pony, and more!
  • Collectables: Hasbro, Games Workshop, and so many other diverse lines!
  • Anime and Manga: Funimation, Viz Media, Studio Ghibli, Shonen Jump, Onii Press, Shojo Beat, Yen Press and enough to satisfy your anime/manga hunger for days!

We also want to stress how much we support the indie community. If you want to display some of your amazing work at Wonder Works, you are more than welcome to. Made a comic? We will display it, post it on Facebook, whatever we can to get you out there! We want our local art community to shine!

Why Support Us?

Wonder Works is the culmination of years of experience dealing with all things pop culture. We also know how hard it is to find a place that caters to everyone's want and needs. Our main goal is to change that for Jackson, MO and the surrounding area. We want to make a place where no fan is ever shunned or belittled. Whether you're a Trekkie, a brony, or whatever you go by; we accept you. We find that to be one of the most important aspects of a healthy community. Something we hope to foster.

Unfortunately, building up a community isn't something that can be done by one small group of people alone. That's where you, the community, come in. We want to build up Wonder Works,  and with your support we can do that and so much more. Post about us on your preferred form of social media, blog about us, write a song, do what ever you want. Our success depends on your continued support!

Where Does My Contribution Go?

Your contributions go directly into the company. No money will ever be used outside of Wonder Works for any purpose what so ever. The majority of the funds will go into the vast amount of products we carry. A large chunk, however, will go to start-up costs, rent, and renovations. In order to provide the best experience we possibly can, we have decided to focus on finding the absolute best location; designed to look the best it possibly can.

What we carry the most of is decided by the community. You have a say in what Wonder Works will or won't carry. If you make a contribution, be sure to comment as to what you would like to see in-store. We will consider any reasonable request that is made. This way you get to decide where your contribution is going, plus you get to help with the growth of an exciting new business. 

Thank You!

We want to thank you just for coming onto this webpage. Just clicking on here shows us that you have an interest in what we do, and we are overjoyed by it!

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us on Indiegogo or Facebook. We will try to answer any questions asked in a timely manner. Once again, thank you from the entirety of the Wonder Works team, we hope to see you in-store in 2015!

story:
Get Caverns of Khron to IndieCade 2013

Hi, I'm John D. Moore.  I've been making video games for most of my life, first on paper in the form of strategy guides for fictitious NES games, then in QBASIC and ZZT in the nineties, and lately in Game Maker.  In my lifetime, I've released over 70 games to the Internet.  I'm strictly a hobbyist, and making games is a real passion for me.  My most major project to date is CAVERNS OF KHRON, a challenging, freeware action-puzzle platformer with several dozen levels, released in its first form in November 2012.   I spent most of my free time last year working on it.  

It's available on my website for free.  The game has received an overall positive (sometimes enthusiastic) reception, but hasn't taken off yet.  I'd love to get CAVERNS OF KHRON into this year's IndieCade, a festival for independent games of all stripes.  I can't guarantee it'll get in, but I think having it showcased or competing would be a great thrill, and I think my game's focus on level design has some amount of something to offer the current world of independent games. However, at the moment, I don't quite have the $80 submission fee ($110 if I pay in June).  This is the main focus of this IndieGoGo campaign.  

The game is already completed (though I may make it more complete if I can get a bit of funding--see goals below!).  Please feel free to download it at its website.

Any contribution, no matter how small, is deeply appreciated!

Help Me With Living Expenses (and Game-Making!)!

My priary occupation when I'm not working on my game making hobby is as a student of Japanese language, literature, and cinema.  Currently, I'm finishing the last few months of a year studying abroad in Tokyo.  This is a very expensive city (and the exchange rate was terrible until recently) and though I'm okay right now, doing the math, I'm going to have a pretty difficult time of it making my rent and other payments up to my leaving in August, as well as my airfare.  Anything I can raise above the submission fees will give me some much-desired financial relief.  And, instead of spending all my time trying to figure out how to make a little extra money in Tokyo, I will consciously spend more time making games both small in size and large in scope.

Ghost Witch and Other Projects

I've been wanting to expand Ghost Witch, a game I made for Pirate Kart V, to a larger game.  I haven't had much time to work on it, but I feel like a large amount of funding would free me up to develop it more.  I can't promise a delivery date for Ghost Witch, but I want to make it as fine and polished a product as Caverns of Khron is.  I've also got a Little Mermaid-inspired open-world action game that I'm having trouble developing that may one day see the light.

Goals and Stretch Goals!

The main thing I'm looking for here is $80-$110 for the IndieCade submission fee.  However! if the campaign reaches its $500 goal or somehow, bizarrely, manages to exceed it, I will add new things to the game.

  • No matter what: Caverns of Khron 1.2 with Native Gamepad Support. Currently, Caverns of Khron recommends using a free program called JoytoKey to use gamepads, but in the next release, I intend to include native gamepad support, bypassing external programs and hopefully improving responsiveness.  Also possible, a Japanese translation of the game.
  • ~$100: Submission to IndieCade.
  • $500: Caverns of Khron 1.3 with New Action Gameplay Mode. The game already contains 5 boss fights, but there was an extra boss fight that I cut right before release because it wasn't quite ready.  I want to add this and a small, accompanying set of action-focused levels or extra bosses.
  • $1,000: Caverns of Khron 1.4 with New Game World.  Already, after beating Caverns of Khron, the player has access to the Cloud Realm and the Special Stages, but I want to add another environment with a new set of environments and levels, to run at least 10 stages.  Most likely, this will take a few cues from my old Lemmings-influenced ZZT game, Zem! X

I'm open to other suggestions for stretch goals and perks, so feel free to contact me if you have an idea!

If I raise some money (or no money), I'll see if I can make up the difference for the submission fee.  If I can't, it will buy me a few meals, and that is also very valuable.

More About Me

About me!  As I said, I've published over 70 games over the last 17 years.  You can find most of them and my other creative projects at my website/blog and at Glorious Trainwrecks, where I've submitted over 50 games in 3 years. Lately, I released Super Stone Ball, a platform puzzler I put together in a few hours that has received some positive attention.  Every game I've made has been released as freeware.

In truth, I don't expect to raise much here, but I thoguht it'd be nice to take a few minutes to make some plans if the unexpected happens.

It's very likely that there are people and games and projects you feel deserve more support.  I appreciate this!  I will survive, and if you find yourself in a place where you, for some reason, are choosing between helping me spend my time working on games and taking them to festivals and feeding starving children, I would urge you to go the starving children route! This may sound like a narcissistic, entitled campaign.  I don't personally think it is (forgive my bias), but I begrudge no one for passing on this!  I don't really enjoy feeling like asking for money, but I could just use a little help.  Thanks.

story:
Welcome!

For anyone familiar with DR NJ, you likely know about our snow storage tragedy of 2014. A leaky roof and snow thaw caused the roof of our storage unit to collapse. Losing half our props and an uncountable amount of packets, we have had to replace most of our weapons and take stock of what we still have to run an awesome game with. 

It also made us realize how packed to the gills our current storage unit gets. Then we realized how limited we are by that and what amazing things we could do with more space. 

We have big plans to upgrade most of the costume, props, and weapons that we use at DR NJ.  We've started ordering quality masks, makeup, and weapon props and we want to craft and make more to improve the game.  But we need somewhere to keep it all nice (well, Dystopia nice!).


This is where you come in!

Tired of carting all your props, sleeping stuff and items back and forth every event? Want to have super awesome props for your living space but don't have space every month? Then this is it!
Simply put, every person who donates $120 gets a storage tote to keep on site, in our storage unit, for one year! This breaks down to $10/month for a year. 

All the details can be found here:  https://dystopiarisingnj.squarespace.com/storage-rules-and-guideline
The long and short of it is each purchased space is provided one of these:


Anything you can fit in there and close the unit tightly will be stored during the down time in our fancy new storage unit. 

We have limited the initial amount of spaces available on this, so that we don't fill up on storage totes and find ourselves in the same place as before. 
However! If we hit our base goal of one storage unit, we will open up enough spaces to fill a second unit. 

Feel like $120 is out of your budget? Anyone who donates from $1 up will be awarded 2AP for every $1 in NJ AP. 

All in all, Michael and the rest of the storytelling staff have big ideas to convert the camp ground into a post-apocalyptic wasteland each event, we just need your help to make it happen. 

    Risks & Challenges

    Our only risk is raising enough money for the storage unit. We have signed a multi-year lease with Camp Sacajawea, so we're not moving away. The shed we're looking to purchase is more expensive than our initial one, but is sturdier and will stand up to the elements for years to come.

story:
My name's BNG, or Benji. I've been around on the adult furry art scene for about ten years, doing commission work as well as art for ClubStripes.com, including my previous successful Indiegogo campaign for my all-male art book.


About 18 months ago, I made the decision to develop my own game, along the lines of Trials in Tainted Space with influences from The Witcher 3 and Skyrim. Since then, during my free time I've been teaching myself to code, planning, designing, building and rebuilding Carnal Souls.

After so long spent on it, I can safely say that this is what I want to do. I want to make Carnal Souls a professional, polished game, full of sexy, fun, and enjoyable content. This is why we're doing Flexible Funding - the game will be made whether we get $100 or $100,000, but more money means more features, better content, and in your hands sooner!

This campaign is to fund the initial release. After that, Carnal Souls will be a continuing project, growing and growing for the foreseeable future. We're estimating between 6 to 8 months from the end of this campaign until the initial release, and after that, we'll be looking to Patreon or something similar for ongoing funding as we expand and update the game for years to come.

There's no reason an adult-rated game can't be a polished indie production as well. With your help, we can prove it.


You can see some more detailed posts about planned features on our site, but here's a breakdown:

  • RPG essentials: Experience and leveling, skills, perks, generated loot, spells, quests, and exploration.
  • An open world containing large cities, small settlements, ruins, caves, and dangerous dungeons.
  • Turn-based combat with a wide range of unique enemies, tactics, and bosses. Fight your foes toe-to-toe, blast them with spells, or seduce them.
  • A powerful character-morphing system that allows you to change every feature of your body, in small or massive ways.
  • An awesome Parser/Dictator system that allows us to make dynamic content and scenes, not only changing words to suit your description, but changing how entire scenes play out.
  • Unlockable, high-quality adult artworks that get added to your collection as you progress, as well as background location artwork.
  • Tons of races and peoples, any of which you can either play as or become - fully or partially. These include humans, demons, elves, orcs, satyrs/fauns, and lots of furry races as well. We'll be adding more and more as development continues.
  • Pregnancy and inflation, as well as possibly hundreds of status effects -  some good, some not so good.
  • Highly interactive sex scenes that offer you choices before and during the act, so you can bang how you want to.
  • Origin stories - begin as a mage, thief, merchant - the choice is yours, and your choice will affect your starting gear, perks, and stats, as well as how the game begins for you.
  • Titles and nicknames that you can earn as you play by completing quests, uncovering secrets, or completing achievements. NPC's will call you by the title of your choice, where they can.
  • Alignments of Gender and Stature. Gender will be governed by how you look, how you dress, and any perks or status affects that'll make you more/less feminine/masculine. Stature will work the same way, but will be on a scale of vulnerable to intimidating, meaning massive armoured warriors won't get mugged by petty bandits, and delicate beauties may find NPC's to be much more generous.
  • Fluid gender identification means NPC's will address you as they see you. They may mistake your gender if it's difficult to tell, and alternatively a fixed pronoun preference can be set in the options as well.

No. I've invested too much time and had too much fun to stop now! I also take planning very seriously. Many of these features are functionally planned out in detail, some with their frameworks in place and working already, and some are almost entirely built. Even the documentation and tag directory for the Parser/Dictator system is written, and over 100 pages long. Carnal Souls is happening, come Hell or high water.

Furthermore, if this campaign does well, there are even more features we plan to add using those funds:

  • A customisable player home. Add an alchemy lab, a library to store your collected books, an extra bedroom to house more followers, and storage for your phat loots.
  • Followers who will stay at your home, providing services and bonuses to you, as well as many, many sexytimes.
  • Begin the game with a direct relative or housecarl, who will keep your home tidy, look after any offspring you might have, and remind you to put on something warm when it's cold out.
  • This one's possible in theory, but if we do really well, I will look into getting static 3D models made, like dioramas or statues, which backers will be able to look at in detail in-game.

Carnal Souls will target WebGL and Unity; anywhere you can run a WebGL browser should also be capable of running the game! (Chrome, Firefox, Edge) Releases will be made available through the CarnalSouls.com website, and we plan to provide at least three primary versions:

  • A downloadable version that contains all of the games content, and doesn't communicate with the CarnalSouls.com services at all.
  • A web-based version that hooks into additional services provided through CarnalSouls.com, such as cloud saves, save editing, and a number of other extras that we have planned. Many of these services will only be available to players with appropriate backer access.
  • A packaged version that will be suitable for running on portable devices, such as Apple and Android smartphones and tablets. Apple devices will need to be jailbroken to run the packaged game, but the web-based version should work just fine; the package is only intended to save mobile users from heavy data bills whilst on the go.

Despite so long teaching myself programming, one thing is clear: I need a professional's help if Carnal Souls is gonna be awesome. The main body of our target funds will be directed towards hiring Crimson - a software developer with almost 20 years experience. I have no doubt he'll make Carnal Souls a lean, mean machine that we'll be able to add to and expand for years to come.

The next chunk will be to support myself during development, so I can stop taking commissions and focus entirely on making art assets, writing scenes, and building the game's world full-time.

The last part will be to hire Stereo to work on the website itself, giving us a fast, reliable platform to deliver the game to you, as well as managing the forums and promotional arts - like our cute chibis here! She's got years of experience as an admin on Weasyl, so she'd be a great fit for this role.


Carnal Souls will be free for everyone to play. No paywalls, no microtransactions or anything like that. Whether you contribute to us or not, you will be able to play the full game. We want to make rewards a thank-you to our supporters, not reserve the meat of the game for only those who can afford it.

The full game, its world, characters and quests will be available to everyone. The unlockable in-game X-rated artworks, as well as additional features in the online version, will be available to backers, and higher-tier backers will be able to directly influence the game's content! Here are the account types, but check out the perks for more bonuses:

Member: Requires no pledge. You'll have access to the game, including cloud saves on the online version when you register on the site. Once the game is launched you'll have access to the basic forums as well, for bug reporting and discussions.

Backer: Has full access to all of the art in the game, as well as online extras like save editing and achievements once they go live. You'll also have access to the site and Backer forums before release, where we'll post updates and sneak peaks on what's being done. Also includes the Backer badge and title on the forums.

Supporter: Has all privileges of Backer status, as well as Supporter forum section where you can vote on polls for content. Also includes the Supporter badge and title on the forums.

Enchanted: Includes all privileges of Supporters, as well as the Enchanted badge and title for the forums, and your name in the credits. Enchanted accounts will also have access to the high-fidelity 3D models, if we reach that stretch goal (see below).

Legendary: Includes all privileges of Enchanted, as well as the Legendary badge and title for the forums, and your name in the credits. Legendary accounts have lifetime full access to everything.

Mythical: Includes all privileges of Legendary, as well as the Mythical badge and title for the forums, and your name in the credits. Mythical accounts have lifetime full access to everything.



I've made a living in the furry and erotica fandoms for nearly ten years. I didn't do that by fleecing people, and I certainly don't plan to start now. That being said, you should read everything carefully to make sure you are happy to back this project.

With all projects come risks. We have spent a great deal of time and effort meticulously planning each of our features, but these can all change during development. Either for gameplay decisions, allocating people to other systems, or simply thinking of better ideas. The 6-8 month timeframe to get an initial release should be taken with a pinch of salt, and hitting stretch goals, while meaning we can make the initial release even better, may mean waiting a little longer for the extra stuff to get put in.

We plan to put all the money to good use, so that Carnal Souls can be everything I want it to be. Here are our plans for any extra funds we make here:

$47,000 - We have everything we need to make the game happen. Woo!

$68,000 - Hire on an extra programmer to assist Crimson. This will mean we can aim to get the more complex systems in place for the initial release, such as player homes and followers.

$80,000 - This will give us a healthy budget to spend on the best artists and writers for character artwork, unlockable X-rated artworks, backdrops, quests, and scenes.

$90,000 - We will pursue the best 3D artists we can find willing to work on high-quality erotic dioramas and character models for viewing in-game. If for some reason we cannot implement these in the game, these will be available to view on the site for Enchanted accounts and above.

$100,000 - At this point, all extra funds will be allocated to getting more art, more scenes, more 3D models and assets made for the game. If it goes much higher than this, aside from my brain exploding, we will look into expanding the team even further to make the initial release as excellent as possible.


Q: How long will it take?
A: We aim to have the first release ready roughly 6 to 8 months after this campaign ends, but this should be taken as a rough estimation.

Q: Do I need a subscription to play?
A: No. The game will be free. Unlockable artwork, 3D models, and online extra features will require applicable account types. After release, these accounts can be purchased, possibly with a subscription. More details will follow closer to release.

Q: Why don't you accept paypal for pledges?
A: Paypal is a massive risk, especially for projects that involve adult content. I simply won't put a large chunk of the money we raise at the mercy of them and just hope they don't decide to freeze the account for any number of reasons. I'm afraid it's credit/debit cards only.

Q: 18 months is a long time. Why no playable demo or alpha?
A: I began making one some time ago, in Unity, and dropped it for a while to experiment with CreateJS, Haxe, and other frameworks. We've since decided to return to my original Unity build and target the new WebGL platform.

Q: What will the initial release be like?
A: It's hard to say, but we aim to have as many of the bullet points listed above (under 'Yeah? What's so great about Carnal Souls?') implemented as we can.

Q: Can I play offline?
A: Yes. There will be a downloadable version to play.

Q: Will there be a mobile version?
A: Also yes. Perhaps not ready at release, but it will happen.

Q: How hardcore is the smut in this game going to be?
A: Carnal Souls is a videogame first and porn second. To me, making the game fun to play is paramount. However, we plan to have very hardcore scenes, featuring a wide array of fetishes, excluding none but the most extreme. Excluded themes include, but are not limited to: gore, scat, vore, or anything underage.

Q: If I give you loads of money, can I have my fursona/OC in the game?
A: No. We're giving extremely high-tier backers some creative influence over the game, but I draw the line there. I have the last word when it comes to Carnal Souls' content - nothing goes in unless I feel it is appropriate and adds to the game's quality. We will, however, be happy to read people's suggestions for characters on the forums, once they're up (but again, no owned OC's or fursonas).

Q: How often will you update the game?
A: We'll post progress news near constantly, initial releases will be infrequent as the core game comes together, but we'll start to build up to a regular schedule over time with releases probably coming more and more frequently.

Q: Will Backers/Supporters/etc get more frequent updates?
A: No. Everyone will get the latest version, even the free member accounts.

Q: I'm still not convinced...
A: Then please, hold off on supporting us until you're sure you're okay with the risks. Read this page, have a look at our site, and if there's anything you're unsure about, tweet us at @CarnalSouls.

story:
What you are funding...

Bumbershoot Cahoots is an exciting new mobile app currently in development which will reinvigorate the traditional turn-based multi-player 2D artillery game on Android devices and web browsers this summer.

Players will take turns launching Bumbershoot into target rich environments (in the air and on the ground) to cause massive damage and be rewarded with massive points.

Active and passive power-ups will litter each map in order to give players the ability increase points rewarded or damage inflicted each turn, and/or hinder their opponent’s ability to do the same. Bumbershoot Cahoots is all about mercilessly raining powerful blows down upon the denizens of the five zany maps, ruthlessly crippling your opponent with surgical precision, or both - each and every turn.

Destroying targets isn't the only way to gain points! Additional points are awarded for chaining together destructive combos as well as for using your resources more effectively than your opponent. The player at the end of the game who has chained more combos or consumed more power-ups will be awarded bonus points which just might mean the difference between squeaking out an unbelievable come from behind victory or suffering an embarrassing defeat at the hands of your arch nemesis!

My design goal for Bumbershoot Cahoots is to create a game which at its core is fun, funny and engaging, and then to sprinkle in extra features which will appeal to a wide range and type of gamers without making it overly complex or clunky.

Bumbershoot Cahoots features:

  • Coin System: Players will be awarded 3 coins per hour, allowing them to select up to 3 active power-ups with which to start each game. Players can earn more coins by inviting facebook friends and Twitter followers to play, or sharing their wins and losses on facebook and Twitter.
  • Power-up System: Shoot for passive power-ups in the air, or uncover active power-ups from within destroyed units for use at opportune times to aid you in causing wreaking havoc, scoring massive points, and leaving a post apocalyptic wasteland in your wake!
  • Combo System: Chain together impressive combos by destroying mutliple targets or activating multiple power-ups in a single turn! May the most creative player win!
  • Achievement System: Flaunt your gaming prowess in front of friends and opponents by attaining achievements! Your achievement points will be displayed next to your avatar in-game, on the leader boards, and during game creation for all to see! Let them know who you they are messing with!
  • Online Leaderboards: Online leader boards will allow you to track your wins and losses against friends, Facebook friends, Twitter followers and contacts. Crush the spirits of your rivals by Tweeting and sharing your amazing victories against them!
  • Wardrobe System: Collect outfit pieces and assemble wardrobes so you can compete against your friends dressed in your favorite costumes! Are you a pirate in real life? A ninja? A SEAL team leader? No? Well, you can be in-game!
  • End of Game Statistics: See how your performance matches up against your opponent with an End of Game Statistics screen! Who did the most damage? Who used the most power-ups? Who chained the most combos? Was it you?

Where your money is going...

Honestly, I've poured every available dime I have (and then some) into this project. I sold my DVD collection to FYE, eBay'd my book collection, and have taken to mowing neighborhood lawns to help get this thing off the ground.

The money I am looking to raise is going to help cover a variety of things:

  • Finish funding the game ($1000): I am currently about $1,000 short of my goal to finish funding the last programming "milestone". Without this $1,000, this game will never see the light of day.
  • Port to iPhone (~$1300): The game is currently being developed for Android only, but I desperately want it to be available for iPhone and Apple devices as well, which is going to cost me another $1300.
  • Advertising ($700): The last $700 will be applied towards advertising. Advertising will include: Facebook/Google Ad campaigns, Radio spots, Video production, and Ad placement on other websites.

At my website, you can check out the following information:

WTF is a Bumbershoot Cahoots?

Design Q&A

Design Goals

BShootCahoots Inspirations

Spotlight on: The Power-up System

Bumbershoot Cahoots: The Making of, Part 1

 

 -Daniel J. Cassidy

Power-up System: Shoot for passive power-ups in the air, or uncover active power-ups from within destroyed units for use at opportune times to aid you in causing wreaking havoc, scoring massive points, and leaving a post apocalyptic wasteland in your wake!


Combo System: Chain together impressive combos by destroying mutliple targets or activating multiple power-ups in a single turn! May the most creative player win!


Achievement System: Flaunt your gaming prowess in front of friends and opponents by attaining achievements! Your achievement points will be displayed next to your avatar in-game, on the leader boards, and during game creation for all to see! Let them know who you they are messing with!


Online Leaderboards: Online leader boards will allow you to track your wins and losses against friends, Facebook friends, Twitter followers and contacts. Crush the spirits of your rivals by Tweeting and sharing your amazing victories against them!


Wardrobe System: Collect outfit pieces and assemble wardrobes so you can compete against your friends dressed in your favorite costumes! Are you a pirate in real life? A ninja? A SEAL team leader? No? Well, you can be in-game!


End of Game Statistics: See how your performance matches up against your opponent with an End of Game Statistics screen! Who did the most damage? Who used the most power-ups? Who chained the most combos? Was it you?
Where your money is going...
Honestly, I've poured every available dime I have (and then some) into this project. I sold my DVD collection to FYE, eBay'd my book collection, and have taken to mowing neighborhood lawns to help get this thing off the ground.
The money I am looking to raise is going to help cover a variety of things:

Finish funding the game ($1000): I am currently about $1,000 short of my goal to finish funding the last programming "milestone". Without this $1,000, this game will never see the light of day.
Port to iPhone (~$1300): The game is currently being developed for Android only, but I desperately want it to be available for iPhone and Apple devices as well, which is going to cost me another $1300.
Advertising ($700): The last $700 will be applied towards advertising. Advertising will include: Facebook/Google Ad campaigns, Radio spots, Video production, and Ad placement on other websites.
At my website, you can check out the following information:
WTF is a Bumbershoot Cahoots?
Design Q&A
Design Goals
BShootCahoots Inspirations
Spotlight on: The Power-up System
Bumbershoot Cahoots: The Making of, Part 1
 
 -Daniel J. Cassidy

story:
"What would I do after the alien invasion?"  

It's a question you've probably asked yourself, and it's a question we want to help you answer!  

INTRODUCTIOND

MORE ABOUT "WHEN THEY ARRIVED"

 "When they arrived" - First person game with a storyline and a big open world. The main character Alan White is a former military man who was at war in Iraq, who received a lot of experience in the army, but after many injuries he decided to resign. Many years have passed – 

Alan had his own business and was in to hunting. Once he decides to take his faithful friend, Doberman named Junior, to go hunting and stay at his deceased grandfather in the village called Brightwood where once was a sect called "Witnesses of the Second Coming". In the evenings, Alan listened to the radio and once heard an announcement about strange objects moving towards the Earth. After the third news release it turned out that it was alien’s spaceships. Later on, they began to report that the enemy had attacked, the cities were being destroyed and thousands of people died. Alan decided that he did not have any reason to return home, and it is better to stay here and consolidate, find weapons and provisions to survive. Perhaps he will even manage to save the Earth…

What would you do in his place? But, perhaps, sometime in the future, theoretically, an invasion of aliens (if they exist) could occur.  

What will they look like? For what purpose they are invading? - We will try to answer these and other questions in the game ''WHEN THEY ARRIVED''.

SOME SCREENSHOTS

Battle bow.

Portal.

You have your own ATV and garage.​

You have your own big house and doberman Junior.

Aliens are experimenting with people and releasing mutants to hunt survivors.​

 WHAT IS READY OR PLANNED

  1. You are completely free in action and a huge world to research ;
  2. Build, blow up and defend from enemies;  
  3. Mine ores, use it to create various useful objects ;  
  4. Hunt wild boars and deer, as they can become an excellent sources of food, but beware of bears and wolves ;  
  5. Construct various structures, including traps ;  
  6. Look for provisions, drive on an old ATV among a bunch of enemies;
  7. Study the legend of the 'Witnesses of the second coming ', perhaps there you will find some answers;  
  8. Increase your combat skills and not only (for this there is a especial panel of cards);  
  9. Survive by fighting with an enemy unknown to you, try to have an influence on the invasion and much more...
  10. Collect the parts and find the blueprints to create a "mini - mole hole".
  11. Repair the spacesuit, collect all the equipment you need, and go to Mars to destroy the bridgehead of the aliens.

WHAT "WHEN THEY ARRIVED" NEEDS

Art and Graphic 20%  

— Better UI design; 

— Illustrations and art for web and promo.

Additional Programming 20%  

— Perfomance optimization; 

— VR-adaptation;  

— Debug.

Marketing 30%  

— SMM-campaign;  

— Website;  

— Promo-videos.

Hardware 20%  

— VR-ready PC and Oculus Rift;

Media 10%  

— Additional sounds; 

— OST;  

— Voiceovers.

They. Aliens from a distant galaxy. Very dangerous creatures.

Trailer camp. You will need to solve many mysteries.

Craft book.

 Craft system and inventory.

Unknown sect symbols.

REWARDS FIRM PRINTED T-SHIRTS (design not final)

 

FIRM PRINTED CUP (design not final).

POSTERS

Risks and challenges

If we do not reach the goal - we will seek funding from other sources. We plan to go to Steam in June - July. The game will be released in early access and will be gradually updated. We plan to focus on the story and the action in the game, so we will quickly and efficiently work in this direction.

CONTACTS AND LINKS :  

secondrealityemail@gmail.com

https://twitter.com/_SecondReality

https://www.facebook.com/secondrealitystudio/

https://www.facebook.com/When-They-Arrived-1974...

http://steamcommunity.com/groups/secondrealityo...

https://www.instagram.com/_secondreality/

https://discord.gg/HKAR4Bu

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKFcO5Z4g9NJBH...

https://vk.com/secondrealitystudio

A Robotic War Simulation

PROXIMA UNIVERSE is a realistic open-world Shooter that supports up to 100 players. A ground-breaking experience with infinite matches, dynamic weather system, seasons and a real 24-hour day/night cycle.

Play the official game modes or unleash your creativity by creating your own mods!

Join the Universe now and experience a new era of multiplayer games!

 

Action in PROXIMA UNIVERSE takes place on an Earth-like planet called Alterra, but unlike our planet it's populated by robotic life forms.

 

Big Realistic Open World

Maps in PROXIMA are big in scale and rich in detail! Our first map Haven for the game mode Terra Control has a size of 4x4 km. Maps in the other game modes will be even bigger!

Stay tuned for news! We at Vulkanic are going to push real-time rendering to the next level!

 

Dynamic Weather System

The weather system of PROXIMA will be based on seasons and will be highly influenced by real weather conditions of the planet Earth.

Spending a day in PROXIMA means you will see how fog appears in the early morning and how it spreads or disappears after some time. You will be able to see how puddles appear as it's raining or how they fill up over time. If there is a Winter season you will see how the environments start to freeze. If it's snowing for many hours or days you will be seeing how the snow spreads and transforms the environment in a Winter-resort-looking place!

We are in love with realism and small details! We will make the most realistic and best-looking weather system of all time!

 

Real 24-Hour Day/Night Cycle

When we say real 24 hours then we really mean 24 hours! We are simulating a whole day of war and the war never stops unless you leave the game!

 

Terra Control – An Infinite Never-Ending Game Mode!

In our first game mode called Terra Control all players are divided in 4 teams. You need to capture and control areas in order to have success with your team. After a certain time of early- and mid-game the round's Final Phase starts, in which the winning team is decided.

The cycle repeats without reloading the map or losing any progress made in the previous round! Will you put all your efforts into winning the round or plan a long-term strategy? Decide it together with your team!

 

Character Classes & Abilities

The game features three classes: Gunner, Mechanic and Protector. The main purpose of the classes is to set predefined roles for players in a team. This makes the gameplay highly tactical and diverse.

All classes have unique special abilities ranging form offensive to defensive ones. While offensive abilities can affect/damage enemies or reduce their stats, defensive ones can grant additional movement speed or special effects to you and nearby allies.

There are health, shield and energy stats which differ depending on what class you play. Energy is used to cast abilities and refills over time.

All classes have a signature weapon which will not require ammo but use energy instead. These weapons are very useful in extreme cases where you don't have any other equipment to protect yourself.

We're planning to add more classes in the future. However if we achieve the third stretch goal we will implement an additional class on launch!

 

Character Customization

The appearance of your robot is not bound to the class you play! You will be able to choose from different looks. You will also be able to replace the head, add additional elements to the body, change colors etc.

We will regularly release new robotic characters, body elements and other cosmetics after launch! There will be both female- and male-looking characters in the game.

 

Gear Shopping & Economy

M.A.I. (stands for Multiplayer Artificial Intelligence) will play a big role in how war scenarios will unfold! Every action can mean the loss of your hard-earned points. Dying isn't cheap in PROXIMA. Playing good will be rewarded and playing not careful enough or light-minded will punish you. There is a constant economy running. You don't have unlimited ammo. Well, yes and no.

M.A.I. will charge you for every shot you make! M.A.I. has an asking price for all gear you desire! M.A.I. is effectively balancing the game and it's economy! Selling or buying gear from M.A.I. is one of the key elements of PROXIMA.

M.A.I. can even talk to you... sometimes.

 

Weapons & Equipment

PROXIMA will feature a wide variety of weapons and equipment. Weapons differ depending on ammo type (bullets, plasma, arrows etc.) but also are grouped in series such as Horizon (HR) or Stellar (SI).

Each weapon has different stats such as damage, fire rate, shield penetration value, projectile speed etc. All of those make different weapons more or less useful depending on the situation.

We implemented realistic damage models as well as bullet drop and travel time for projectiles. Damage is calculated based on the body part the projectile hits as well as the current amount of shield the opponent has.


Horizon series: high damage, lower projectile speed.


Stellar series: lower damage, high projectile speed.
 

Other types of gear in PROXIMA include:

  • Weapon upgrades such as scopes, extended mags etc.
  • Various types of grenades.
  • Cores, which are used to regenerate health, energy, shield or boost speed.
  • Utility gear, which is used to spawn beacons or to change your class.
     

You will be able to buy and sell gear in M.A.I.'s shop.

 

Aircrafts

In the Terra Control game mode all players will spawn in a team base located on the edge of the island.

Take your aircraft, fly to a desired destination and drop. While you are dropping the aircraft leaves the simulation. Keep in mind, your aircraft can be shot down and force you to drop on that exact location. So be carefull!

 

Switch from FPP to TPP

In PROXIMA you'll be able to freely switch your camera perspective!

We developed a system that shares the same animations in FPP and TPP (how others see you). This will solve a common issue of multiplayer games when you appear slightly different to your enemies compared to how you see yourself. For example, when you think you are hiding behind a rock an enemy still can see the edge of your body uncovored. In PROXIMA you not gonna have such a problem.

 

Realistic Physics

The game will feature realistic character ragdoll. When you die from a shot or explosion the impact force is taken into account in order to simulate a realistic death animation.

 

Easy to Learn, Hard to Master

PROXIMA gameplay is understandable and comfortable for a player but still provides a wide space for improving your skills, experimenting and discovering the small nuances that make it so unique. You will learn the base game mechanics in the first minutes after joining the game, but the path of improvement will be long, motivating and rewarding.

On the surface the game can seem casual but due to its complex design it's highly strategic and it can be a true hardcore experience at times. A war scenario can be completely quiet in one minute and in the other everyone is fighting for territory.

 

Other Features

  • Beacons
    You will be able to buy and place beacons during gameplay. Teammates can use the beacons to spawn at the beacon locations. 
     
  • Party System
    You will be able to invite your friends to a party in order to play in the same team. In a game there will be no difference between your party members and other teammates.
     
  • Voice Chat
    Using proximity-based voice chat is a key factor for success in PROXIMA. Communication with your team is crucial! You will be also able to use pre-recorded voice commands to communicate with you team.

 

Core Pillars of PROXIMA

  • Accessibility
    We design the game with cross-platform matchmaking and play in mind.

  • Responsiveness
    Experience intuitive character movement and gunplay. A good balance between realism and convenience is part of our design philosophy!

  • Optimization
    We think about optimization in early stage of development! We will not start optimizing the game post-launch! Also you will be able to choose from a wide variety of settings to get the desired balance between quality and performance.

 

Modding Support & Dedicated Servers

We want to empower all humans around the globe to make their own versions of PROXIMA and  provide a space for creativity. There is no limitations. You will be able to create your own maps and game modes and host a server with them.

Dedicated servers will be available alongside the official servers and matchmaking. We pre up PROXIMA to have cross-platform matchmaking and play across all platforms. Server files for the game will also be released in case you are wondering!

You will be able to play the official game modes by Vulkanic or to unleash your creativity with custom servers or mods, or both!

 

Cross-Platform Matchmaking & Play

We believe in a future where cross-platform features enable players around the world to play together! Our goal is to unite players no matter on what platform they originally bought our game!

 

Deadly Mangos!

M.A.I. told us about a terrifying mango grenade that will be available in her shop. Very powerful but very expensive... 

 

Community Polls

We love and value all of you! Backers will have the chance to vote on important decisions regarding the future of the game. You have the power and tools to shape the future of PROXIMA!

 

Basic Bundles Comparison

 

Budget Breakdown

 

 

Stretch Goals

 

Enhanced cosmetic customization – €34 000

We will add an interface for colors, patterns and decals. You will be able to apply those not only to your character but also weapons, vehicles and aircrafts.

 

Robotic dragons – €44 000

We will replace the current aircrafts with robotic dragons. 

 

Additional class on launch – €55 000

We will add an additional class with stealth abilities.

 

Robotic animals – €67 000

We will implement robotic animals that you can ride for traversing the map. Spawn a robotic tiger that will help you to reach a destination point faster, or terrify your enemies by driving a robotic spider-tank.

 

In-Depth Lore & Art – €85 000

We will design unteractive in-game library about the lore and art of Proxima with narration and music. Arts will also be distributed in the form of a digital artbook.

 

Single-player missions – €126 000

We will implement narrative-driven single-player missions into the game. This also leads to implementing AI support. There will be more missions post-launch.

You will also be able to create your own missions with help of modding.

 

Co-op missions – ???

We will add co-op support for the single-player missions. Play together with you friends!

 

Map Expansion – ???

We will build a pipeline that will allow us to expand the game world by adding additional islands. Players will be able to travel from island to island. Different regions will have different biomes. All islands will form a huge archipelago that will expand over time.

 

Robotic Fauna – ???

We will populate islands with robotic fauna. From small butterflies, birds and rabbits to tigers, elephants or even dragons! We will use and expand our progress in developing A.I. to implement realistic behavior for those animals.

 

Role-Playing Mode – ???

All previously reached goals will allow us to focus on our ultimate goal and build a game without limits. A complete ecosystem with dynamic seasons and weather, big realistic multi-biome world and robotic fauna. Control your robot avatar and interact with the world and other players. With the power of modding you will be also able to create your own RP experiences based on PROXIMA!

 

Project History

So far we tested the game extensively with people from the community and our backers. In 2019 we decided to completely focus on the development side of things again. We have gathered enough feedback and data from previous testing phases so that we can now focus on iterating and implementing the final pieces into the game.

 

Closed Alpha

Closed Alpha testing will return in the first half of 2021 to ensure a flawless launch for all of us humans! In general we are really open to the feedback of our community and we listen and read what you communicate to us.

 

Free Content Updates Post-Launch

We will release free content patches! New game modes, new maps, quality of life improvements, content that could justify an asking price! All for free! We have so many plans for PROXIMA!

 

Next-Gen Consoles?

We are planning to release to PROXIMA on consoles as well as on all other platfroms simultaneously. Stay tuned for updates!

 

Development Updates

We will keep you updated about development progress. We will regularly post dev blogs and videos and host live streams.

 

Our Team

PROXIMA UNIVERSE is in development for almost three years now. We are a small but hard-working team. We all worked in the games industry for several years. We have a combined working experience of 36 years. Our core team consists of 6 people.

Denis Colovic – CEO, Game Director, Game Designer, Writer.
Anton Romanov – Technical Director, Programmer, Environment & Cinematic Artist.
Dariia Romanova – 2D, Promotional & Branding Artist.
Arturo Vázquez​ – 3D Artist, Animator.
Anna Kirilenko – 3D Artist, Level Designer.
Maxim Romantsov – Concept Artist.

Special shoutouts to our tireless Discord moderators SwiftNationTV and GoreAsylum186.
