We have a combined working experience of 36 years. Our core team consists of 6 people.Denis Colovic – CEO, Game Director, Game Designer, Writer.Anton Romanov – Technical Director, Programmer, Environment & Cinematic Artist.Dariia Romanova – 2D, Promotional & Branding Artist.Arturo Vázquez​ – 3D Artist, Animator.Anna Kirilenko – 3D Artist, Level Designer.Maxim Romantsov – Concept Artist.Special shoutouts to our tireless Discord moderators SwiftNationTV and GoreAsylum186.

story:
Follow the development of Wonder Wickets on:

Tumblr - Twitter

Download and Play the Demo!

Press Kit

The demo link will automatically download the demo. If you're a journalist and interested in writing about Wonder Wickets, check out the press kit!

PayPal Donation Form

Don't have a credit card? Want to donate through PayPal? No problem! Our Jotform will handle PayPal donations with the same rewards and prices. PayPal donations will still count towards our goals.

Hey! I'm Nick Roger, CEO and Co-Founder of Rightstick Studios. We've been working on small homemade video games for several years, but have rarely had the chance to finish or publish our games. This year, I'd like to break that streak by publishing Rightstick's first commercial video game: Wonder Wickets.

This is a special campaign, because actually, Wonder Wickets is already funded! We've saved up a small budget ourselves, and ANIM-ACE is acting as our producer and publisher for Wonder Wickets, provided the additional funds we needed to afford enough music and sound effects. However, the budget we have now is only the minimum amount we needed for a "quality yet affordable" product. We're launching this campaign in hopes that we can raise more funds, and make Wonder Wickets the game we really want to make.

Wonder Wickets is a game inspired by our love of mini-golf, with a twist in mechanics to make it a fresh and exciting experience. It features a colorful cast of playable characters and high-resolution graphics that anyone can enjoy, and simple, versatile controls that anyone can pick up and play.

Wonder Wickets is a small and simple game, but we're still injecting it with love and the Rightstick devotion to quality and innovative design.

Wonder Wickets' base game features:

  • 1920 x 1080 Resolution + 60 fps
  • Single Player Campaign and Two-Player Modes
  • Destrucible objects, that can be overcome by pure force!
  • A variety of enemies with different behaviors.
  • Power-ups to turn your foes upside down.
  • Play as 6 colorful characters, with alternate color options for a variety of choices
  • Cavort about 30+ levels, spread through 6 thematic worlds:
    • Open Plains
    • Sprawling Forests
    • Star-Struck and Shipwreck-Strewn Beaches
    • Fiery Fossil Fields
    • Icy Mansions and Spooky Graveyards
    • Mysterious Planet
  • Local and Online 2-Player Versus
  • 3 Versus modes, with multiplayer stages:
    • Collect stardust and smack enemies in a scurry to achieve the higher score
    • Race to the end in the least amount of strokes
    • Aim for moving enemies and targets in a driving range
  • Level Builder, allowing you to make and share single and multiplayer stages.
  • Adjustable Controls, with support for keyboards/mouse and all standard PC controllers.

Wonder Wickets is being developed for PC on Steam, Itch.io, and other selling platforms. We have plans for possible ports after the PC release.

These extra features require more music and sound effects, which costs much more money. The budget for each goal also includes a little bit more to cover time and effort needed to create new assets.

Each goal reached will also push the release date further back, but not by much more than a couple of weeks each.

  • +2 More Characters, making a total of 8 Characters
  • 3 More World Themes: (which also includes more assets for level editor!)
    • ​Gizmo & Toy Land
    • Crystalline Caves & Dark Grottos
    • Windy Temples
  • More Music, with enough music to have a unique theme for each world.

  • +2 More Characters, making a total of 10 Characters
  • Bonus Levels, 1 special level for each world, unlocked through certain conditions.
  • 2 More World Themes:
    • Golden Castle
    • Secret UFO

  • 2 More World Themes:
    • ​Mega Metropolis & Busy Highways
    • ?????
  • More Versus Modes:
    • ​Fortress Siege: Topple the defenses of your opponent's castle and defeat their king. The player with the most amount of damage after either king is defeated wins!
    • Party Mode: Play a randomly generated set of matches, with random modes, rules, etc. with each match.
    • And More? -- We'll experiment with more multiplayer mode ideas, and see what sticks!

And Further?

We want to keep Wonder Wickets simple, in order to maintain scope and make sure we can complete it. However, if we continue far past $1400, we'll see what other content we can add into the game.

(Tumblr) - (DeviantART) - (Twitter)

(Tumblr)

(Website) - (Twitter) - (Steam)

(Website) - (Bandcamp) - (Tumblr)

(Website)

Get access to a download of all of Wonder Wickets' music, at a discounted rate! Every music added on through stretch goals will be included as well, with no additional charge.

Base music is about 7 tracks, but stretch goals can add up to 10 more tracks!

PLUS: All perks include Backgrounds and your name in the Credits!

A copy of Wonder Wickets! You'll receive a Steam Key, and a link to a standalone download, in case you don't use Steam.

Digital Soundtrack + Wonder Wickets Download (+Backgrounds & Credits, too)

You'll have access to our Beta Discord channel, where you can play in-development versions of the game, report bugs, and suggest changes/features. Beta will become open to backers shortly after the campaign ends.

Beta Access is limited, in order to maintain the number of testers, since we're a small team and new to beta testing.

Digital Soundtrack + Wonder Wickets Download + Beta Access (+Backgrounds & Credits, too)

As a bonus, you'll also get sweet exclusive in-game content, like unique Star Orb skins (and more?).

An alternative for those who don't want / miss out on the Beta Access. Acquire a Digital Artbook download packed with art from Wonder Wickets development. This artbook will include things like official art, concept art, sketches, game assets, and character/enemy designs that didn't make it into the final game.

The Artbook will be available sometime around the release of the game.

Digital Soundtrack + Wonder Wickets Download + Beta Access + Digital Artbook + Exclusive In-Game Content (+Backgrounds & Credits, too)

Work with us to design an enemy for Wonder Wickets! You'll have influence on all the aspects of the enemy, and we'll make sure this enemy fits in the game while meeting your (reasonable) desires.

Please note that enemy designs must fit the game in design and functionality, along with meeting our design and thematic standards. There's a chance that your idea won't work for Wonder Wickets, so before you select this perk, contact us first with your concept, and we'll figure out if we can work with it.

*Read the Intruder / Interloper Terms and Conditions at the bottom so that you understand the limitations of this perk!

Work with us to design a playable character for Wonder Wickets! You'll have influence on all the aspects of the character, and we'll make sure they fit in the game while meeting your (reasonable) desires.

This character will be playable by everyone, so the design falls under more strict design standards. Contact us first to make sure your submissions is appropriate!

*Read the Intruder / Interloper Terms and Conditions at the bottom so that you understand the limitations of this perk!

Risks and Challenges

Wonder Wickets is a small and simple game, and Nick has enough prior experience to be able to complete all the necessary functions of the game. However, because every feature relies solely on Nick to complete, anything that happens to him (like injury, sickness, or other major life events) could set the game's release date back, and there's no budgeting assigned to hire a replacement.

*Intruder / Interloper Perks: Terms and Conditions

Making content with us for Wonder Wickets is sensitive, and since we prefer to maintain a standard on design, certain thematic and style, and certain a age rating to appeal to all players young and old, we reserve the right to refuse submissions for these perks. Thus, to make sure that your submission meets our guidelines, contact as at (email) with your submission (in as much detail as possible) so that we may approve of it, before you confirm your purchase of these perks. 

How the Submission Process Works:

  • Email nick.r(at)rightstickstudios.com with your submission
  • Please do not submit if you have no intention/capability of paying for the perk.
  • When submitting your ideas for a character/enemy, include as much details as you can. Visual examples, such as images/videos are preferable, too. If you're submitting an enemy, you can include ideas how this enemy will function.
  • Here are design elements we prefer (meeting these will make it much easier to include your design in the game!):
    • Somewhat "Space" themed, even if it's just a star drawn on them, it helps meld with the rest of the characters
    • Cute, silly, friendly, something along those lines.
    • Something many people can enjoy (specifically for Playable Characters)
  • Elements that we outright reject:
    • Characters/enemies that you did not make yourself, such as from another show/movie/comic/story/etc. that you do not fully own and have the rights to.
    • Anything PG13 or over, or related to anything PG13 or over. This is a kid-friendly game.
    • Controversial, political, or sensitive subjects.
  • When your submission and contribution is approved, and the campaign is over, we will begin using your submission details to create concept sketches in the style of the game.
  • We will possibly make suggestions and alter the design to certain degrees to make sure the character fits in the game, particularly to make sure that it meets our "design elements we prefer", or if it's an enemy design, to make sure that the design works well with the functionality of the AI, and that the AI style fits in the game.
  • We'll keep in contact with you (email or Discord is preferred) to make sure the concepts meet your approval.

story:
Campaign UPDATE: we reached the campaign goal! Now on to the Stretch Goals!!!

THANK YOU!

Who exactly are we?

Hello, world!

Well we finally came to IndieGoGo after months of "Is it the right thing to do?"
Let's cut the chase and introduce ourselves: we are a smaaall company located in Japan (Osaka, to be precise) and we make games (mostly...but more on that later...please do not stop reading ;_; )

Still reading? Good!



We have always wanted to do games in our lives and that became our job (why didn't we become doctors? WHY??!?!?!?).
We played games from the Atari 2600 onwards and that has always been our biggest, most beloved passion....and now we want to give some of that to you all.

We came to IndieGoGo to make our project come to life, in the hope that we can bring something new, fresh and funny to play to every game lover (and not) out there :D

What exactly are we.....doing?

Good question!
We are doing a new kind of game....a mix between a golf game (yes, you read it correctly...GOLF) and an RPG.
So you might be wondering...


Have you ever played a golf game? Well...we did. And what bothered us the most was seeing amazing courses, amazing surroundings and...not being able to see any of it.
It was just a shot, being teleported to the ball's location over and over...we wanted to explore and see...THINGS!

And that is why one night after one beer too many we came up with the crazy idea of making the FIRST (yep.) open-world golf RPG game.
And it will be available for iOS, Android, PC and Mac.

Excited? Well..WE ARE!!!

What exactly is RPGolf?

As previously said and as the name suggests, RPGolf is an open-world-golf-roleplaygame.
But it's not all. We took particular care to make sure that  the two genres are not just something slapped together to make some "innovative" game.

We are taking particular care into mixing the aspects of both games together to give you a unique, fulfilling and incredible experience :)



You want an example? Of course!
Well for starters...you will have to walk to your ball. No more "teleporting" and finally some healthy walks immersed in nature and surrounded by...monsters. And you will have to fight them if you want to free your path and become stronger. Because by becoming stronger not only your level will go up, but also you will make more damage while fighting and you will shoot farther while playing golf!
Of course all the main stats of your character will affect both aspects of the game, so that you will have to decide how to power up your character depending on your gameplay style.

What exactly are you not telling us?

Well, nothing in particular but we can surely tell you more about the game!

  • 9 (or 18? help ussss!) hole open-world map featuring different environments.

  • Character will grow as more experience is gained. Every stat will influence both golf and RPG aspects of the game.

  • Handicap System: to increase replayability, the HCP of the player will be recorded play after play. Lower HCP levels will unlock areas in the game and give you access to unique quests, features and items!

  • Club house, practice field, shops and many other buildings to explore

  • Clubs “forging” system: grip, head and shaft, combine them in different ways when visiting workshops around the world to create the "ultimate club"!

  • Multiplayer mode* (see below)

Like what you read? Then go on!



What exactly are we paying for?

Artworks. The artist that works with us already owns our houses, laptops, souls and any material possession we have.
Also we need to eat while we work on the game (or we will starve and there is no way we can complete RPGolf. And that would be sad...no?), and let's not forget about our amazing soundtrack! (we will soon post a preview in the updates!)
With your help we can work full time on RPGolf without having to work on other projects to "survive" ourselves.

We want to develop this game more than anything, and with your help we can really make it happen!

What exactly are the STRETCH GOALS?

We are glad you asked!
here is what we plan to do if we reach enough funding:

25.000 15.000 USD: WE MADE more than we expected...lol! And to celebrate this goal we will make the game a full 18 holes course. Yep, instead of 9 holes you will get a fully featured golf club. More monsters, bosses and more anything will double the fun!

50.000 40.000 USD: Class system. Wizard, warrior or thief. Choose your path. Unique skills, weapons, and clothes will make you want to play the game over and over just to enjoy all three different styles!

75.000 65.000 USD: Multiplayer. Yes you will be able to play online and challenge all other players around the globe in an unique game! Fight the monsters or wait for the others to do it? Focus on the golfing? You choose!

What exactly are the risks?

Like every other project in the world there will be problems. But that's only part of the fun, right?
The game is already in development, the core mechanic of the game is there, what we need is the "stability" and reassurance to really put our full time into this and complete it.
And you have our word that we will make the impossible and more to deliver what we promise here!!!

What exactly can I do to help?

Well...if you are still reading, why not contribute to the campaign? (big grin :D)
If you cannot or simply do not like games at all, don't worry...we love you anyway <3. But please help us spread the word and share this project with all your friends on Facebook, Twitter, whateverisyourfavouritesocialnetwork!

And...well...thanks for reading until the end!

story:
The Twink Cup is a yearly, community driven event designed to promote the level 19 twink bracket in World of Warcraft and encourage competition within this bracket.

Over the course of two years the Twink Cup has grown from a $1400 tournament with 65 participants to a $7000 tournament with almost 120 participants. The first Twink Cup relied on players streaming games from their own perspective while the second saw our community achieve nearly professional level broadcasted games.

Teams and broadcasters have continued to perfect their craft in preparation for this year's event. Now the time has come to start putting plans into action, and with your help we can make this year's Twink Cup even better than the last.

The first Twink Cup relied on players streaming games from their own perspective while the second saw our community achieve nearly professional level broadcasted games.Teams and broadcasters have continued to perfect their craft in preparation for this year's event. Now the time has come to start putting plans into action, and with your help we can make this year's Twink Cup even better than the last.

story:
A bit about me

As you will see I am not the best photographer but I am a huge fan of 6mm and 10mm gaming, having been playing war games for well over two decades..  I love the huge scale battles that this miniature size allows you to fight over but I have found that the one thing that is often lacking from these monumental conflicts is the terrain to really make it feel as epic as my vision of the background.
I always enjoyed modelling projects but terrain of the scale I had envisioned often eluded me as it requires such accurate replication.  However, when I began to learn digital 3D modelling I realised this was how I could bring my ideas to life.  After a year of different smaller projects I eventually began work on my first set of truly epic terrain!

The Project

This campaign is to put my resin City Wall project out into the world and help me to:

  • Judge interest in terrain on this scale to decide if it is worth setting up an online store.
  • Allow me to gain some money back from the 3D printing of the City Wall originals (I don't expect to get the entire cost of everything I have spend but I have learnt a lot from the project and that in its self has been great for me).
  • Any money recouped from the project will allow me to fund future projects so that they can come to a crowd funder in a well developed state (as this one is) with the printing done and the moulds made.

So why should you back the project?
  • First and foremost it allows you to get some awesome terrain cheaper than it will be sold if I can set up an online store.
  • For a crowd funding campaign the project is quite far along so there are very few risks; the moulds are already made and have been used to cast the test set you can see pictures.
  • Because of the point above this will be flexible, meaning that you will get the perks you pay for even if we don't hit the target (basically the amount for the first stretch goal).
  • You can customise what you want if we reach the first stretch goal, adding extra walls, changing the bastions out for the taller ones, having more than one gate, etc.  It is unlikely I will be able to offer this even if I can set up a shop.
  • Even if I don't set up a shop as a campaign backer you will be able to contact me to add to your walls.

Its about time to show off some pictures I think!  Below is the 3D sculpting of the walls.  I think it shows off the details nicely (also as I have mentioned my photography isn't the best).

The above shows one "set" of the City Walls.  It is modular so can be put together with the straight sections by the gate should you wish, or one corner but the gate and one straight section or with the gate over to one side.  Whatever the scenario you are playing demands.

In terms of size the City Wall set measures just over 3 foot in length.  The platform at the back is 4 inches high and wide enough for three 20mm infantry stands to be placed side by side along the straight or corner sections and the gate towers are a massive 11 inches high (well just over actually).

Now onto some pictures of the real deal!


In the pictures above, the doors have been modeled closed.  If we reach the £1000 you will be able to buy extra sections as well as extra doors so you can have one set open and one set closed should you want to.

So not as to take up too much space with pictures and have some text get lost at the bottom of the page for the other pictures, with some 6mm models so you can get a better idea of the scale, just scroll down.

Where is my money going?

The obvious aside (mould making and resin) by far and away the biggest cost for this project is the actual 3D printing of the pieces.  Anyone who has who has done this themselves will have already guessed this from the size of the City Walls but I wanted to give everyone a clear idea that the majority of the money is going towards getting some of the cost of this.


Risks & Challenges

Possibly the only risk for you has to be that I have not run a crowd funding campaign before and I can understand that as a concern.  However, I have done everything I can to make this as risk free as possible.  How I hear you ask.

  • I am using a caster called Sebitar Workshop (https://www.facebook.com/sebitarworkshop) ... has taken part in crowd funding campaigns before and he has reliably helped to bring those campaigns to realisation with some great feedback from the backers.  Having received some of his products and the test casts I can attest to how good quality  they are.
  • The most time consuming aspects (3D printing and mold making) have already been completed.  In fact the pictures you have seen are of the first casting that have been painted up.

Postage

I want to mention (again) is that the postage is not included in the prices above.  I have done this to allow for orders from other countries as easily and so that if people purchase multiple perks (like when the stretch goals are added) the postage will work out as cheap as possible.
But as uncertainty can be a concern for the majority of us I thought I should give an idea of what to expect.  A completed set of the City Walls is approximately 2kg and is being sent from central Europe.  This should give you an idea of how much postage is likely to cost, but as an estimate to Europe I expect the insured postage for a single City Wall set to be approximately £20 due to the size and weight of the package.

Standard Resin Warning

The City Wall set is made from resin.  As is typical with resin products the models will need to be washed in warm soapy water before they are painted.  There is also a chance of some small air bubbled that will need to be fixed with a modelling putty such as Greenstuff.  Finally some of the finer parts can break in transit despite all effort being taken to package them thoroughly, these can be easily fixed with superglue.
The model comes unpainted and requires some assembly.

How can I help get this funded?

Understandably this isn't going to be for everyone or affordable for every individual with a gaming table but you may want to see what I bring out in the future (smaller bunkers are planned as well as a range of buildings.  So what can you do in this case?  Well, this is my first crowd funding project and not being an expert in publicity any you can give will always be massively appreciated.  So please spread this campaign far and wide and share it with anyone you feel may be interested.


More Shiny Pictures

(apologies again for my mediocre camera skills)

As the Ork hoards continue their assault on the city the cowardly Imperial commander attempts his escape as the dual suns begin to set.  His breakout is spearheaded by the cities finest defenders and equipment leaving far too few to protect the remaining civilians.  Attempting to plug the gap in the defences and the gate that the commander orders opened the brave Emperors finest take up vigil on the wall and form a barrier in front of it while the gate is closed.

Yep, that's a gate wide enough for a Baneblade to comfortably fit through or two tanks side by side with room to spare.

The walls are designed so that 6mm infantry on standard bases can fire through the gap, offering them the best protection possible.




Stretch Goals

Funding reaches £1,000 - REACHED - Postage will be combined on your perks even though you have to buy them perk at a time.  Postage will be paid after the campaign as explained above.

Individual components will be added to the perks list allowing you to buy individual parts of the set.  It will still work out cheaper to buy a full set if you want to have the standard wall system.

The photos below show each of the individual components:

Door


Straight Wall Section



Corner Wall Section

A quick note that each of these is a 45 degree turn.  So obviously two (with a bastion between should you choose to) makes up a full 90 degree turn.



Gate Wall Section


Small Bastion Section


Tall Bastion Section


Bastion "Pointed Roof"



Funding reaches £1,500 - REACHED

Here is a pictures of the Forward Bunker.  As you can see it is very much designed to match the bunkers on top of the Bastions.

The 3D printed is completed and it is being sent off this weekend to the caster to begin pre-production (basically getting the mould made).
But remember!  Each full set already purchased gives you one for free! (S if you have gone for the double perk you of course get two!)

Funding reaches £2,000 - REACHED

Gun mounts added to the perk list so you can add some AA defences to your City Walls.  These fit onto the smaller Bastion roofs or the Forward Bunkers.

Just waiting on a quote from the guy doing the casting and this will be up (shapeways have been a bit slow getting this sent off to me).


Funding reaches £2,500 - REACHED

Straight and Corner Breached Wall Sections now allow you to show damage during campaigns or scenarios.  Just be sure there are enough big guns to do the damage!
The pictures below show the original sculpts, as you can see they have detail of the internal walkway that has the firing point on the straight wall section or allows soldiers to move along the system immune to attack.

Breached Straight Wall Section


Breached Corner Wall Section


Funding reaches £3,000 - REACHED

An "inside" corner will be added as a perk, adding even more options to how you can construct your fortifications.
A quick note that each of these is a 45 degree turn.  So obviously two (with a bastion between should you choose to) makes up a full 90 degree turn.


Funding reaches £3,500 - REACHED - Damaged Bastion 

Thanks for everyone's support!  I really wasn't expecting to get to this point.  The last goal would be a damaged bastion (top section destroyed to show the inside stairwell and connecting corridor).
IMPORTANT:  This goal will take more time to reach you as it has not yet been fully designed and will need additional sculpting work.  For this reason it would not be able to be sent out until after Christmas.  If this goal is reached you will need to get this part POSTED SEPERATLY.

story:
"World of AYA"

 

World of AYA is thought to be a free-to-play browser based social game. Fully based on the basic economic principles and understandings. 

 

Short summary

 

AYA is the only nation in this virtual world, the capital of which is the city of Colchis. AYA unifies 6 following continents: (1) North Atica, (2) South Atica, (3) Ereba, (4) Asu, (5) Pharica and (6) Vasralia. Each continent, at the same time, represents each state of AYA. The main difference among the states is the basket of domestically available resources. The map of AYA is shown below.

 

Currencies

There are 3 virtual currencies in AYA. Namely: (1) Ati, (2) Ersu and (3) Pharla. Those currencies are domestic currencies in the following states:

Ati

 

  • North Atica 
  • South Atica

Ersu

 

  • Ereba
  • Asu
Pharla

 

  • Pharica
  • Vasralia

In addition, there is one semi-virtual national currency: Colchian Gold. The cost of everything valuable in AYA will be calculated using this currency. But transactions will take place using one of three above mentioned domestic currencies. Those domestic currencies have floating exchange rates vs. Colchian Gold, depending on current supply and demand of those currencies in the market.

The relationship between in-game currencies and the real currency (let say US Dollar) is shown on the diagram below.

 

 

In-game resources (other than the virtual money)

In AYA, there are 12 different resource types. Resources are defined by using Latin capital letters: A, B, C, D… 

As a real world example, you can think of A - as a timber, C - as a Coal, D - oil and so on. Or you can think A  - for example, as an agricultural product, B  - manufacturer  and so on. Actually that does not matter. What matters here is the fact that some of those resources are scarce in some continents while some are abundant. Some states have comparative advantage in producing certain resources; some has absolute advantage, etc.

The resource allocation among the states is shown on the map below.

 

  • Visually resources represent different colored boxes:

There are two types of markets where player can buy and sell those resources: (1) Domestic and (2) Intercontinental. In the domestic market players can only buy above mentioned 4 types of resources from their local governments. While in the intercontinental market players can buy and sell all kinds of resources from/to other players using their domestic virtual currencies.

 

Governing Bodies

AYA is a democratic nation, with the presidential system of government. There are 3 major governing bodies in AYA, namely:

 

  • GovTent (Government of AYA)
  • People’s Tent (Parliament of AYA)
  • Golden Tent (Central bank of AYA)

 

Each body has its own roles and functions similar to the real one. One of the significant differences is the fact that individuals can have accounts in the central bank of AYA. In other words, Golden Tent offers commercial bank’s functions too.

 

Social classes

 

There are 4 social classes in AYA, namely: 

 

  • Peasant
  • Merchant
  • Entrepreneur
  • Magnate 

All residents start their social career as a “Peasant” and try to move up on the social ladder.

 

 

Main goal of the game for the players: 

-To Earn Money and Become Rich. (As it is in the real life…)

Hidden goal of the game: 

-To deeper the basic economic knowledge and understanding, which will help players to better plan and manage limited resources in their real lives.

Simulation will be useful not only for economists. Every adult can test their knowledge, luck and personal skills, before they begin to fight for their places in the real world.

story:
UPDATE: The campaign has wrapped up now and we are hard at work getting the new playing field ready. We'll be providing updates as we move ahead through Facebook and our Battlegrounds mailing list. The next few months will be an exciting time for the Battlegrounds team and we're very happy to be working towards this goal. Keep in touch, we always love hearing from our supporters and new voices alike.

Battle your friends across a dynamic and objective-based playing field, with multiple weapon types, intense force feedback and persistent stat tracking



PLAY THE NEXT GENERATION OF LASER TAG

Video games have evolved enormously over the last 20 years, but live gaming - paintball, laser tag and airsoft - has not. We love paintball and airsoft, and we love playing video games, but there was nothing out there that let us combine the physicality of sports with the interactive experiences we’ve come to expect from video games.

Battlegrounds is an advanced laser tag gaming platform and facility inspired by our love of video games. We’ve spent the last three years building a running, shooting, weapon-changing, shield-breaking, nemesis-making, flag-capturing real life video game. After hosting over 800 testers at our beta facility and Toronto Mini Maker Faire, we’re now ready to open our first playing field.

We're very excited to grow out of our beta test facility and into a full-size field, and are currently in lease negotiations to open a location near Downsview Park, close to the 401 and Yorkdale Mall.

As a backer on Indiegogo you will get first access to play the game and at our new field, meet the team and give us your feedback on what you think would make the game better. We've built an incredibly flexible gaming system and your ideas and input will help shape the future of this game.

If we reach our funding goal you will also get - in addition to any perks you’ve purchased - a Battlegrounds Player ID band unique to Indiegogo backers and you will get to compete in the first-ever Battlegrounds Team Elimination Tournament.

LASER TAG STRIPPED DOWN AND REBUILT FROM THE GROUND UP

Battlegrounds isn’t like any laser tag you’ve ever played. From the moment you put on your wireless vest and heft your assault rifle you feel like you’re in a first person shooter. When you squeeze the trigger, the booming speaker and kicking vibration motor make a big impression on friends and foes alike.

THE GUN

  • Multiple weapon modes each with their own shot capacity, rate of fire, damage type, with unique shot spread and range
  • Rail-mounted holosight aligned with our proprietary emitter package
  • 115G vibration motor
  • Embedded Linux running on 800MHz ARM Cortex A8
  • OLED gun screen showing your ammo, shield level and health



THE VEST

  • Customized MOLLE tactical vest
  • Team colour and hit feedback LEDs
  • Multiple sensors for reliable hit detection
  • Three vibration motors
  • XBee wireless connection to the gun


LIVE SCOREBOARD AND PLAYER STATS

Just like a video game, everything you do from pulling the trigger to camping control points is tracked, recorded and analyzed in real time by the Battlegrounds game server. During the game, you can see how your scores, kills, assists and accuracy stack up to your allies’ and enemies’. Awards are handed out based on players’ individual play styles, including “Indecisive” for switching weapons too often and “Regicide” for racking up kills on the opposing point leader.

Spectators can watch live scores and field camera video feeds in the lounge, and detailed recaps after the game.


GAME MODES

Team Deathmatch, Free For All - Band together with your team or go it alone to take down your opponents and score the most points.

King of the Hill, Control Points - Work with your team to secure and hold one or more control points throughout the field.

Attack & Defend, Capture the Flag - Rush forward to steal the enemy’s flag and make it back in one piece while simultaneously protecting your own. Flag capture points are projected around the playing field. No more guessing at who has the blaze orange ribbon.

Juggernaut, Captains, VIP Protection - Supercharged shields and health, special weapons and the real life version of infuriating escort missions.

King of the Hill game at our beta facility


FUTURE DEVELOPMENT

What we’ve made so far is just the tip of the iceberg. Our goal is to be constantly expanding and refining the game. Deciding what to work on next is fun but also very challenging, and we want to hear from players about what they want to see in the game.

Here are a few of the features we have in the development pipeline:

Customizable weapons and player classes
Weapons and equipment can be digitally customized to create a huge range of different effects and play styles. Tweaks range from pure numerical buffs (increasing the magazine size of your SMG) to state-based debuffs (a shotgun that temporarily disables your opponent’s weapon) to customized sound sets (a suppressed sniper rifle). Custom class builds will make some awesome perks possible, like faster control point capture, stronger shields, or even stealing health from other players. The possibilities for weapon and class customization are enormous; as such, it will require a significant amount of testing and lots of engagement from players to ensure proper gameplay balance.

New physical gun models
At launch we will have one gun model, an assault rifle. We are planning models for shotguns, submachine guns and sniper rifles. New gun models can be purely ergonomic/aesthetic in nature or can unlock certain specific weapon effects such as high accuracy at long range or special shot spread physics. Emplaced weapons such as player-operated turrets are also planned.

Interactive, objective-based props
Hackable mainframes, defusable bombs, or destroyable ammo caches. This can also be extended to cameras or lights that can be shut down by firing or interacting with them. Props will be networked and can serve as central mission objectives in their respective game modes.

Campaign mode
Multi-stage campaigns where the results of one game carry forward into subsequent games. For example, if the first stage is an assault on an armoury, the winning team is granted access to laser shotguns in the next stage, and the losing side would play a base defence. This could also be extended to a branching campaign structure in which entirely different games are played depending on how the campaign unfolds.

Unlockable achievements
 We will be constantly analyzing cumulative stats from games and building out an achievements system. Correct balance (to make them challenging, fair and interesting) is crucial to ensure that an achievement actually means something, which will take many months worth of game data and player feedback. 

Laser grenades
We would be crazy NOT to make them.


BATTLEGROUNDS IN THE PRESS




PERKS

Game Session
With your purchase of a game session, you’ll be playing 5 games over the course of 90 minutes at our 10,000 sq. ft. playing field, located near Downsview Park and Yorkdale Mall in Toronto. At launch, we will support up to 20 simultaneous players, most games range between 5-15 minutes. All your equipment to play the game will be provided, but we strongly recommend wearing athletic clothing and running shoes. 

$5 - Play a Beta Game on Tue Dec 16 
With this perk we invite you and a friend to come out to see the hardware, talk with the team, and play one round at our beta test field! You and a +1.

Our beta testing field is in central Toronto, Dupont and Dovercourt, not far from Ossington station. We’ll be running beta games from 6 - 10:30 PM. If you choose this perk, we will contact you with details on how to get here.

Ticket holders must be 18 years or older, +1 can be under 18 if accompanied by a legal guardian. 

$10 - Supporter
As a supporter you will receive your name on the Battlegrounds Backer Wall, a high intensity thank you from the team, and a Founder Achievement to proudly display on your Battlegrounds profile.

$20 - Battlegrounds Beverage Glass
Enjoy a beverage of your choice in a classy Battlegrounds branded pint glass. Perfect for a wide variety of beverages including: water, beer, tea, wine, milk. Filling the glass is your responsibility. Shipping is extra OR you can pick it up at Battlegrounds Toronto facility in June. 

$30 - Battlegrounds T-Shirt
Show your support for Battlegrounds and have a stylish change of clothes after playing at the field. T-shirt available in Men’s & Women’s cut, in XS to XXL. Shipping is extra OR you can pick it up at the Battlegrounds Toronto facility in June. 

$39 - Advance Ticket
Get one individual ticket and be one of the first to battle your friends in our Toronto playing field. Advance Ticket is redeemable for a 5 game, 90 minute session. We also want to know what you loved, liked, and want from the game in the future so we’re going to be picking your brain after you play.

$175 - Fireteam 5-Pack
Get 5 individual tickets for you to battle it out with friends! Each ticket is redeemable for a 5 game, 90 minute session. We’ll make sure you and your friends are on the same team if you want or you can play against them if you want to take them down. 

$400 - 5v5 Player League Registration
Be the first to play in our 5v5 Competitive League for 4 weeks, culminating in a Battlegrounds tournament in the 5th week. The League will play every Tuesday starting the in 2nd month of operation and consist of 40 players across 8 teams. You’ll be playing team competitive game modes like Team Deathmatch, Control Points, and Capture the Flag, in a round-robin style competition.

$420 - Full Facility Private Booking
Get the entire facility for your group! Full Facility Private Booking is redeemable for a 5 game, 90 minute session. Each additional player beyond 12 will cost an extra $35. We recommend bringing between 16 and 20 to fully fill the playing field with action!

$2500 - Corporate Booking
Get the entire facility for your corporate party! Corporate Bookings will get a 3 hour session for up to 40 Players. Comes fully catered with optional bartender, and 4 Battlegrounds T-shirts. Perfect for team building exercises like “Marketing vs. Accounting” and “Ganging up on the Boss”.


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Our main challenge ahead is buildout of the facility. We’ve left a large buffer of time for renovations and move in but unfortunately construction delays could arise during that are out of our control. That being said, a worst case scenario is that launch be temporarily pushed back. 

From a technical standpoint, the core game is currently functional and everything we’re committed to at launch is incremental to what we’ve already completed. It’s possible that individual features may need to be scaled back, but we have a well-defined feature set we feel is achievable by launch. We will update everyone on our progress during and after the campaign, as well as after we launch.

For those backers whose situations have changed after the funding period, we will offer a full refund of their pledge or gametime voucher for future dates at the facility.


FAQs

What if I don't play video games?
That's no problem. Our system is easy to understand and the only advantage of being a gamer is familiarity with our game modes, design and concepts. Also, all new players will always be provided with an explanation of how the game and equipment works before they play.

What if I haven't played laser tag?
At its core, Battlegrounds is played like any kind of sport that is played on a field. Our game is all about running around and having fun, and even players who have no experience with either paintball or laser tag quickly pick up how to play!

Are the lasers safe?
Yes. We use infrared LEDs (similar to those in a TV remote) and infrared lasers, all powered below eye-safe levels.

What age do I need to be to play?
Anyone under 18 will require a legal guardian to sign their waiver. In order to play a public game you must be 14+. During a private booking anyone over the age of 8 can play with a legal guardian. This age restriction is to provide a safe game for all players of varying age.

Will there be another Battlegrounds facility in the future?
We can’t wait to open more playing fields, but for the foreseeable future we are focussing all of our time and effort on making our Toronto playing field excellent and ensuring that our game is the best it can be.

Does my ticket expire? Are there refunds?
Because this is a pre-sale for game time, the success of this campaign does not impact our plans to open our playing field. Any perks you purchase through Indiegogo will never expire. We will happily refund your purchase if for any reason you decide you do not - or cannot - claim your perk (gametime perks will be considered claimed when you start your scheduled game session).

What if you don't meet your goal? Will my game ticket still be honoured?
Absolutely. We’re excited to reach our goal to make the custom ID bands and run the backer tournament, but if we aren’t able to reach it, Indiegogo backers will still have the first opportunity to book game time at our field. The playing field will be opened regardless of the outcome of the campaign.

Can I book a company outing?
Absolutely! Our Corporate bookings are perfect for a company outing and if you have a special request let us know and we will see if we can accommodate you!

How do I qualify for the Battlegrounds Team Elimination Tournament for backers? 
When you as a backer come in to play, one of the game rounds you participate in will be a recorded qualifying match. Once a sufficient number of backers have played qualifying matches, we will invite the top players to a free tournament day (the exact format will depend on number of qualifying backers) for prizes and bragging rights.




BATTLEGROUNDS HARDWARE

Time-lapse of 3D-printed prototype gun part

Battlegrounds requires a complex orchestration of dozens of independent hardware devices, running tens of thousands of lines of code, operating perfectly in unison. A few of the necessary components include Atmel AVR microcontrollers for receiving and delivering player feedback, the Gumstix Overo, an ARM Cortex-A8-based Computer-on-Module comparable in processing power to a iPhone 4 running an embedded Linux distro, and Digi’s XBee lineup which allows for wireless communication.


Thank You

Battlegrounds would like to thank these people and companies for making the last 3 years possible!

Ubisoft Toronto, Microsoft Canada, Discovery Channel, Trend Hunter, The Toronto Star, FreshBooks, Myplanet, Vice Motherboard, Mysterious Package Company, The Artisan Factory.

Ultimaker, Ultimachine, SparkFun Electronics, Adafruit Industries, Precision Microdrives, Digi, Mouser, Arduino, Linux, Gumstix, Apple, Microsoft, Philips, Axis Gear.

Special Thank You - zero11zero Ltd., Byron Wong and Justin Lovell, Erin Marchak, Gareth Fowler, Vice Motherboard, Mini Maker Faire Toronto, Lucas Cochran and Daily Planet, Raju Mudhar, Lauren O’Neil, Marie Nicola, Dave Knox, our UPS Guy.

This entire project would not be possible if we had not collectively played way too much of: Battlefield, Halo, Team Fortress 2, Mass Effect, Payday, Counter-Strike, Rainbow Six.

And we would not be possible without Magic Oven, Bahn Mi Boys, Friendly Thai, Red Bull, Mill St. Brewery, Emma's Country Kitchen, Cookie Martinez, The Stockyards, Fat Bastard Burritos.
story_txt:
UPDATE: The campaign has wrapped up now and we are hard at work getting the new playing field ready. We'll be providing updates as we move ahead through Facebook and our Battlegrounds mailing list. The next few months will be an exciting time for the Battlegrounds team and we're very happy to be working towards this goal. Keep in touch, we always love hearing from our supporters and new voices alike.
Battle your friends across a dynamic and objective-based playing field, with multiple weapon types, intense force feedback and persistent stat tracking





PLAY THE NEXT GENERATION OF LASER TAG

Video games have evolved enormously over the last 20 years, but live gaming - paintball, laser tag and airsoft - has not. We love paintball and airsoft, and we love playing video games, but there was nothing out there that let us combine the physicality of sports with the interactive experiences we’ve come to expect from video games.
Battlegrounds is an advanced laser tag gaming platform and facility inspired by our love of video games. We’ve spent the last three years building a running, shooting, weapon-changing, shield-breaking, nemesis-making, flag-capturing real life video game. After hosting over 800 testers at our beta facility and Toronto Mini Maker Faire, we’re now ready to open our first playing field.
We're very excited to grow out of our beta test facility and into a full-size field, and are currently in lease negotiations to open a location near Downsview Park, close to the 401 and Yorkdale Mall.
As a backer on Indiegogo you will get first access to play the game and at our new field, meet the team and give us your feedback on what you think would make the game better. We've built an incredibly flexible gaming system and your ideas and input will help shape the future of this game.
If we reach our funding goal you will also get - in addition to any perks you’ve purchased - a Battlegrounds Player ID band unique to Indiegogo backers and you will get to compete in the first-ever Battlegrounds Team Elimination Tournament.
LASER TAG STRIPPED DOWN AND REBUILT FROM THE GROUND UP




Battlegrounds isn’t like any laser tag you’ve ever played. From the moment you put on your wireless vest and heft your assault rifle you feel like you’re in a first person shooter. When you squeeze the trigger, the booming speaker and kicking vibration motor make a big impression on friends and foes alike.
THE GUN


Multiple weapon modes each with their own shot capacity, rate of fire, damage type, with unique shot spread and range

Rail-mounted holosight aligned with our proprietary emitter package

115G vibration motor

Embedded Linux running on 800MHz ARM Cortex A8

OLED gun screen showing your ammo, shield level and health







THE VEST


Customized MOLLE tactical vest

Team colour and hit feedback LEDs

Multiple sensors for reliable hit detection

Three vibration motors

XBee wireless connection to the gun








LIVE SCOREBOARD AND PLAYER STATS
Just like a video game, everything you do from pulling the trigger to camping control points is tracked, recorded and analyzed in real time by the Battlegrounds game server. During the game, you can see how your scores, kills, assists and accuracy stack up to your allies’ and enemies’. Awards are handed out based on players’ individual play styles, including “Indecisive” for switching weapons too often and “Regicide” for racking up kills on the opposing point leader.
Spectators can watch live scores and field camera video feeds in the lounge, and detailed recaps after the game.





GAME MODES


Team Deathmatch, Free For All - Band together with your team or go it alone to take down your opponents and score the most points.
King of the Hill, Control Points - Work with your team to secure and hold one or more control points throughout the field.
Attack & Defend, Capture the Flag - Rush forward to steal the enemy’s flag and make it back in one piece while simultaneously protecting your own. Flag capture points are projected around the playing field. No more guessing at who has the blaze orange ribbon.
Juggernaut, Captains, VIP Protection - Supercharged shields and health, special weapons and the real life version of infuriating escort missions.


 King of the Hill game at our beta facility


FUTURE DEVELOPMENT
What we’ve made so far is just the tip of the iceberg. Our goal is to be constantly expanding and refining the game. Deciding what to work on next is fun but also very challenging, and we want to hear from players about what they want to see in the game.
Here are a few of the features we have in the development pipeline:
Customizable weapons and player classesWeapons and equipment can be digitally customized to create a huge range of different effects and play styles. Tweaks range from pure numerical buffs (increasing the magazine size of your SMG) to state-based debuffs (a shotgun that temporarily disables your opponent’s weapon) to customized sound sets (a suppressed sniper rifle). Custom class builds will make some awesome perks possible, like faster control point capture, stronger shields, or even stealing health from other players. The possibilities for weapon and class customization are enormous; as such, it will require a significant amount of testing and lots of engagement from players to ensure proper gameplay balance.
New physical gun modelsAt launch we will have one gun model, an assault rifle. We are planning models for shotguns, submachine guns and sniper rifles. New gun models can be purely ergonomic/aesthetic in nature or can unlock certain specific weapon effects such as high accuracy at long range or special shot spread physics. Emplaced weapons such as player-operated turrets are also planned.
Interactive, objective-based propsHackable mainframes, defusable bombs, or destroyable ammo caches. This can also be extended to cameras or lights that can be shut down by firing or interacting with them. Props will be networked and can serve as central mission objectives in their respective game modes.
Campaign modeMulti-stage campaigns where the results of one game carry forward into subsequent games. For example, if the first stage is an assault on an armoury, the winning team is granted access to laser shotguns in the next stage, and the losing side would play a base defence. This could also be extended to a branching campaign structure in which entirely different games are played depending on how the campaign unfolds.
Unlockable achievements We will be constantly analyzing cumulative stats from games and building out an achievements system. Correct balance (to make them challenging, fair and interesting) is crucial to ensure that an achievement actually means something, which will take many months worth of game data and player feedback. 
Laser grenadesWe would be crazy NOT to make them.

BATTLEGROUNDS IN THE PRESS




























PERKS

All your equipment to play the game will be provided, but we strongly recommend wearing athletic clothing and running shoes.

Ticket holders must be 18 years or older, +1 can be under 18 if accompanied by a legal guardian.

story:
Hi folks!


We are here to bring new level of understanding into your life, to bring a lot of unforgettable emotions and happiness to you and your beloved ones. You will become a part of unique project that will give an opportunity to make live of REAL animals all over the world much better, as well as to make live of lonely people and those who are not able to take care of pets and animals at home much better giving them such opportunity ONLINE...with REAL LIVE PETS, ANIMALS and EVEN PREDATORS!!!

The game will be educational, you can use it as a "TEST" for your kids that are asking to buy a pet, but you are not sure if they are ready to take care about new member of your family..."check" them using MyOnlinePets application :-) We will teach them to take care of pets responsibly!

GAME IDEA:


• New kind of «LIVE GAME» that fits ALL GENDERS AND GENERATIONS

• The game gives an opportunity for people take care of REAL LIVE ANIMALS without any inconvenience (cleaning, walking, etc.)

• Playing our game each person will fulfill its dream, each who dream of OWN pet, but can not afford it due to any reason (huge expenses, allergy, age, other family members, other pets, etc.)

• The game will be educational and participative - it will create new social links between people ALL OVER THE WORLD

• It will learn about history of FAUNA, ANIMAL ORIGIN & BEHAVIOR

• The game is also intended for kindergartens, orphanages, boarding schools - it will teach children to properly handle pets, nurture a sense of caring and kindness

• Players will be able to post pictures and videos of their pets, invite friends and create forums, share their impressions

• CHARITY – Players will be able to make donations for real live animals all over the world with only one click, all the information will be provided on our FB account and homepage (pictures, videos, amounts donated, reports on improvements done for exact animal, etc.). We will make video reports for Players showing improvement of pets live thanks to donations they have made. Players will receive Certificate confirming donations they made.

• The game can be played ONLINE ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD via internet, adapted to computers and smartphones, available in all major social networks

SHORT DESCRIPTION:


• Initial game levels will allow to take care of little pets:

- RABBITS

- HAMSTERS

- PORPOISES

- MOUSES

- PARROTS

- Thanks to our cooperation with zoos, circuses and other - soon Players will have an opportunity to buy other animals proposed by us. We will add EXOTIC ANIMALS: spiders, snakes, etc.

• In addition Players will have an opportunity TO ORDER ANY OTHER ANIMAL or EVEN PREDATOR they want to take care of!

• Players will have an opportunity to manage animal according to possible actions proposed by Developer (PART OF IT):


- SIMPLE OBSERVATION – daily life of the animal without special features;

- ANIMAL PLAY WITHOUT TOYS – special observations like jumps, somersaults, etc;

- PET BEHAVIOR WHEN USING DEVICES like holes, climbing frames, toys, etc;

- FEEDING – feeding using usual food OR favorite snacks of the pet;

- SLEEPING – quite watch of animal sleeping process;

- PLAYING WITH OTHER PETS - different behavior;

- MEDICAL EXAMINATION – check by real Veterinary for diseases or viruses;

- TREATMENT – injections, pills, vitamins, etc.

- ACTIONS OCCUR RANDOMLY FOR EACH PLAYER AND ARE NOT REPEATED!

• Player will have possibility to make special design of Pet’s flat and equipment


• Why you will always stay enthusiastic to play "MY ONLINE PETS"??? BECAUSE we will always make it more interesting FOR YOU by:

- Adding new levels (new kind of animals);

- We will create a lot of lotteries and gifts inside the game for you;

- We will create attractive and simple arcade games inside the game that will be interesting for all genders and generation;


- SPECIAL “BUTTON” will be created in the game. Players all over the world will be able to provide/describe their own ideas how to develop the game (new functions). In case if we will like the idea and will decide to implement it in the game (for charge) – the idea owner will receive 10% from downloads/payments received thanks to this new function. Can you imagine??? YOU will become the DEVELOPER!!!

- ALL animal will behave differently! Your pets and pets of your friends will never behave the same way. Pet behavior affects an accident, it depends on user's behavior!

WE CARE ABOUT OUR REAL LIVE ACTORS!!!

- We have signed agreement with veterinary who will inspect our pets 24/7;

- Each animal will have own passport for immunizations.

- Each "funny bunny" will not be recorded for more than 2 hours without break.

- 24/7 live of our pets will be available for you on our homepage, you will be able to check what they are doing while not taking a part in recording of new levels for you

• All information will be summarized on our homepage and FB account - not only to learn the latest developments in the game, but also to see «MY ONLINE PETS» project transparency of financial flows, application development and maintenance of game animals!

LET US INTRODUCE OUR SELF!!

Our project started in March 2014. Eva's kids asked her to buy rabbit and mouses for them...and like it USUALLY happens...EVA was the only who took care of them :-) The idea was to create kind of EDUCATIONAL application that will allow parents to prepare their kids care about pets responsibly. She shared this idea with Elena and together we have expanded it...we decided to make not only educational application, but also application for lonely people, for those who can't allow pet at home, we were generating new creative ideas each day making this Project interesting for everyone. Also, thanks to our Project we are going to help animals all over the world, to make they live better...LET'S GIVE THEM CHANCE TO BECOME HOLLYWOOD STARS :-) LET'S CARE MORE ABOUT THEM!!!

THESE ARE OUR HEAD AND TOP MEMBERS, we have also other important staff that help us to make MOP reality!
HELP US TO BRING MyOnlinePets TO IOS, ANDROID AND PC'S, YOU WILL HAVE A LOT OF FUN TOGETHER WITH OUR FUNNY AND INCREDIBLY ACROBATIC PETS ONLINE!!!

WHERE DO WE STAND???

IT'S ALMOST DONE! WE HAVE FINISHED THE PLATFORM, NEXT AND LAST STEP BEFORE LAUNCHING IS RECORDING OF PETS AND INTEGRATION OF VIDEO CONTENT. WE HAVE PERFORMED ALL NECESSARY TESTS 100% SUCCESSFULLY , IT'S WORKING!!! AS SOON AS WE WILL REACH OUR GOAL THANKS TO INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN - WE WILL NEED 4 MONTHS AT A MAXIMUM TO BRING THE GAME ON IOS, ANDROID AND PC FOR YOU!!!

WHAT WE ALREADY HAVE DONE:

It was a LONG LONG way till this most important moment...we want to share it with YOU, check out our FIRST REPORT to YOU :-)

- HOW WE MADE OUR IDEA POSSIBLE IN REALITY - 100% SUCCESSFUL TEST AND VIDEO RECORDING PERFORMED




- Creation of YOUTUBE video clip 1



- Creation of YOUTUBE video clip 2






HUGE THANKS TO OUR WONDERFUL YOUTUBE TEAM.
TEAM IS JUST A FANCY NAME FOR FAMILY AT WORK - THANK YOU ALL FOR BEING SUCH A CARING FAMILY!!!



UNFORTUNATELY HERE WE STOP...
...AND HERE WE NEED YOU TO FINISH AND LAUNCH THIS AMAZING THING!!!

Break down of BUDGET in more details:


OF COURSE WE HOPE THAT YOU ARE EXCITED ENOUGH TO HELP US, BUT IF NOT ALL OF YOU ... WE WILL NOT STOP HERE: 




- And, OF COURSE, regardless amount collected - we will make donations to animal shelters and zoos.


EVERY DONATION WILL HELP US!!!

Contribute today and receive our EXCLUSIVE rewards that are available ONLY to you, to those who are pledging during our IndieGoGo campaign, such rewards and gifts will never be available to general public. 

Every penny donated (after covering some of budget expenses - indiegogo fees, perks, etc.) will go forward the production of MyOnlinePets application and our future projects as well, such as social network for "Animal Lovers", huge donation network, new kinds of LIVE actors (not Animals) and more!!!

Check out on the right what you can get if you donate...

...You can get even MORE making only one donation!!! SHARE SHARE SHARE!!!

We have created challenging action for you during our IndieGoGo campaign:

"SHARE INFORMATION - GET YOUR FRIENDS INVOLVED!!!"

All you have to do is to share using "SHARE LINK" above..so your friends can check out our project and get in on the campaign making donations. The more people that get in on the campaign and made donation using YOUR link the BETTER your chances to get SPECIAL GIFTS.

TOP 3 by dollars raised (amount):

1st PLACE - YOU GET MOST EXCLUSIVE PERK - INVITATION TO OUR LAUNCH PARTY

2nd PLACE - ANY 3 PERKS PROPOSED BY US DURING INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN AT YOUR CHOICE

3rdPLACE - ANY 2 PERKS PROPOSED BY US DURING INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN AT YOUR CHOICE 

TOP 3 by total friends referred (quantity):

1st PLACE - YOU GET MOST EXCLUSIVE PERK - INVITATION TO OUR LAUNCH PARTY

2nd PLACE - ANY 3 PERKS PROPOSED BY US DURING INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN AT YOUR CHOICE

3rdPLACE - ANY 2 PERKS PROPOSED BY US DURING INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN AT YOUR CHOICE 


LET'S MAKE IT REALITY TOGETHER!!!
story_txt:
Hi folks!
We are here
to bring new level of understanding into your life, to bring a lot of
unforgettable emotions and happiness to you and your beloved ones. You will
become a part of unique project that will give an opportunity to make live of
REAL animals all over the world much better, as well as to make live of lonely
people and those who are not able to take care of pets and animals at home much
better giving them such opportunity ONLINE...with REAL LIVE PETS, ANIMALS and
EVEN PREDATORS!!!The game will be educational, you can use it as a "TEST" for your kids that are asking to buy a pet, but you are not sure if they are ready to take care about new member of your family..."check" them using MyOnlinePets application :-) We will teach them to take care of pets responsibly!
GAME IDEA:
• New kind
of «LIVE GAME» that fits ALL GENDERS AND GENERATIONS
• The game
gives an opportunity for people take care of REAL LIVE ANIMALS without any
inconvenience (cleaning, walking, etc.)
• Playing
our game each person will fulfill its dream, each who dream of OWN pet, but can
not afford it due to any reason (huge expenses, allergy, age, other
family members, other pets, etc.)
• The game
will be educational and participative - it will create new social links between
people ALL OVER THE WORLD
• It will
learn about history of FAUNA, ANIMAL ORIGIN & BEHAVIOR
• The game
is also intended for kindergartens, orphanages, boarding schools - it will
teach children to properly handle pets, nurture a sense of caring and kindness
• Players
will be able to post pictures and videos of their pets, invite friends and
create forums, share their impressions
• CHARITY –
Players will be able to make donations for real live animals all over the world
with only one click, all the information will be provided on our FB account and
homepage (pictures, videos, amounts donated, reports on improvements done
for exact animal, etc.). We will make video reports for Players
showing improvement of pets live thanks to donations they have made.
Players will receive Certificate confirming donations they made.
• The game
can be played ONLINE ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD via internet, adapted to computers
and smartphones, available in all major social networks
SHORT DESCRIPTION:
• Initial
game levels will allow to take care of little pets:
- RABBITS
- HAMSTERS
- PORPOISES
- MOUSES
- PARROTS
- Thanks to our cooperation with
zoos, circuses and other - soon Players will have an opportunity to buy other
animals proposed by us. We will add EXOTIC ANIMALS: spiders, snakes, etc.
• In
addition Players will have an opportunity TO ORDER ANY OTHER ANIMAL or EVEN
PREDATOR they want to take care of!
• Players
will have an opportunity to manage animal according to possible actions
proposed by Developer (PART OF IT):
- SIMPLE
OBSERVATION – daily life of the animal without special features;
- ANIMAL
PLAY WITHOUT TOYS – special observations like jumps, somersaults, etc;
- PET
BEHAVIOR WHEN USING DEVICES like holes, climbing frames, toys, etc;
- FEEDING –
feeding using usual food OR favorite snacks of the pet;
- SLEEPING –
quite watch of animal sleeping process;
- PLAYING
WITH OTHER PETS - different behavior;
- MEDICAL
EXAMINATION – check by real Veterinary for diseases or viruses;
- TREATMENT
– injections, pills, vitamins, etc.- ACTIONS OCCUR RANDOMLY FOR EACH PLAYER AND ARE NOT REPEATED!
• Player
will have possibility to make special design of Pet’s flat and equipment 
• Why you
will always stay enthusiastic to play "MY ONLINE PETS"??? BECAUSE we
will always make it more interesting FOR YOU by:
- Adding new
levels (new kind of animals);
- We will
create a lot of lotteries and gifts inside the game for you;
- We will
create attractive and simple arcade games inside the game that will be
interesting for all genders and generation;
- SPECIAL
“BUTTON” will be created in the game. Players all over the world will be able
to provide/describe their own ideas how to develop the game (new functions). In
case if we will like the idea and will decide to implement it in the game (for
charge) – the idea owner will receive 10% from downloads/payments received
thanks to this new function. Can you imagine??? YOU will become the
DEVELOPER!!! - ALL animal will behave differently! Your pets and pets of your friends will never behave the same way. Pet behavior affects an accident, it depends on user's behavior!
WE CARE ABOUT OUR REAL LIVE
ACTORS!!!
- We have
signed agreement with veterinary who will inspect our pets 24/7; 
- Each
animal will have own passport for immunizations.
- Each
"funny bunny" will not be recorded for more than 2 hours without
break.- 24/7 live of our pets will be available for you on our homepage, you will be able to check what they are doing while not taking a part in recording of new levels for you
• All
information will be summarized on our homepage and FB account - not only to
learn the latest developments in the game, but also to see «MY ONLINE PETS»
project transparency of financial flows, application development and
maintenance of game animals!LET US INTRODUCE OUR SELF!!Our project started in March 2014. Eva's kids asked her to buy rabbit and mouses for them...and like it USUALLY happens...EVA was the only who took care of them :-) The idea was to create kind of EDUCATIONAL application that will allow parents to prepare their kids care about pets responsibly. She shared this idea with Elena and together we have expanded it...we decided to make not only educational application, but also application for lonely people, for those who can't allow pet at home, we were generating new creative ideas each day making this Project interesting for everyone. Also, thanks to our Project we are going to help animals all over the world, to make they live better...LET'S GIVE THEM CHANCE TO BECOME HOLLYWOOD STARS :-) LET'S CARE MORE ABOUT THEM!!!THESE ARE OUR HEAD AND TOP MEMBERS, we have also other important staff that help us to make MOP reality!HELP US TO BRING MyOnlinePets TO IOS, ANDROID AND PC'S, YOU WILL HAVE A LOT OF FUN TOGETHER WITH OUR FUNNY AND INCREDIBLY ACROBATIC PETS ONLINE!!!WHERE DO WE STAND???IT'S ALMOST DONE! WE HAVE FINISHED THE PLATFORM, NEXT AND LAST STEP BEFORE LAUNCHING IS RECORDING OF PETS AND INTEGRATION OF VIDEO CONTENT. WE HAVE PERFORMED ALL NECESSARY TESTS 100% SUCCESSFULLY , IT'S WORKING!!! AS SOON AS WE WILL REACH OUR GOAL THANKS TO INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN - WE WILL NEED 4 MONTHS AT A MAXIMUM TO BRING THE GAME ON IOS, ANDROID AND PC FOR YOU!!!WHAT WE
ALREADY HAVE DONE:
It was a LONG LONG way till this most
important moment...we want to share it with YOU, check out our FIRST REPORT to
YOU :-)

- HOW WE MADE OUR IDEA POSSIBLE IN REALITY - 100% SUCCESSFUL TEST AND VIDEO
RECORDING PERFORMED
- Creation of YOUTUBE video clip 1- Creation
of YOUTUBE video clip 2



HUGE THANKS TO OUR WONDERFUL YOUTUBE TEAM. 
TEAM IS JUST A FANCY NAME FOR FAMILY AT WORK - THANK YOU ALL FOR BEING SUCH A
CARING FAMILY!!! 


UNFORTUNATELY HERE WE STOP...
...AND HERE WE NEED YOU TO FINISH AND LAUNCH THIS AMAZING THING!!!

Break down of BUDGET in more details:OF COURSE WE
HOPE THAT YOU ARE EXCITED ENOUGH TO HELP US, BUT IF NOT ALL OF YOU ... WE WILL
NOT STOP HERE: 


- And, OF COURSE, regardless amount collected - we will make donations to
animal shelters and zoos.EVERY DONATION WILL HELP US!!! Contribute today and receive our EXCLUSIVE rewards that are available ONLY to you, to those who are pledging during our IndieGoGo campaign, such rewards and gifts will never be available to general public. Every penny donated (after covering some of budget expenses - indiegogo fees, perks, etc.) will go forward the production of MyOnlinePets application and our future projects as well, such as social network for "Animal Lovers", huge donation network, new kinds of LIVE actors (not Animals) and more!!!Check out on the right what you can get if you donate......You can get even MORE making only one donation!!! SHARE SHARE SHARE!!!We have created challenging action for you during our IndieGoGo campaign:"SHARE INFORMATION - GET YOUR FRIENDS INVOLVED!!!"All you have to do is to share using "SHARE LINK" above..so your friends can check out our project and get in on the campaign making donations. The more people that get in on the campaign and made donation using YOUR link the BETTER your chances to get SPECIAL GIFTS.TOP 3 by dollars raised (amount):1st PLACE - YOU GET MOST EXCLUSIVE PERK - INVITATION TO OUR LAUNCH PARTY2nd PLACE - ANY 3 PERKS PROPOSED BY US DURING INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN AT YOUR CHOICE 3rdPLACE - ANY 2 PERKS PROPOSED BY US DURING INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN AT YOUR CHOICE TOP 3 by total friends referred (quantity):1st PLACE - YOU GET MOST EXCLUSIVE PERK - INVITATION TO OUR LAUNCH PARTY2nd PLACE - ANY 3 PERKS PROPOSED BY US DURING INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN AT YOUR CHOICE 3rdPLACE - ANY 2 PERKS PROPOSED BY US DURING INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN AT YOUR CHOICE LET'S MAKE IT REALITY TOGETHER!!!

story:
If you've made it to this page, chances our you've already played the original Combine game online, or on the iPhone or iPod! If you have, I'm sure you'll agree with me that this game is CRAZY ADDICTING!

If you don't know it yet, check out the current iPhone version:

http://itunes.apple.com/app/combine/id367428879

Or play it online:

http://www.smileygamer.com/play/8882/combine-ultra.html

To learn more about the game, also check out the facebook fan page:

https://www.facebook.com/CombineGame

What We Need & What You Get

People have been asking for an Android version of this game since like forever, as well as the Daily Challenge tournament which is in the online Ultra version. Unfortunately, to get these functionalities to mobile, the game has to be rewritten from scratch. I don't have the budget for that, so this is where you can help!

I have lots of great ideas and plans to improve and extend the game! How far I get along, and how fast I can do this, will depend on YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS! Here's what I have in mind:

  • Support for iPad and brand new retina display graphics!
  • Port the game to Android!
  • Multiplayer support (GameCenter), challenge your friends to play the exact same game as you!
  • Tournaments, similar to the Daily Challenge from the online version!
  • Power-ups and gameplay variations!
The image above has the current iPhone version of the game on the left, and a mockup of a possible improved version on the right. It's just a teaser, but updates will be posted here as the project goes along.

The money I collect here will be used to compensate me for my time, and possibly hire a programmer and an artist (depending on the amount of contributions).

Even when the goal is not reached, your contribution will help me along. I will still be working on this project, although it could take a bit longer to finish then...

Share The Addiction

Even if you can't contribute, be sure to check out the game using the links above, and tell your friends to play along!

Please use the Indiegogo share tools as well!

story:
Kampanja ohi! Kiitos kaikille osallistujille! Roolipeli julkaistaan kesällä 2013. Seuratkaa projektin etenemistä blogista tai Facebookista.

Blogi: http://myrskynsankarit.wordpress.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyrskynSankarit

*

Roleplaying for kids

Myrskyn sankarit ("Heroes of Storm") is an entry-level tabletop roleplaying game for kids. Nothing like this has been available in Finnish for a generation, so it's up to us to remedy the situation.

Myrskyn sankarit is a fantasy adventure for kids 9-13 years old. The story is about a group of brave rebels who live in the forest and fight against an evil witch emperor, in the vein of Robin Hood, Star Wars and Knights of the Round Table. And yes, it will have lots of strong female characters, as well!

For more info in English, including the Perks and the possible translations, see the Updates page. (Or just choose the Khaleesi Daenerys Targaryen perk targeted for non-Finns!)

Mistä on kyse

Myrskyn sankarit on 9-13-vuotiaille suunnattu aloittelijaystävällinen suomenkielinen seikkailuroolipeli. Se sijoittuu kutakuinkin samaan maailmaan kuin Myrskyn aika ja kertoo seikkailijoita, jotka haluavat palauttaa oikean kuninkaan Nathariin. He etsivät muinaisen kaupungin raunioita, kohtaavat hirviöitä ja keisarin sotajoukkoja, piiloutuvat ja juoksevat, loitsivat ja taistelevat.

Inspiraation lähteinä ovat ainakin Robin Hood, Kuningas Arthurin tarinat, Narnia, Tähtien sota ja Hiidenpata.

Mitä tarvitaan

Jos minimibudjetti 10 000 € ($12500) ei tule täyteen, projekti hautautuu ja kukaan ei menetä mitään.
Jos kymppitonni tulee täyteen, pelistä tehdään tuhannen kappaleen painos, ja kaikki yli 20€ maksaneet saavat oman painetun kappaleensa. (Kaikki maksajat saavat kirjat myös PDF-versioina.) Pelilaatikossa on hienosti kuvitetut sääntökirjat sekä nopat.

Miksi nyt

Olen varmaan kymmenen vuotta haaveillut tällaisesta projektista ja kun sain Kultainen lohikäärme -elämäntyöpalkinnon Ropeconissa kaksi vuotta sitten, lupasin tehdä tämän. Nyt aika on kypsä.

  • Uusi sukupolvi ansaitsee mahtavia kokemuksia roolipelien parissa.
  • Olen tehnyt kolme roolipeliä (Myrskyn aika, Star Wreck Roleplaying Game ja Tähti), kymmeniä larppeja, kaksi romaania (Kadonneet kyyneleet ja Ihmisen poika), teatteria, sirkusta, lyhytelokuvia, sekä käsikirjoittanut erilaisia interaktiivisia tarinoita. Uskon, että olen oikea mies tekemään tämän projektin, toivottavasti myös myymään sen kauppaketjujen sisäänostajille.
  • Tämä on varmaankin ensimmäinen projektini, josta kaikki välittömästi innostuvat, kun kerron siitä. Siksi uskon, että voimme yhdessä saada tämän tehtyä.

Muita tapoja auttaa

Emme tarvitse vain rahaa, vaan voit auttaa myös muilla keinoin!

  • Kerro kaikille! Jaa tätä sivua Facebookissa, Twitterissä, Google+:ssa, blogissasi, joka puolella!
  • Liity mukaan tiimiin! Tarvitsemme pelitestaajia, oikolukijoita
  • Oletko kuvittaja? Ota yhteyttä, niin pääset mukaan jengiin!
  • Kerro pelistä tutulle pelikaupalle, koululle, nuorisotalolle, kirjakaupalle, kirjastolle, tavaratalolle tai vaikka huoltoasemalle ja kehota heitä tilaamaan oma kappaleensa.

Mailaa ja ehdota, miten tätä kampanjaa voisi parantaa!

Eduista (eli perkeistä)

Etulaatikot ovat kovin pieniä, joten tässä joistain eduista tarkempaa tietoa:

Kirjastoille tarkoitettu Belle-etu sisältää mainosten, neljän pelin ja julisteen, sekä 50 flaierin lisäksi myös kaksi kirjailijavierailua. Ensimmäinen vierailu on luento yleisesti roolipeleistä, kohdeyleisönä sekä potentiaaliset nuoret pelaajat että myös vanhemmat, opettajat ja kirjastoväki. Jälkimmäisessä vierailussa pelautan yhden session Myrskyn sankareita. Sessio kestää arviolta neljä tuntia, mutta tietysti käytännössä ii pitkään että se saadaan loppuun asti.

Postikuluista

Postikulut on nyt ilmaistu euroissa, mutta maksu tapahtuu dollareissa. Kun joidenkin Perkkien kohdalla lukee "Kotimaan postitusta varten lisää viisi euroa hintaan, seitsemän Eurooppaan ja kymmenen muualle", se tarkoittaa siis "Kotimaan postitusta varten lisää seitsemän dollaria hintaan, yhdeksän Eurooppaan ja kolmetoista muualle."
