Sorry Dion doesn't have the artwork available as of yet...


Obviously, The Gaming Gang Guide to Great Game Mastering PDF (yes the title was conceived firmly tongue-in-cheek) is simply my thoughts on making any roleplaying game a memorable experience for the players in your own gaming gang and I’m sure plenty of folks won’t agree with my personal gaming style I’ve maintained over thirty years of running RPGs – GMs who simply grab some dice without any sort of gameplan in mind, and believe they craft memorable experiences, will probably despise how I run a game. Yet, I believe there are some tips which can be utilized by GMs (regardless of their experience) to ratchet up the excitement level of their games as well as provide sessions your players will remember years from now and look back on fond memories of hours of fun with their pals.
Of course I’m not an author nor was I looking to put together some vast treatise on the state of role playing in the 21st Century but just wanted to share some thoughts on how I normally put together games in which a lot of people seemed to enjoy.
The PDF and audio book are presented as a bundle.


Get your copy of a limited edition mini-poster of the cover artwork for Victory Point Games'Dawn of the Zeds autographed by our good buddy, the title's designer Hermann Luttmann! And if you haven't played the game already, shame on you. It rocks!

Knights and Magick from long defunct Heritage USA. There was just something about the rules which were easy enough yet had extra flavor to the make battles unique and interesting.
Now I’m happy to say you can get your hands on the complete classic rule set from TGG! Although we’re talking about the original edition of K&M, the digital PDFs are bookmarked and completely searchable, making them perfect to bring along on the go with a laptop or tablet. Of course, you can put them on your phone too but I think you’d have some issues with the screen size… Higher level pledges are for the soft cover and hard cover editions.
This 197 page rules set hasn't seen the light of day since it was originally published in 1980 and we're actually working on an updated and streamlined edition of K&M for release in late 2013 - early 2014! You'll also receive all the Soldato rewards too.


Your choice of a TGG Badge Wallet or Custom Dice Bag! 
If you're a convention goer then you know sometimes those badges you get can be pretty flimsy, especially it you just pin it to your shirt, and  easily get lost. Show you're a veteran of the con scene - as well as a supporter of TGG - with your very own badge wallet! Plus, you can keep your valuables safe around your neck too! These badge wallets will only be available through this project.
Gamers love their dice bags as there's nothing worse than digging through your pockets for your tried and true lucky D20. Keep all your loaded *ahem* dependable dice on hand and easily accessable with out custom Dice Bag! As will all our custom accessories, this is only available through our project and will never be produced again.
Youll get your choice and receive the Soldato rewards as well.



Nature of the Beast Special. A strategy card game which really deserves a lot more coverage is Eye Level Entertainment's Nature of the Beast and we're able to provide you with the latest boxed edition: Prairie vs Polar signed by Eye-Level's very own Mark Anticole for a $40 pledge. You'll even receive the hard to find 24 card bonus pack which was only available to PvsP Kickstarter backers!
You can check out the video of what's in the box as well as our review. I have to say if you haven't checked out Nature of the Beast you really need to give it a try!
Nature of the Beast is a non-collectible card game. That means no need to buy booster packs. We give you all the cards. No rarities. Just a sweet self-contained game for two people (or four if you buy another box).
Race to fill your playing field by shifting your animals around. Animals’ movement is governed by differing combinations of arrows on each card, so as you play the puzzle changes!
Winning means playing smart to fill your field, not playing ‘whack-a-mole’ against your opponent. With each attack, you risk driving your army into the sinister region of ‘Dark Nature’. While an easy path to more power, this can lead to the destruction of your army if allowed to go too far!
The ONLY game where a hamster can take out her opponent’s playground with a gasoline can!  Nature of the Beast is a serious strategy game that you can actually get a couple chuckles from while playing and it won’t cost you a fortune to play.
This special reward also includes the Soldato rewards as well!


At the $40 dollar level get your choice of a TGG T-Shirt or Baseball cap. At $55 you get both! These accessories will be produced for this Indiegogo project only. Once we get near the completion of the project we'll send out the color options available for all our custom accessories.
Of course, the Soldato rewards are included too.



Ghosts of Dragonspear Castle Gen Con Special! Limited to 20 backers. The Wizards of the Coast D&D Next preview will be available at Gen Con 2013 as an exclusive con item and will be found nowhere else. That is unless you decide to back our project for $45! 
Ghosts of Dragonspear Castle is a D&D Next preview and mini-campaign comprised of four thrilling adventures designed to advance characters from 1st level to 10th level. The book also contains everything a Dungeon Master needs to run the adventures, including D&D Next game rules developed during the massive public playtest, monster statistics, spell descriptions, magic item descriptions, and background information on the coastal town of Daggerford, where the campaign is based.
If you can't make it to the show, we'll get you a copy (as well as the exclusive Gale Force 9 mini) and ship it directly from Indianapolis. Don't let this opportunity pass you by! This pledge is only available to backers in the U.S. and also includes the Soldato level of rewards as well.


World of Darkness Pack. A limited number of specials are available for the World of Darkness Pack! Only 20 available at a $45 pledge. Receive the PDFs of two of the latestWhite Wolf releases (Mummy: The Curse and Werewolf: The Apocalypse 20th Anniversary Edition) for less than you'd pay to purchase them online!
Mummy: The Curse
Imagine being both dead and deathless at the same time. Imagine being cradled in the arms of death for years, sometimes decades on end, but all the while knowing that you will eventually not only arise again, but awaken to an unfamiliar world that mostly fears and hates you. Now imagine that your purpose, your entire existence, is bound within this cycle -- that you are chained to it for all eternity. You sleep, you wake, your serve your Judge's will in the lands of the living, and you return to the death-sleep once more. The ancient culture that empowered you is gone, lost to the sands of time... yet you endure.In Mummy: The Curse, a Storytelling game set in the World of Darkness, you play one of these beings. Those who know they exist, from the cultists who serve them to the dark forces arrayed against them, call them the Deathless.We call them mummies.
Werewolf: The Apocalypse 20th Anniversary Edition
Werewolf the Apocalypse roared into hobby games in 1992, inspiring a generation of fans to stand up and howl their defiance at a corrupted world in a battle they knew they were doomed to lose. WtA presented the Garou: creatures at once both man and wolf, and filled with a Rage against the evils that would destroy and corrupt both the natural and spirit worlds. Capable of transforming into a variety of forms and blessed with Gifts that enabled superhuman and supernatural powers, the Garou fought many foes, always knowing that in the end they would fall. But what stories would be told and what songs sang of their exploits!
This epic tragic story, combined with the unwavering dedication of an unparalleled fan base, is the reason this book is being published. Werewolf: The Apocalypse – 20th Anniversary Edition brings the entire World of Darkness experience full circle and will serve as the perfect anniversary milestone to celebrate two decades of gaming the epic sagas of the Garou.
The World of Darkness Pack reward also includes everything in the Soldato level as well.


This is limited to ten backers as TGG's very own master of the graphic arts, Dion Long, will provide you with a custom character sketch for a $60 pledge. Just provide a brief description of the character, and a photo if you'd like it to resemble yourself, and you'll receive the digital image emailed directly to you! You don't even have to be a roleplayer to enjoy your very own one-of-a-kind 8" by 10" piece of artwork. Plus all the Caporegime goodies!


If you'd really like to show your support of TGG, you can score all of our custom designed accessories (T-Shirt, Badge Wallet, Baseball Cap, and Dice Bag at the $70 level of backing plus receive everything at the Soldato level as well!

Dawn of the Zeds Reward. Limited to ten backers is our Dawn of the Zeds 2nd Edition the $75 Pledge Level with includes the Soldato rewards, a convention badge wallet or dice bag, as well as a copy of my Game of the Year for 2011 in all it's newly updated boxed glory. 
You can see what's in the box with this video and check out the review of Victory Point Games' original edition here!
Arising once again from the grave, from designer Hermann Luttmann and lavishly illustrated by Vinh Ha, arises Dawn of the Zeds Second Edition as you've never seen it before. In this States of Siege solitaire game of horror and survival, your strategies will be put to the test. The world has gone crazy – a deadly virus has turned ordinary people into vicious, zombie-like killers. The undead, nicknamed "Zeds," are now converging on your corner of the world. You have been left to your own devices to stop them while the National Guard organizes a relief column and fights its way to you – but that could take days, or even weeks, before they arrive.
At the town of Farmingdale and its surrounding villages, you must coordinate its defenses. Regular citizens may emerge as heroes as you work to halt the Zeds' advances by (re)killing them, discovering and implementing a cure to this vile scourge, and preserving the area and its inhabitants as much as possible. In addition to this madness, the crazy Doctor Marteuse has been working in the underground tunnels and unleashing his uber-deadly Super Zeds, a nasty bunch of beasts that give havoc a whole new name. Bring him to justice, destroy the infectious Zeds, and save your city from peril!
In a game that requires the utmost test of skill and nerve, will you survive long enough? Will you be able to fight hordes of Zeds while protecting the townspeople? Test your heroics and unearth Dawn of the Zeds, a game that will keep you on your toes!


Frontline General: Spearpoint 1943 Special. This includes everything from the TGG Caporegime reward as well a a special Frontline General: Spearpoint 1943 bundle provided by Collins Epic Wargames. You'll receive both the Spearpoint 1943 Western Front core game as well as the Origins 2013 nominated map expansion!
You can check our or review of the core game here and video of what's in the expansion box here!
Frontline General: Spearpoint 1943 is a fast-paced two-player tactical card wargame set in WWII. Spearpoint focuses on WWII frontline combat, chaos, tension, and fun. 100 Unit Cards feature an assortment of historical German and US squad level infantry, artillery, armor, and aircraft. 50 Command Cards give support and intel to players. 25 Damage Cards apply unique Damage Effects if a unit becomes damaged. Combat is quick and tense and resolves using four included D10 dice. Standard and Situation games play in about 30 minutes including setup.
This also includes the Soldato rewards as well.


(Limited to Sponsors Only) Advertise on The Gaming Gang for a month at a lower rate than usual. You can chose your ad space area and even include multiple ads in rotation. Two sponsor spaces per month (July, August, and September) are available on a first come/first serve basis. This level does not include any rewards other than sponsorship and inclusion in a special section of the Founding Gang Members Roll Call.


Become a TGG Underboss - Everything from the Flag Bearer level and the opportunity to "Hang with the Gang!" Heading to one of the shows we're planning to cover? Then set aside an evening during the show to enjoy dinner and drinks with the team. Plenty of laughs are in store for a memorable experience and, if you're a gamer, plan on kicking it over a game or two. This reward is limited to two individuals per show. Once again this is on a first come basis so please check the updates as to what cons are still available. As we unlock coverage for more shows (fingers crossed on that) we'll make more evenings of "hanging with the gang" available for those cons. We'll pick up the tab for dinner and up to a $30 bar tab.


Become a TGG Capo Bastone - Exclusively for miniature gamers, have up to twenty 28mm-32mm miniatures of any genre not only professionally painted to tabletop quality but also featured in The Gaming Gang's A Regular Joe's Guide to Miniature Painting series of videos. Jeff will take viewers starting from the process of prepping the miniatures all the way through basing and protecting your finished figures. Please note this includes the shipping of the miniatures (as well as insurance) both to and from Jeff and is only open to supporters located in the U.S. Due to the nature of this reward you must allow 90-120 days from receipt of the unpainted miniatures to the return of the completed painted figures. Also miniatures to be painted to particular gaming title specs (i.e. WH40k or Flames of War) reference materials and exact paints must be included in original shipment. All other figures which are open to creative interpretation only need to have guideline images forwarded either in the shipment or through email. Also includes everything from the Flag Bearer level of rewards.


Be the Capo Di Tutti Capi of The Gaming Gang! Limited to a single event, three of us will travel anywhere in the U.S. to spend a day of gaming with yourself, your friends and family. We'll shoot video of the experience and give you plenty of camera time to share your collection, favorite games and just about anything within reason. A custom one of a kind DVD will be created for your personal collection as well. If you'd like we'll even bring the games and grub - how would you like to play games months before they're available on store shelves? You'll even get to keep the games!
We'll take care of the travel, hotel, and rental car; all you need to do is be ready to have an awesome time! This also includes all rewards up to the Standard Bearer level, you choice of two of our game rewards, as well as plenty of extra goodies to make the experience well worth your while! Please keep in mind due to the convention season your custom day of gaming will need to be scheduled after August 31st, 2013 and may not conflict with any scheduled convention we're attending in force.

That may be what you're wondering but due to the time constraints to get the project up and running, so it doesn't end right in the middle of this summer's convention season, we were a wee bit pressed for time to get started. 

Wizard World Chicago - August 8-11, 2013 in Rosemont, IL
Pax Prime - Aug 30-Sep 2, 2013 in Seattle, WA
BoardGameGeek Con - November 20-24, 2013 in Dallas/Fort Worth, TX
 

 

Dragon*Con - August 30-September 2, 2013 in Atlanta, GA
Las Vegas Comic Expo - September 28-29, 2013 in Las Vegas, NV
New York Comic Con - October 10-13, 2013 in New York City, NY
GeekGirlCon - October 19-20, 2013 in Seattle, WA

Yes, this is the big one where we'd actually leave the good ol' U.S. of A. and make our way to Essen, Germany for Die Internationalen Spieltage taking place October 24 (my birthday dontcha know) - 27, 2013!

Of course not! You’ll see plenty of coverage of other events much closer to our homes throughout the convention season. We’re always on the lookout to bring our audience lots of goodness from shows of all sizes! The more successful this project is the larger our "war chest' will be to finance travel. 
All we’re doing is letting folks know if we hit certain levels of funding they can look forward to seeing video, hearing audio, and reading coverage of the specific events we’re already listing. These are by no means are the only shows we’ll tackle!

Feel free to contact Jeff with any questions you may have or post them here as we'll look to follow up ASAP!

story:
Hello.
We are four young guys working on an app for the online multiplayer game League of Legends. We live in Denmark and study and have part time jobs on the side.
We have been playing the game for quite some time now, and we believe we can create a revolutionary app to help players more easily keep themselves updated on the pro scene and tournaments in the game.

The pro E-sports scene is greatly evolving, and constantly drawing more viewers. League of Legends, being the most played online game at the moment, has created a demand for following the live tournaments as closely as possible and many millions do so. 


A quick summary of what our app will offer:

-  keep yourself updated more easily on the pro scene and tournaments in the game.

-   watch your favorite team take the victory, even if you need to be somewhere else

- view the most game relevant statistics updated live


We wish to make it easier to follow the tournaments, and to make it possible to do so without being stationed in front of your computer screen. We will, as I mentioned just above, much like the "LiveScore" app does for football, hockey, soccer etc, make it possible to view the most gamerelevant statistics updated live from the game. 

With some funding, we hope to achieve our goals faster and make our end product as perfect as we possibly can. We need to raise money for app-development, traveling cross country, meetings and such. 

We most certainly believe that we have a market for this app, and with help from you we can get there. We want to improve the accessibility to follow the tournaments, and make it possible for you to watch your favorite team take victory, even if you need to be somewhere else.

We are hard working, motivated people, and we wish, more than anything to see this succeed. We hope you take interest in our work, and want to contribute, if so, donating goes a long way, but we would also be very grateful for any kind of constructive criticism and tips. Also if you wish to know more we are happy to provide more information!
 

Thank you. 

The LeagueLive team.

story:
Myk's New Channel. I'm Myk. I'm on YouTube.

I started this campaign back in July. The goal was hit. Here is what I have to say about that. 

THE GOAL HAS BEEN HIT!  100%

Let's see if we can keep this going. 
I'm noticing a few other things I'll need just to make things easier. If no one else wants to contribute and you're done with me talking about this. It is 100% ok because we have hit 100% It's been an amazing thing seeing what the internet has done. Everyone who has contributed will be getting all the update videos. All the footage before it's made public until the actual launch of the new channel. It's been amazing seeing that 0 go to a 100% Thank you everyone.
After plugging in an running some tests for this channel, there are a few things I can see that I'll need down the line. BUT. This isn't anything I'm pushing really hard to get and I'm completely happy with every donation I've received. If you are seeing this and feel like contributing, that would be amazing. If not, that is perfectly fine too!
Down below is what has been fully funded that I needed originally, check it out! 
What I need to help develop this idea!

Here are the details of EVERYTHING to help get this awesome new channel going. 

  • The elgato (yes, like the cat) game capture HD. This device runs at  $179.95. 
  • DONE
  • The Blue Yeti Microphone.  The Blue Yeti microphone with the pop filter is $200.00 on some sites and $250.00 on others. 
  • DONE
  • A new Xbox360 controller. You know what they look like. No need for a picture. They range from $50.00 - $70.00. 
  • DONE
  • I will be capturing LOTS of footage. Western Digital 1TB external hard-drive would be perfect! $69.99
  • DONE
  • The game MINECRAFT. The game now runs around $20.00
  • DONE
  EVERYTHING has been reached and I've sought out to get everything at the lowest possible prices. I've searched, Target, Best Buy, Amazing, New Egg,  Local shops, and so on. I've got the best deals I could find on everything.
However. Let's do some stretch goals. A stretch goal is something to reach from beyond being fully funded. Like I said above, there are things I've noticed that I'll need down the line. If I got them now, that'd be awesome. If not, I can wait. I'm in no way trying to ask for more. BUT. I've realized my Xbox Live has ran out. I need a Mic stand for the microphone. Also, a small TV would mean I can set up in my office and really step up isolation of sound. But for now. I can do without these things. I would feel amazingly spoiled if the goal surpassed 100%. 
Love you guys. THANK YOU VERY MUCH! 

The Perks:

 They are the best that I can do to my ability at the moment. Some involve using my already established YouTube channel towards your benefit and some will utilize the new YouTube channel if we hit this goal! Also, double check the perks. You really think I'd just name this thing Myk's Gaming Channel? Meh, that's lame. Hope you find a perk you'd like to contribute to!


The Impact this campaign will have to me HAS HAD ON ME: 

The internet is an awesome thing. Thank you all 17 people who have contributed to the campaign. It's been amazing watching the percentage go from 0 - 100%! The game channel is fully funded and I am able to get all the basic things I'll need to get it started. Thank you everyone. I feel very lucky indeed. I really don't know the right words to say besides thank you! 

For the last two years on YouTube my wife and I have gone from an engaged couple, to planning a wedding, moving, gaining new jobs, getting married, enduring unemployment for a long period of time, feeling the lowest of lows, and experiencing complete excitement and happiness. It's all on our YouTube channel for the world to see. I'm really passionate about film and art. This would just an amazing dream to come true. 

  • I feel I've done my best to entertain people and provide life lessons on our channel. Show people even at the crappiest of times, there is good.
  • Creating this new channel on YouTube would help get my creative side working a lot more than I get to use it now. 
  • Hitting this campaigns goal would give me a chance to entertain people and have engaging content that people would come back to over and over again. 
  • It would create a YouTube channel full of videos for people to watch and laugh after a long day at work. 
  • I feel confident enough that even people who dislike video games would watch because of me just being me. 
  • Check out our Daily Video channel if you would like to look more into us and see who we are as people. https://www.youtube.com/user/MykAndAndie

It's OK if you are unable to help.

Some people just can't contribute, but that is perfectly ok!

  • Please share this campaigns URL with friends and family. 
  • Check out our Daily Video channel if you would like to look more into us and who we are as people. https://www.youtube.com/user/MykAndAndie
  • Click all those easy to share buttons on this page to help spread the word of this project!

And that's all there is to it.

It's all on our YouTube channel for the world to see. I'm really passionate about film and art. This would just an amazing dream to come true.  
I feel I've done my best to entertain people and provide life lessons on our channel. Show people even at the crappiest of times, there is good. Creating this new channel on YouTube would help get my creative side working a lot more than I get to use it now.  Hitting this campaigns goal would give me a chance to entertain people and have engaging content that people would come back to over and over again. 
It would create a YouTube channel full of videos for people to watch and laugh after a long day at work. 
I feel confident enough that even people who dislike video games would watch because of me just being me. 


Check out our Daily Video channel if you would like to look more into us and see who we are as people. https://www.youtube.com/user/MykAndAndie


It's OK if you are unable to help. Some people just can't contribute, but that is perfectly ok! 
Please share this campaigns URL with friends and family. 
Check out our Daily Video channel if you would like to look more into us and who we are as people. https://www.youtube.com/user/MykAndAndie
 Click all those easy to share buttons on this page to help spread the word of this project! 
 And that's all there is to it.

story:
What are Video Game Comics? How do they encourage kids to read?

Finally a comic that rewards kids for the more they read, by giving them achievement points they can cash in to get discounts, to free prizes, such as merchandise and other video game comics!

And encourages them to read more with fun interactive video games within the digital comic, which changes the outcome of the story. Giving each issue multiple outcomes, adding value to comic, being able to read the comic more than once and getting more out of the story. Similar to a choose your own adventure book, but it's your performance that changes the story. Kids can have experiences unique to them and share their different comic experience with their friends who are also reading The Adventures of Shadow Cat.

The Adventures of Shadow Cat Video Game Comics series is ideal for both home use and designated computer time for students at schools.

The Adventures of Shadow Cat is a kid safe comic, but with interesting story lines that teens and adults can enjoy as well. The Adventures of Shadow Cat and the concept of Video Game Comics received a great reception at this year's Wizard World Chicago Comic Con from kids, parents, and teachers. We even had a Disney representative come up to us liking the idea.

Shadow Cat versions of Video Game Comics can also test reading comprehension, by the optional comprehension quiz at the end of each comic. Kids also get achievement points based on how they do on this quiz.

Parents frustrated that they're kids aren't reading enough and playing too many video games, and kids that don't want to read and would rather play video games, now have a happy medium!

 

About The Adventures of Shadow Cat series

Shadow Cat is a kid safe comic about a household cat turned super hero. The  series has action, comedy, scientific & historical facts, and tries to teach moral lessons. We also keep the storylines interesting for teens and adults as well.

Here's a Youtube link to our video for more information on the story about the three Shadow Cat series we want to develop.

Click here for the video about the Shadow Cat series

 

What you receive for helping fund our project

We have many rewards to choose from. Some of our favorite rewards range from getting a single video game comic, a Shadow Cat shirt, a one year subscription of Video Game Comics., to getting a life time subscription at a substantial discount.

We are also offering life time subscriptions for schools to use in the class room for fun reading activities for students.

Please look at the right side of our page for all the details on our rewards.

(You will receive your shirts between Febuary an March of 2013) 

 

What we are using your funding for?

Our initial goal of $9,500 covers the assistance we need to have a firm develop the Video Game Comics website and user database. So we can focus strictly on developing the Video Game Comics. It also covers the legal assistance we need to for written contracts. 

The more funding we raise the more features we can develop and the better our Video Game Comics can be in quality.

We would like do other things like develop a Video Game Comics mobile website to work on phones, iPads, and other non-Flash based devices. We would develop apps for iPhone, iPad, and Android based devices. Please check out our funding meter below for our development goals.

We can also offer a larger variety of prizes for the kids to trade in their points for if we get more funding.

 

About the School & Learning Center Lifetime Subscription Pledge

Your school, learning center, or public library gets a life time school/facility wide subscription to The Adventures of Shadow Cat Series. The subscription can be used on an unlimited amount of computers within your school or facility at the low cost of $99!

With your pledge you also get a life time school wide subscription to education focused Max the Cat and Friends series when we release it in the future. This series has a much stronger focus on education and good moral values.

After pledging you must provide your school's or learning center's information. Your school's administrator or facility manager must sign a contract agreeing to the use of the subscription on an unlimited amount of computeres within their facilty only. If you have any additional questions please email us at licensing@j-lynnentertainment.com. 

 

Who we are?

We call our group J-Lynn Entertainment. We also have a passion for rewarding people for playing video games and getting more people, especially kids to read. We want to bring the nostalgia of reading comics and about superheroes doing good back to children. 

We are a group with a diverse and well rounded skill set and experience with development and project planning for video games, events, and architecture. We've worked for companies like EA Games, EA Sports, The Cleveland Clinic Foundation, and various CAD/Construction projects around northern Ohio.

We hope our patent pending Video Game Comics will encourage more people to read, and allow us to be successful and develop other products like Video Game Books, Educational games, Apps, and regular Video Games. 

We hope to bring job opportunities for people when we start full development on Video Game Comics. We hope to grow to a mid size development studio and employ 25 to 50 people within 5 years. Hopefully you can help us start our project and we can employ more.

 

Please check out our various News media interviews about Video Game Comics below:

Watch our Fox 8 News interview about Video Game Comics

We'll post our Action 19 News interview once it airs.

 

Friend us on Facebook and Google+

Follow us on Twitter:

@VideoGameComics

 

How you can help?

There are many ways you can help this project become a reality and reward kids for reading. You can contribute with you pledge. If you can't afford to pledge, help spread the word about our project by word of mouth. Or you can use the share tools above to post on your Facebook page or Twitter account.

If you are a teacher or school administrator, and you think students at your school who don't find reading interesting or have trouble focusing on reading can benefit from the interactivtiy and rewards from The Adventures of Shadow Cat Video Game Comics. Tell school officials about our project. 

If your a teacher and would like to give input on educational subjects for The Adventures of Shadow Cat storylines and games please send us a message.

If you know any skilled artist or game programmers that might have interest in working on this project. Tell them to send their resumes to: resumes@j-lynnentertainment.com.
story_txt:
What are Video Game Comics? How do they encourage kids to read?
Finally a comic that rewards kids for the more they read, by giving them achievement points they can cash in to get discounts, to free prizes, such as merchandise and other video game comics!
And encourages them to read more with fun interactive video games within the digital comic, which changes the outcome of the story. Giving each issue multiple outcomes, adding value to comic, being able to read the comic more than once and getting more out of the story. Similar to a choose your own adventure book, but it's your performance that changes the story. Kids can have experiences unique to them and share their different comic experience with their friends who are also reading The Adventures of Shadow Cat.
The Adventures of Shadow Cat Video Game Comics series is ideal for both home use and designated computer time for students at schools.
The Adventures of Shadow Cat is a kid safe comic, but with interesting story lines that teens and adults can enjoy as well. The Adventures of Shadow Cat and the concept of Video Game Comics received a great reception at this year's Wizard World Chicago Comic Con from kids, parents, and teachers. We even had a Disney representative come up to us liking the idea.
Shadow Cat versions of Video Game Comics can also test reading comprehension, by the optional comprehension quiz at the end of each comic. Kids also get achievement points based on how they do on this quiz.
Parents frustrated that they're kids aren't reading enough and playing too many video games, and kids that don't want to read and would rather play video games, now have a happy medium!
 
About The Adventures of Shadow Cat series
Shadow Cat is a kid safe comic about a household cat turned super hero. The  series has action, comedy, scientific & historical facts, and tries to teach moral lessons. We also keep the storylines interesting for teens and adults as well.
Here's a Youtube link to our video for more information on the story about the three Shadow Cat series we want to develop.
Click here for the video about the Shadow Cat series
 
What you receive for helping fund our project
We have many rewards to choose from. Some of our favorite rewards range from getting a single video game comic, a Shadow Cat shirt, a one year subscription of Video Game Comics., to getting a life time subscription at a substantial discount.
We are also offering life time subscriptions for schools to use in the class room for fun reading activities for students.
Please look at the right side of our page for all the details on our rewards.

story:
At redOrbit.com we are currently building a mobile application that allows the user to capture a plant's image, and identify that plant in seconds.

We spent 3 months proving the concept, and are now ready to develop the application!

Our plant identification app for mobile devices not only identifies over 200,000 types of plants worldwide, but the data gathered by users can be used for education, gaming, safety, gardening, landscaping and much more.  We have a partner company with experience creating a similar app for light bulbs, and now all we need is help with our funding!

What has been done:

RedOrbit has developed a conceptual application capable of classifying images of leaves. The mobile app user captures an image of a leaf on a white background, and the application displays the most probable species and plenty of relevant scientific information about the plant. 

The selected algorithm for this project is shown to be working despite some limitations.  From the programmers:

“We tested the classifier on a limited selection of leaves images. A set of images for each species was divided into training and testing samples. Training sample is used to generate a recognition algorithm for each species and testing sample was passed to the classifier input. Our algorithm is able to detect some species with 100% accuracy. So basically we are feeding new, unknown images to the classifier and it's still able to recognize the species by image. “

The initial results do not ensure absolute quality of recognition in real-world usage, due to some limitation:

•  Small sample size

•  Images made with professional cameras, not with iPhone

•  Only good quality images are selected

•  Images are slightly preprocessed

•  The species used for demonstration have different looking leaves making it easy to classify them

Plans

Simply, creating this application will take a lot of hard work! 

Creating a full-featured mobile application will require further work. We will have to implement iOS application itself, API server, classifying server and a web backend. API server is intended to handle requests from mobile applications. It include all the business logic, species database, user management etc. Classifying server is a stand-alone application with a single responsibility – images processing and classifications. Making it a stand-alone solution will allow us to scale the service for larger userbase in the future. Web backend will allow administrators to manage users' data, species data and tune classification by reviewing new images and adding them to a training samples.

Things to keep in mind:

During the research we figured out some limitations:

•  A lot of species have very similar leaves which makes it difficult to classify them between each other. To solve this issue we plan to group such species together and show the user a list of possible options after recognition. We can also make use of comparing geographical data for given species and current GPS location.

•  Training and classifying images can is a CPU-heavy operation. We will probably have to set up multiple servers and make a scalable servers

•  Classification quality can be improved in many ways. There are a lot of options to try and we plan to reserve some budget funds for research with time & material

We have already proven the concept of the application, so we know that the technology is there to complete the project. The challenge will be adapting the image recognition platform to recognize different shapes and sizes of the same plants, flowers and trees. But it can and will be done!

story:
!!! Also available for PlayStation Vita

Every dollar counts, don't be shy !

Who are we ?

============================================================

Hi, my name is Johnny. I'm 22 years old and i love to code and to create art. My primary goal is to start a company and to make mobile video games for everyone. I have a bachelor degree in Computer Science.
Hello, i'm George. I'm 23 years old. I enjoy creating 3D objects and worlds using Blender. I'm also working in Unity, developing 2D and 3D video games. I also have a bachelor degree in Computer Science.



What we've done until now ?

============================================================
We managed to create a few mobile games, but without time and money we can't create great games. If you want to see our work just google iubisoft. We are there.


Why should you help us ?

============================================================
We really want to make something great. Something everyone will remember for years. Coming up with an idea is easy, but starting the project and working on it is the part that's hard for us. We are doing our second bachelor and we need to work to sustain ourselves. But if you contribute we can take a break from our jobs and work on the game. Maybe it will be a hit, maybe not. But we really want to try.
We can only do this with your help.


About the game

============================================================
Maybe the name of the game says it all. In our game, Time Rewind, you will play as one of the 6 characters available at launch. All of the characters have the power to reverse time for a little while. You can use this feature any time you want.
To make it more interesting some of the objects will not be affected by time rewind. The Dust can be collected in the game to buy new items and weapons because you need them to fight the enemies and of course, the bosses. If we reach our goal we will publish the game for free on Android, iOs, and Windows Phone 8, PC (windows 7 and 8.1) and Mac. 
Disclaimer: We will add ads in the game but if you contribute you will get a code to remove the ads.
At launch you will be able to play at least 120 levels. 30 levels per world. 
OH, and there is one more thing...
FOR EACH 1000$ we raise extra we will add one more world as an UPDATE.


What We Need & Why ?

============================================================
We need 6500 $. Why ? Good question.
No, we will not hire a programmer or a game designer because we can do it. Therefore, we need to take a break from our jobs and work full time at the game. Part of the money will cover our living costs in Denmark.
2000$ - living costs (food, water, rent, internet, etc.) for 2 months for 2 people. We can cover the rest of the 5 months.
We also need to but licences for Illustrator/Photoshop and Audition. 
1000$ - licences for 7 month.
1000$ - pay for t-shirts, posters, shipping etc.
1000$ - promoting the game.
250 $ - buy Google, iOs, and Microsoft developer accounts, Steam Greenlight.
9% of the money goes to Indiegogo.
The rest of the money will be used for reserving the logo and the names.
---------------------------------------------------
The game will be launched in April 2015.
---------------------------------------------------
WHAT IF THE GOAL IS NOT REACHED? 
If we manage to get at least 3000$ we will use open source programs like (Paint.net, Gimp and Audacity). Paid programs are way more complex and better in any way imaginable. One hour of work in Illustrator means 3-4 days of work in Paint.net or Gimp. Or you can give up quality for time.
What if you don't get 3000$ ? In this case we will release the game in January 2016. We need time to work on it.
All the perks promised will be received sooner or latter.


What You Get ?

============================================================

Risks & Challenges

============================================================
One of the risks is not to raise all the money we need. In that case we need to postpone the launch date for January 2016 or to use crappy tools to develop the game. We don't want that.
Maybe the most challenging part is to finish this project in time. We will spend our time working and working and working, this way we know for sure we will finish the game in time.
It happened to us before, it may happen again. We lost part of the game when one of the computer's hard drive broke. We plan to save the game on multiple computers and online too.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    ============================================================
    If you can not help or you don't believe we deserve the money you can allways help us by sharing. Maybe someone else you know really likes this project. Give it a try. 
    Use the share buttons on this page to post on Facebook, Twitter.
    If you want to find out more about us here if your chance:
    • dk.linkedin.com/in/ionutdanci/
    • dk.linkedin.com/pub/draganoiu-george/
    You can also like our Facebook Page: http://facebook.com/iubisoftcom
    Subscribe on youtube: http://youtube.com/user/iubisoft
    Follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/iubisoftcom
    Visit our website: http://iubisoft.com
    ------------------------------------------------
    For any question send an e-mail here: 
    iubisoft.com@gmail.com 
    or here
    ionut.danci@gmail.com .

    We promise to answer as soon as possible (24 hours max).

It happened to us before, it may happen again. We lost part of the game when one of the computer's hard drive broke. We plan to save the game on multiple computers and online too.





 
Other Ways You Can Help
============================================================

If you can not help or you don't believe we deserve the money you can allways help us by sharing. Maybe someone else you know really likes this project. Give it a try. 
Use the share buttons on this page to post on Facebook, Twitter.
If you want to find out more about us here if your chance:

dk.linkedin.com/in/ionutdanci/

dk.linkedin.com/pub/draganoiu-george/


You can also like our Facebook Page: http://facebook.com/iubisoftcomSubscribe on youtube: http://youtube.com/user/iubisoftFollow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/iubisoftcomVisit our website: http://iubisoft.com------------------------------------------------For any question send an e-mail here: 


iubisoft.com@gmail.com or here ionut.danci@gmail.com .


We promise to answer as soon as possible (24 hours max).

story:
Joule Lacrosse shafts improve durability, speed, and accuracy. Making the game more about the athlete, and less about product limitations!

                     

Who We Are

     At Joule Lacrosse we are focused on improving the game.  We do this by pairing together the world's most experienced composite engineers, material scientists, and professional lacrosse players.

      Joule Lacrosse was Co-founded by two multi-disciplinary athletes, JJ Lee, and Jake Lynn.  Jake and JJ found that they share a strong and unique passion for both athletic competition and manufacturing.  By joining forces and diving into the world of Lacrosse, all the ingredients to develop something amazing for sport were there.

Co-Founders JJ Lee, and Jake Lynn @ the 2014 US Lacrosse Convention

     Our ultimate goal is to make the game more about the athlete and his/her capabilities, and less about how that athlete adapts to equipment limitations in design.

Battle Tested: Speed & Strength

The Handle

      Over the past year, we have been developing a NEW REVOLUTIONARY DESIGN in Lacrosse shaft technology. 

      For the past several decades, hundreds of millions of dollars have been spent on R&D for shaft technology in other major stick sports, such as hockey and golf. We have taken many of these design concepts and applied them to the unique mechanics and motions of lacrosse.

      Why should the fastest growing sport in the world be held back by sub-par equipment?  ...It shouldn't!  

This is a true game changer!

Prototypes in manufacturing process and quality check

       Composite materials help make the world lighter, faster, stronger, safer, and more accurate.  These feats are not easily accomplished, it takes educated and specialized scientists, engineers, and industry professionals to do so.  This is why we are working side by side in partnership with one of the world's most advanced and experienced Composite technology and manufacturing company's in the world!

Raw shaft prototypes during trial manufacturing


     Advanced Group International - AD Group was established in 1987, for the sole purpose of Carbon fiber research and production. Since then AD Group has grown to become one of the world’s leaders in composite technology and manufacturing. Advanced designs and manufactures products for Golf, Cycling, Aerospace, Automotive, electronics, and much more. Currently Advanced continuing to pave the way with cutting edge research for nano-technology and discovering it’s various applications.


The Technology

     Joule Lacrosse has created two innovative and patent pending design features in the first generation of Lacrosse handles.

     The Oval.  The Oval was designed in concept theory to create a more natural feel, and improved accuracy. Players testing the prototypes have begun to validate this theory through countless hours of game play, both Box and Field.

Cross-section of the Gen. 1 handle near the base of the shaft

      The second key design feature is extremely innovative, having an adaptive or non-uniform internal hollow core.  The faceted sidewalls internally are tapered away until there is a section with a smooth oval core. This section creates an area which by nature will promote additional flex. This is our “Kick-point” by engineered design, even before any composite materials are implemented. Brilliant!

Adaptive Core: An exaggerated drawing showing a length-wise cross-section of the handle and its core.


FLEX

     Along with the kick-point engineered by structural design, we have created optimized flex profiles along the length of the shaft and at every axis orientation.

FEM Model Analysis of Flex

     First, we measure how the handle flexes at the neck with weight on the head-end simulating ball and head momentum during a speed shot. The fulcrum (point in which the shaft pivots against when flexed) is positioned by two stabilizing clamps which simulating the hands of where the player typically holds the handle during a speed shot).

Flex: Measuring the flex of different shaft at both major and minor axis

      Secondly, we measure how much the shaft deflects along the complete profile of the handle.  You can see that the standard aluminum/Ti (and almost all current carbon fiber shafts on the market) design handles have even/level deflection throughout.  With our unique patented core geometry (octagon to oval to octagon) coupled with the unlimited design possibilities of composites fibers, we have been able to create handles that deflect more in areas that are needed to flex, and less in areas that should be stiff.  This creates a "kick-point" in the shaft.  This kick-point will allow for more optimal energy transference from your body to the ball during a shot or pass.  In the graph below you can clearly see the difference in our handles, and the standard lacrosse handles in the market today (including almost all carbon fiber, will all be a flat-line EI curve with no kick-point).

EI or Deflection Curve: This graph demonstrates how much a lacrosse handle flexes at every inch along its length


Giving Back

     Joule Lacrosse will be giving all profits from our Indiegogo campaign, if successful, to Fields of Growth.  At Joule Lacrosse we are passionate about growing the game both technologically and internationally.  

     To best utilize every dollar we donate most effectively, we have carefully chosen a partner whom we believe will be able to do just that. We could not be more excited to join forces with Fields of Growth International! We share very similar business ethics and values, and hope to benefit from each other while becoming a positive force in this passionate industry that is Lacrosse.

Two young boys excited to now be lacrosse players, made possible through Fields of Growth

How Joule Lacrosse Intends to Support Fields of Growth in Partnership

  • Financially: By sharing profits made from equipment sales
  • Equipment Donation: Donating new equipment to support teams in Jamaica Lacrosse
  • Clinics:  Lacrosse clinics put on by Joule Lacrosse sponsored players in Jamaica.
  • Staff and Administrative Support: Assisting with Fields of Growth's School of Hope and other educational / charitable endeavors.
  • Collaborate: With fundraising, strategic planning, marketing, and advertising efforts 

A lacrosse team in Jamaica made possible by Fields of Growth!


Why We Need a Indiegogo Campaign

Minimum Capital Required for Startup: $20,000 

     - Funds the completion of R&D, raw materials, and equipment
     - Pledge between $5 and $9,900
          - At least 15% of each pledge is donated to the charity “Fields of Growth” to help grow the game internationally and develop educational support in third world communities.
     - If we fail to raise $20,000 by February, 22nd, the project will proceed but there will be a significant impact to our proposed timeline for production and shipment.

Goal of $50,000   

     - Funds will be used for the same things as above, but will speed up the process, and get you your shafts faster
          - 50% of revenue made on pledges made after our goal of $50k is reached, will be donated to Fields of Growth!!!

*All Gen. 1 attack shafts have a MSRP of $140 (D-pole $200) Early backers can get theirs and for only $70 (D-pole $110)! *Limited to 300 shafts.


Testimonials


QUINN TRABULSY
     - Quinn currently plays for 3D New England, and the 3D National Team.
     - Plays High School lacrosse for Colchester, Vermont
         - Broke the Varsity State Scoring Record his freshman year
               - Repeated the feat his sophomore year
     - Plays semi-pro box lacrosse with Team Quebec, and the Junior Voyageurs in the Off-Season. 


"This shaft is so lightweight, fast, yet it produces powerful and accurate shots like nothing else out there. Going to make a dangerous task for anyone on the opposition!  Love it"  

ETHAN FARRELL
     - Played on the 2013 Philadelphia Wings, NLL
     - Second All-time Leading career goals for Vermont Voyageurs, Semi-Pro Box. 
     - All-American at Lynchburg 

 “I used to carve my own shafts out of wood, so I am already used to the oval shape. Feels natural. I was however skeptical of another graphite shaft, but this shaft has held up really well in some vicious Box games!!” 

KYLE BAKER
     - Kyle played the six years in the 207Lacrosse Men’s Elite League
         - In his final season led the league in goals, assists, and points
     - Currently Coaching at 207 Lacrosse
     - Represented Team USA in the 2013 Bowhunter's Cup vs. The Iroquois Nationals  
     - Current Player for the Vermont Voyageurs

 "Joule Lacrosse shafts are my new weapon of choice.  Not only is the look excitingly different, but the light weight, great strength, and comfortable feel all combine to help me perform at a high level.  I truly enjoy playing with these shafts"  


GARETH FABIAN
     - Current Player for the Vermont Voyageurs, Semi-Pro Box
     - 33 career points with Voyageurs after 2 years with the team.

 

"I can't believe the oval profile isn't already out there.  I love the natural feel during play.  Great handle!"  


JEFF CULKIN
     - Current GM/Owner of Semi-Pro Box Lacrosse Team, The Vermont Voyageurs
     - Coached The Saint Michael's Collegiate Lacrosse Team for 8 years
          - 2X Cox Conference Coach Of the Year
          - Inducted into the SMC Athletic Hall of Fame in 2007          
     - Previously played Lacrosse in the Can-Am League
     - Partner at Symquest Group

 

"Joule Lacrosse appears to have a very unique and exciting business concept.  Its new composite shaft has been well reviewed by our Vermont Voyageurs players. It provides a unique combination of strength and flexibility. During recent testing of the Joule shafts, our Voyageurs players regularly exceeded speeds of 100mph when shooting on goal .  We welcome Joule Lacrosse to the industry and wish them the best."  


Help Advance the Game of Lacrosse and Make Joule Lacrosse a Reality!
story_txt:
Joule Lacrosse shafts improve durability, speed,
and accuracy. Making the game more about the athlete, and less about product
limitations!
                     
Who We Are
     At Joule Lacrosse we are focused on
improving the game.  We do this by pairing together the world's most
experienced composite engineers, material scientists, and professional lacrosse
players.
      Joule Lacrosse was Co-founded by two multi-disciplinary
athletes, JJ Lee, and Jake Lynn.  Jake and JJ found that they share a
strong and unique passion for both athletic competition and manufacturing.
 By joining forces and diving into the world of Lacrosse, all the
ingredients to develop something amazing for sport were there.
Co-Founders JJ Lee, and Jake Lynn @ the 2014 US Lacrosse Convention
     Our
ultimate goal is to make the game more about the athlete and his/her
capabilities, and less about how that athlete adapts to equipment limitations
in design.
Battle Tested:
Speed & Strength
The Handle
      Over the past year, we have been
developing a NEW REVOLUTIONARY DESIGN in Lacrosse shaft
technology. 
      For the past several decades, hundreds of
millions of dollars have been spent on R&D for shaft technology in other
major stick sports, such as hockey and golf. We have taken many of these design
concepts and applied them to the unique mechanics and motions of lacrosse.
      Why should the fastest growing sport in the
world be held back by sub-par equipment?  ...It shouldn't!  
This is a true game changer!
Prototypes in
manufacturing process and quality check

       Composite materials help make
the world lighter, faster, stronger, safer, and more accurate.  These
feats are not easily accomplished, it takes educated and specialized
scientists, engineers, and industry professionals to do so.  This is why
we are working side by side in partnership with one of the world's most
advanced and experienced Composite technology and manufacturing company's in
the world!
Raw shaft
prototypes during trial manufacturing

     Advanced Group International - AD Group was
established in 1987, for the sole purpose of Carbon fiber research and
production. Since then AD Group has grown to become one of the world’s leaders
in composite technology and manufacturing. Advanced designs and manufactures
products for Golf, Cycling, Aerospace, Automotive, electronics, and much
more. Currently Advanced continuing to pave the way with cutting edge
research for nano-technology and discovering it’s various applications.
The Technology
     Joule Lacrosse has created two innovative
and patent pending design features in the first generation of Lacrosse handles.
     The Oval.  The Oval was designed in
concept theory to create a more natural feel, and improved accuracy. Players
testing the prototypes have begun to validate this theory through countless hours
of game play, both Box and Field.

Cross-section of the Gen. 1 handle near the base of the shaft

      The second key design feature is extremely
innovative, having an adaptive or non-uniform internal hollow core.  The
faceted sidewalls internally are tapered away until there is a section with a
smooth oval core. This section creates an area which by nature will promote
additional flex. This is our “Kick-point” by engineered design, even before any
composite materials are implemented. Brilliant!
Adaptive Core: An exaggerated drawing
showing a length-wise cross-section of the handle and its core.

FLEX
     Along with the kick-point engineered by
structural design, we have created optimized flex profiles along the length of
the shaft and at every axis orientation.
FEM Model Analysis
of Flex
     First, we measure how the handle flexes at
the neck with weight on the head-end simulating ball and head momentum during a
speed shot. The fulcrum (point in which the shaft pivots against when flexed)
is positioned by two stabilizing clamps which simulating the hands of where the
player typically holds the handle during a speed shot).
Flex: Measuring the flex of different
shaft at both major and minor axis
      Secondly, we measure how much the
shaft deflects along the complete profile of the handle.  You can see that
the standard aluminum/Ti (and almost all current carbon fiber shafts on the
market) design handles have even/level deflection throughout.  With our
unique patented core geometry (octagon to oval to octagon) coupled with the
unlimited design possibilities of composites fibers, we have been able to
create handles that deflect more in areas that are needed to flex, and less in
areas that should be stiff.  This creates a "kick-point" in the
shaft.  This kick-point will allow for more optimal energy transference
from your body to the ball during a shot or pass.  In the graph below you
can clearly see the difference in our handles, and the standard lacrosse
handles in the market today (including almost all carbon fiber, will all be a
flat-line EI curve with no kick-point).
EI or Deflection Curve: This graph
demonstrates how much a lacrosse handle flexes at every inch along its length

Giving Back
     Joule Lacrosse will be giving all profits
from our Indiegogo campaign, if successful, to Fields of Growth.  At Joule
Lacrosse we are passionate about growing the game both technologically and
internationally.  
     To best utilize every dollar we donate most
effectively, we have carefully chosen a partner whom we believe will be able to
do just that. We could not be more excited to join forces with Fields of Growth
International! We share very similar business ethics and values, and hope to
benefit from each other while becoming a positive force in this passionate
industry that is Lacrosse.

Two young boys
excited to now be lacrosse players, made possible through Fields of Growth
How Joule Lacrosse Intends to
Support Fields of Growth in Partnership


Financially: By
     sharing profits made from equipment sales

Equipment Donation: Donating new equipment to support teams in Jamaica
     Lacrosse

Clinics:  Lacrosse
     clinics put on by Joule Lacrosse sponsored players in Jamaica.

Staff and Administrative Support: Assisting with Fields of Growth's School of Hope and
     other educational / charitable endeavors.

Collaborate: With fundraising, strategic planning, marketing, and advertising efforts 

A lacrosse team in
Jamaica made possible by Fields of Growth!

Why We Need a Indiegogo Campaign

Minimum Capital
Required for Startup: $20,000 
   
 - Funds the completion of R&D, raw materials, and equipment
     - Pledge between $5 and $9,900
          - At least 15% of each pledge is donated to
the charity “Fields of Growth” to help grow the game internationally and
develop educational support in third world communities.
     - If we fail to raise $20,000 by February, 22nd, the
project will proceed but there will be a significant impact to our proposed timeline for production and shipment.
Goal of $50,000   
     -
Funds will be used for the same things as above, but will speed up the process,
and get you your shafts faster
          - 50% of revenue made on pledges made after
our goal of $50k is reached, will be donated to Fields of Growth!!!
*All Gen. 1 attack shafts have
a MSRP of $140 (D-pole $200) Early backers can get theirs and for only $70 (D-pole $110)! *Limited to
300 shafts.
Testimonials

         - Broke the Varsity State Scoring Record his
freshman year
               - Repeated the feat his
sophomore year
     - Plays semi-pro box lacrosse with Team Quebec, and the Junior Voyageurs in the
Off-Season. 
"This shaft is so lightweight, fast, yet it
produces powerful and accurate shots like nothing else out there. Going to make
a dangerous task for anyone on the opposition!  Love it"  
ETHAN FARRELL     - Played on the 2013 Philadelphia Wings, NLL     - Second All-time Leading career goals for Vermont
Voyageurs, Semi-Pro Box. 
     - All-American at Lynchburg 
 “I used to carve my own shafts out of wood, so I am
already used to the oval shape. Feels natural. I was however skeptical of
another graphite shaft, but this shaft has held up really well in some vicious
Box games!!” 
KYLE BAKER     - Kyle played the six years in the 207Lacrosse Men’s
Elite League
         - In his final season led the league in
goals, assists, and points
     - Currently Coaching at 207 Lacrosse     - Represented Team USA in the 2013 Bowhunter's Cup vs. The Iroquois Nationals  
     - Current Player for the Vermont Voyageurs

great strength, and comfortable feel all combine to help me perform at a high
level.  I truly enjoy playing with these shafts"  

GARETH FABIAN     - Current Player for the Vermont Voyageurs, Semi-Pro Box
     - 33 career points with Voyageurs after 2 years with the
team.
 "I can't believe the oval profile isn't
already out there.  I love the natural feel during play.  Great

JEFF CULKIN     - Current GM/Owner of Semi-Pro Box Lacrosse Team, The
Vermont Voyageurs

8 years          - 2X Cox Conference Coach Of the Year          - Inducted into the SMC Athletic Hall of Fame in 2007               - Previously played Lacrosse in the Can-Am League     - Partner at Symquest Group

and exciting business concept.  Its new composite shaft has been
well reviewed by our Vermont Voyageurs players. It provides a unique
combination of strength and flexibility. During recent testing of the Joule

story:
Short Summary


An unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV), colloquially known as a drone, is an aircraft without a human pilot on board. Its flight is controlled either autonomously by computers in the vehicle or under the remote control of a pilot on the ground or in another vehicle. The typical launch and recovery method or "Pop and Stop" of an unmanned aircraft is by the function of an automatic system or an external operator on the ground.

our goal is to create and modify some Rc airplane jet plane and by linking the remote system                we can manage to control the planes from any were in the world.  A standard match has 6 players arranged in 3 teams each controlling there own JET fighter. Each team has a mission plan assigned to both, they must reach a destination on the map while entering a dog fight ; The first team to reach destroyed and finish  the goal wins. when reached, the goal moves to another random location.

this is multiplayer online game with real life impact and will change the way games are played through this new platform we will begin a new era in gaming. virtual reality on speed. 

unlike rocket racer this will be an unmanned vehicle rc jet that will allow every person with an adventurist spirit on earth to be a part off and have some fun. 

Each team logs on the website, and will be assigned to a chosen team and enter the race for each race another team will enter ext. 

 Players are invulnerable but when hit they will loose control of the individual jet returning to the start base. 


A typical race would take about 10 to 20 min, and other competitors and fans would be able to see multiple camera views, including cockpit, "on-track," "side-by-side" and wing-angle views.


The operation site fly through the canyon dog fight.


What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • the funding will go on website development and the interactive system that will allow online connection with the jets.
  • other will go on the paper work allowing for flight permits ext.
  • The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • changing the way people play online games.
  • opening a new sport that can change many thing giving the players a hero status and adventure.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
ORDER ONLINE AT: 

http://www.thegunbox.com

WE WOULD LIKE TO THANK EVERYONE FOR HELPING US NOT ONLY REACH, BUT EXCEED OUR GOAL BY ALMOST 40%!  


YOU WILL RECEIVE YOUR PERK! –

Update 10/1/13 - Thanks for all the interest, comments, and funding so far! If you contribute to one of the versions of The Gun Box YOU WILL RECEIVE IT! Even if the project does not fund completely you will receive the perk that you contributed for.

What is THE GUN BOX?

The Gun Box keeps guns safe, and It allows gun owners to quickly access their firearms when they need them most. 

The Gun Box is built tough. It is die cast using aircraft strength aluminum alloy, which has a tensile strength of over 24,000 lbs per square inch and a melting temperature of over 1000 degrees. 

The Gun Box opens one of 2 ways. The first is a radio frequency (RF) signature in a ring or wristband which is included with every box. The second is a biometric fingerprint reader which can store multiple fingerprints. The box can also be programmed to open with a combination of both the RF signature and the fingerprint reader.

The Gun Box Premier Model has the added safety feature of alert notifications.  Notifications will be sent to your phone when the box is opened, moved, or tampered with. Using GPS technology, you will know the exact location of the box while it is moving. 

We’ve also added a few bonus features to the box for convenience. On the back of the Gun Box you will find 2 USB ports for charging phones and tablets or connecting other devices such as Bluetooth speakers. 

The Gun Box has a battery backup so you can unplug The Gun Box and take it with you. When you turn off the battery switch on the bottom of the box the battery will last for days. 

The Gun Box has mounting holes on the bottom of the box, it can be mounted under a cabinet on a wall, to a nightstand or in any orientation. It can also be secured using a Kensington lock and cable.

Our Qualifications

Our team has produced multiple products over the past 15 years.  For this product we have done our homework by having ongoing vendor audits and personal factory visits at vendor locations spread throughout the world. 

Multiple electrical and mechanical prototypes have been produced to prove out the design and eliminate risk. A production plan has been created and a DFM "Design for Manufacture" review has been completed by our experienced engineering and procurement team. 

Our team is confident and committed to this product and its successful launch this year. Our team has also been planning and securing the necessary long lead components so initial demands for the product can be met. 

We understand the risks and the obstacles that will inevitably come with product manufacturing and delivery and we know that we are up to the task. The Gun Box is a high quality product and any of the perks purchased will be delivered on time.

Ryan Hyde has been inventing, designing, and manufacturing products since 1990. Whether pushing the G force limits on roller coasters, strengthening nuclear facility alarm systems, or normalizing hyper sensitive medical equipment, Ryan’s expertise and experience is vast and significant. 

After successfully starting multiple companies and  launching dozens of products over the past 10 years,  in 2009, Ryan started his own engineering firm named RPH Engineering LLC–www.RPHeng.com .  RPH Engineering focuses on unique products that push the limits of engineering and design.  RPH Engineering helps its customer's designs become a reality while also supporting products they have designed and invented internally.  

 

 

Help Us Bring The Gun Box to Life

 

We believe in responsible home defense and we know there are a lot of other people who think the same way. That’s why we created The Gun Box. It really is safer, more convenient and a whole lot cooler than most other gun safes.

It has been amazing to see our idea of The Gun Box become a real, working prototype. If you think The Gun Box is as cool as we do, please look over the ways you can donate below and help to keep guns, families, individuals, and children safer! Any donation helps!

Perks

$10 – You will receive a Defend Responsibly bumper sticker, to show your support for a project which aims to keep guns safe. When displayed, the Defend Responsibly sticker will be a reminder to you of your ability to defend yourself and your serious obligation to carry out that defense responsibly. 


$30 - Defend Responsibly T-shirt - The Defend Responsibly T-shirt is a way to wear your support for The Gun Box, the innovative product which keeps families, individuals and guns safe. These stylish T-shirts are made of high-quality fabric and are available in Men’s, Women’s, and Youth sizes. 


$30 – You will receive a 1 inch by 1 inch, high quality, durable, RFID label sticker that you can stick on a credit card, phone, wallet, key chain, etc. The label can be synced to open your Gun Box or used with other RF-equipped devices. 

$50 – The Gun Box wristband WITH RF microchip – Feel the power of wearing state-of-the-art RF technology in a wristband or ring. With the RF enabled wristband or ring, you will be able to interact with other RF-equipped devices like cell phones. 


(Rings shown above are renderings, final design will vary) 

$180 – First production run of The Gun Box RF Version (Retail Price $240) – Be one of the first to own The Gun Box RF! In addition to the die cast aluminum exterior, the RF version includes a RF ring or wristband for rapid access, 2 usb ports for charging devices, battery backup with an on/off switch, mounting holes and a Kensington lock port.

$225 – First production run of The Gun Box Biometric Fingerprint version (Retail Price $300) In addition to all the features of the RF version The Gun Box Biometric will open with the touch of a finger. Equipped to hold multiple fingerprints, this version can be opened 3 ways; with the RF ring or wristband, a fingerprint, or a combination of both if programmed by you. 

$390 - First production run of The Gun Box Premier, includes 1 year of monitoring (a $75 value) (Retail Price $420 plus monitoring) The Gun Box Premier has everything in the Biometric version with the added security of alert notifications. If The Gun Box is opened, moved, or tampered with you will receive alerts sent to your phone. Using GPS technology it will give you the exact location of the box while it is moving.

Help Get the Word Out!

If you know someone who would be interested in this product please share this page with them. We want everyone to defend responsibly so please share!

story:
Short Summary

I am a traveler and a developer. I love exploring the earth and I want to recreate some of the beautiful landscapes I often see in interactive digital format.

My goal it to basically create an infinite landscape exploration engine/game. The key features of the final product will be as follows:

  • Infinite procedurally generated landscapes.
  • First person view with the support of vehicles.
  • High extensibility using scripts and simple XML files.
  • Generated or scripted quests to motivate you in exploring.

Using the extensions it will be possible to create any landscape and/or storyline imaginable. Of course there will be a lot of content already included, the "game" will be fully usable in it's original state without any extensions.

What Is To Be Done

As you can see in the video, some key functionality is already present. However, there's still lot to be done, mainly the following following features need to be implemented:

  • Support for quests.
  • Interface (in-game and menu).
  • Weather/daytime changes.
  • Support for interactive objects.
Partially implemented features in need of further work include:
  • Support for landscape objects like grass, trees, buildings etc. 
  • Support for landscape extensions.
  • More vehicles and vehicle types.
  • Physics.

Licensing details

Once the project reaches a certain state, it will be free to download and use any way you like. All the source code will be made public through a repository and open to contributions.
The license policy is open to suggestions as I don't want to limit any possible uses of the product. Most probably it will be some free license like LGPL, BSD or just a public domain.

Short Summary I am a traveler and a developer. I love exploring the earth and I want to recreate some of the beautiful landscapes I often see in interactive digital format.
My goal it to basically create an infinite landscape exploration engine/game. The key features of the final product will be as follows:  Infinite procedurally generated landscapes. First person view with the support of vehicles. High extensibility using scripts and simple XML files.
Generated or scripted quests to motivate you in exploring.  Using the extensions it will be possible to create any landscape and/or storyline imaginable. Of course there will be a lot of content already included, the "game" will be fully usable in it's original state without any extensions.   What Is To Be Done As you can see in the video, some key functionality is already present. However, there's still lot to be done, mainly the following following features need to be implemented:
 Support for quests.
Interface (in-game and menu).
Weather/daytime changes.
Support for interactive objects. 
Partially implemented features in need of further work include:


Support for landscape objects like grass, trees, buildings etc. 
Support for landscape extensions.
More vehicles and vehicle types.
Physics.


Licensing detailsOnce the project reaches a certain state, it will be free to download and use any way you like. All the source code will be made public through a repository and open to contributions.

The license policy is open to suggestions as I don't want to limit any possible uses of the product. Most probably it will be some free license like LGPL, BSD or just a public domain.

story:
Before we start

If you'd like to get any of the perks provided, you will need to send me an email (just click the circular mail icon) to give me the email so I can send the note of thanks or cat pictures.

Short Summary

  • I'm just a person who likes to play video games and I'm not fond of low FPS. My idea is to get money to build a better computer from what I've already got and to build an ultimate gaming computer.
  • My campaign is for all of you wonderful people to support me in my quest to play video games at ultra FPS.
  • Your contributions will help a guy have 100% entertainment all day everyday, and if you don't think making someone happy will do any good, then you need to rethink your decisions.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I will need around $2,000. All of the money will go towards the gaming computer, but if I get any extra money I will probably give it away to charity.
  • You will get the ultimate satisfaction knowing that you helped someone play video games.
  • All the money, as I said, goes to the computer itself and any extra will go to charity. If I don't get the $2,000 dollars within the sixty days the money will still go towards the computer, but I'll have to work more to get the remaining money.

The Impact

  • This can help you in a way that you can feel good about yourself and brag about helping others to your friends.
  • This is my first gaming computer I've ever built so I do not have any track records.
  • If you don't believe the money is going towards the computer, then I can tell you how far I've gone into planning with it. I have Nvidia Geforce 780ti duel graphics cards, Cooler Master Hyper 212 Evo fans, and a Phantom 410 computer case. I have a ton of other parts but it would take forever to list their full names.

Risks & Challenges

  • My dad has built computers his whole life so I know my way around a computer, which means I will most likely built the computer correctly on the first go. If not, then it will be my fault and I will have to make up for it.
  • If something goes wrong with any of the items, I can always just work some more as a transcriber and earn the money back. Of course that would take weeks and maybe months to earn back, but I'm dedicated to finishing my first project.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You can spread this campaign around anywhere you'd like, whether it's Facebook to make fun of it, or Tumblr for them to help out.
  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools to easily spread it out around.
