Hi there, my name is Xanther Logan and I'm here to ask for your help in getting my first game app financed so that I can create even more great and exciting game apps. Iâ€™ve got a number of really fun apps planned, but such is life, I just donâ€™t have enough capital to get the ball rolling. I can get the designs done for the first app, but actual coding costs a bit and I just donâ€™t quite have the funds for it :(


The Impact
I'm like you. I want to know where my money goes if I give it to someone or some cause. It's only natural. Without going into too much detail I can tell you that by helping to get my app created, you will have helped start something great and fun. Once this first app is created, the revenue from it will allow me to develop the rest of the games I have planned.


What We Need & What You Get
I'm not asking for a lot because, frankly I don't need a lot. I've got most of the funding myself through savings but I need just that little bit extra to get everything rolling. I'm needing $5000.00 and all of this will be going towards paying a fantastic team of designers and developers to create my first mobile game app for IOS and Android. If I don't get all of the funding, I'll have to skip the Android development initially until the IOS app brings in revenue and then I will get the app ported to Android devices once I have the funds for it. Both myself and the developers are excited about these projects, and I personally can't wait to see people enjoying my first app...
The first app we're making is a bit of a mixture of genres from old school games that I know everyone will enjoy. Think Super Mario Brothers meets Crash Bandicoot meets Street Fighter. This is going to be a truly epic game that has a really cool, cartoonish design similar to that you see in the Halfbrick games and Angry Birds. For every $5 donated, I will ensure that you get a free copy of not only this app gifted to you for you to enjoy but every app I do this year (there are currently half a dozen planned and more to come â€“ each will be $0.99/Â£0.69 per download.) and for every $10 donated, I will gift this first app to you and all of your friends (plus you'll still get every app I do this year free too!)

Other Ways You Can Help
If you aren't able to help me out financially, that's ok. I know times are tough. But if you can't lend a buck, please could you tell everyone you know about my campaign as maybe they can provide some funding or know someone who can. Thank you all for taking the time to read this and hopefully this will be the start of something really amazing.

story:
What is Operation SAND all about?

Operation SAND is a next-gen RTS focusing on tense, realistic and engaging battles between up to 8 players, split into 2 distinct factions with their own approach to warfare. Concentration is key when battling against human opponents, and with a next-gen approach to interaction and immersion, Operation SAND puts you in the hot seat of humanity’s final battle for resources, domination and survival.

What is it that makes online multiplayer games so fun and enjoyable? The essential fight between factions, boiled down to a realistic, unpredictable experience, that still puts you in control of every aspect. We want to bring this same feeling of realistic tension, that binds you to the edge of your seat, to real time strategy:

  • Unpredictable, realistic battles at different locations.
  • Innovative resource management.
  • Each faction has unique abilities and units that trump each other.
  • Compelling and engaging story.

The initial planing and development phases are over, but there is still much more to do. We want to work on this project as much we can, full-time if possible, to ensure the final product lives up to our dream for it, and to produce a new breed of RTS for our supporters and all fans of the struggling genre.
We are a small group of dedicated independent developers from all over the world, so in order to really bring this project to life, we need more help - your help!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What will you get

 

Built in a modern, sophisticated engine. The game will be available in digital form only, with no DRM, initially for the PC platform. You can also buy the full soundtrack as a digital download with no DRM or copy protection. Once we’ve successfully supported and made the game, we just want people to enjoy it.

 

There are a load more rewards, including contributing directly to the content of the game, so check out the rewards and perks and be as generous as you can!

Index:

  • Information about the developers
  • Music
  • Story
  • Information about the factions
  • Gameplay plans
  • Rewards
  • Choosing your T-Shirt
  • Other Ways You Can Help
  • Incomplete funding

 

 

 

Information about the developers

Operation SAND is currently being developed by a small but dedicated and experienced team. You can see who we are at the very bottom of the campaign page. If you wish to contact us, you can easily do so on facebook. Check out our website: www.operationsand.com. Our email and facebook are referenced there.

The core team of Operation SAND goes way back, we have been good friends since school times. In the past we never had the possibility to work on a project that we really loved, without any constraints. Our talent got wasted, because in the field of graphics and programming people often want the cheapest possible solution. So we were making money, but never felt like a project pushed our limits or was really something to be proud of. With crowdfunding becoming more popular, we decided to take our chances with it - being our own client and setting our own quality standards.

With such an ambitious project we can't expect to be able to finish it alone. Ideally, several people should be working on the game full-time, for at least a year. Every developer deserves a decent wage for their talent, time and commitment, so our goal is set quite high. Anyone who will work on our team later, will benefit from it. We need more people on our team and this is the reason, why our campaign exists. Our funding target is ambitious, but we also feel its fair. Help us reach it and remember: every bit counts, we can work with much less than the 100%. Read about what we can do in case of an incomplete funding

 

Music

Benedict Nichols is responsible for music and sound effects in Operation SAND. Listen to some of the awesome tracks he has composed so far on Soundcloud.
This is just a demo of the high quality, interactive soundtrack that will get your blood rushing when playing the final game!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Story

Even though the main focus lies on multiplayer, the events in the game do follow an involving story.
 

The war takes place in the near future, at a time when the geopolitical map of the world has been largely simplified by the forces of globalization. Now there are only two sides that can claim total world dominance – the Atlantic Federation and Eurasian Union. The AF consists of all of North America, together with most parts of western Europe. The EU, at it's core, is a fusion between Russia and China, together with all the Arabic countries and Turkey.

The catalyst for this conflict is not a desire for world dominance, but a very simple fact – the natural resources of our planet are almost exhausted and cannot support the existence of both global political powers. Operation SAND is an initiative of the AF. It's main objective is to conquer the last remaining natural resources, mainly oil, somewhere in the middle East. The last war of humanity thus begins.

Atlantic Federation and Eurasian Union are very different when it comes to their military. Both sides have a large number of different units and a variety of special super-weapons.

 

 

 

Information about the factions


The Atlantic Federation:

 

 

 

 

 

  • Powerful, modern army that utilizes robotized units heavily.
  • Units have no fear, their accuracy and speed range from very good to outstanding.
  • Production cost per unit is relatively high, production time is long.
  • Units are limited with low reserves, but if AF succeed in capturing resources and factories, they can build more.

 

 


The Eurasian Union:

 

  • The troops are based on much older technology and lack the firepower of AF units.
  • Main objective is the protection of oilfields and mines.
  • Tanks and airplanes are not robotized and often use outdated technology. Everything has to be repaired often.
  • Thanks to more generous resources behind the lines, units are mass produced there and delivered by plane almost instantly.

 

Overall:

 

AF has more powerful, modern weapons and units. In comparison, the Union has less firepower, their armor is lighter and accuracy and speed are subpar. They try to outsmart or outnumber their enemy – the EU stands almost no chance otherwise.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Gameplay plans

Operation SAND will be a real-time strategy game currently targeted at PC. It will feature massive maps for up to 8 players (4v4 or variants of) and whilst the main focus is on multiplayer, the events in the game will follow an engaging story. We plan to have a singleplayer campaign, but the extent to which that is achieved depends on the funds we raise!

Every game session will provide a certain degree of randomness, so that the outcome is always difficult to predict. The main objective – survival, demanding the destruction of enemy forces – is impossible to achieve without the secondary objective – building and/or protecting the base, mining for resources and maintaining a steady energy supply for your buildings. A very important task is the placement of mines, oil rigs and traps on the battlefield. This makes sure that even repeat battles between the same armies on the same map will be different every time.

 


Gameplay Features:

 

 

 

  • Intuitive controls leaving the screen uncluttered with confusing interface elements so gameplay can flow uninterrupted.

  •  

    Absolutely massive maps that have resources distributed randomly every match and require exploration.

     

  • Both sides in this war are inherently different. Changing your side means learning entirely different tactics and changing your approach to the conflict.

  • Different win conditions – while the EU will win if they just protect their resources long enough, the AF needs to capture all the resources and destroy the enemy.

  • Resources play a central role in this conflict – their scarcity is the reason this war started and their location on the map has to be taken into account while coming up with your strategy.

  • To maximise the immersion and feeling of realism, a physics engine will be used. Tanks roll back due to recoil; every unit has weight; many objects on the map are moveable (and destructible), which allows you to quickly build roadblocks or fortify a position.

  • Units can gain experience and improve combat effectiveness. Thin walls and corners can be shot through, but the units have a restricted viewing angle – once something is behind a wall it is not visible any more. Accuracy decreases with distance as well.

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • All units have a large number of properties, motorized vehicles use up fuel and may need to recharge, everything has an armor level, all units differ in speed.

  • The AF needs to build their own base and start production of units, while the EU starts the game inside a fully constructed and fortified town that has to be protected, along with mines and oilfields all over the map.

  • Instead of building new units, EU orders them to be delivered from behind the

    lines, or repairs already destroyed ones.

 

 

 

 

  • Unit properties will affect each other. The closer the target, the higher the damage inflicted upon it. The higher the weight of a unit, the better the accuracy can become, because recoil is reduced.

  • It is very important to keep an eye on your ammo. Each unit can only carry a limited amount and it would be really risky to run out of ammo just before you invade the base of your enemy.

  • Units can receive significant upgrades. For example: Tanks of the AF can carry small flying drones. The drones can work wonders for map exploration and even carry a small gatling gun, or one rocket to use against units with heavier armor. 

 

 

  • In order to refuel or recharge their ammo they have to land on their mother tank (the tank's supplies are distributed between the tank itself and it's drone).

  • All units are accessible through a development tree. At the beginning you can only produce a limited number of unit types, but with time you can purchase updates and open up entirely new units.

  • Both sides have a super-weapon that can be used once per game, due to an enormous cost factor.

 

 

 

 

  • An important part of the game is maintaining a steady energy supply for your buildings, while trying to sabotage the energy supply of your enemy. When energy supply has been shut down, every building can keep working on solar power, which will reduce the functionality down to 20% (figure not final), slowing down production or research.

  •  

    In order to get more resources, you have to build oilfields, oil rigs or mines. Not all places are equally well suited for this! Some places are worth to fight for, others are hardly worth the money you will need to start mining there.

     

 

 

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    Choosing your T-Shirt

    Each rank receives their own T-Shirt. If you purchase a perk for more than $85, you automatically receive the highest rank - General.

    Each T-Shirt is available in both black and white. The logo always remains the same on front and back.

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     


    Once we have received your payment at the end of the campaign, please contact us via info@operationsand.com to choose the desired T-Shirt colour. For identification purposes you must state your name (the name of the credit card owner).

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you like Operation SAND, please share this campaign with your friends, so that more people can know about us!

    If you have some experience in beta testing, consider investing into early beta access, so that the last stage of development may be sped up.

     

     

    Incomplete funding

    With such an ambitious project it is possible that there will not be enough interest to fund it.

    We wish to ensure you, that we intend to work on Operation SAND in any circumstances. Whatever we raise, the core team will continue working on the game.

       

      In any case, the chances for Operation SAND being released are looking good. So don't feel discouraged if you see this project not coming close to the ambitious goal we set - any help is appreciated and every bit counts.

story:
Survivors is an Survival-Strategy building game

Survivors is now on Steam greenlight, but there are still many miles ahead. The game is currently playable, but needs way more work, to get it to the final stage. That meaning, a fun game, with plenty of hours of entertainment for the gamer.

What's already done?

So far the game is currently playable. In a pretty raw state.
Main Features:
- You can create your own land.
-Create houses and improve them to help your villagers settle in.
-Create mines, and gather up on stone.
-Set forest keepers, So you have plenty of wood.
-Create crop fields.
-Create fishing boats, They will wander around the sea to get fish for your citizens.
- Set bait farms, so the fishing boats have plenty of bait to fish.


    Why should you support it?

    I've started programming this game, as a hobby, showed it to friends, and they've thought it was cool, Then moved in to indie forums, and via contacts managed to get the game in Desura, and the Indie Bundle. Now all I managed to get from sales on Desura went to the Steam greenlight. So I'll need this funding to get more people to help me add more content to this game. (Art, better graphics, GUI)

      Who am I?

      My name is Alejandro Telatnik, and I'm a programmer from Argentina. I've started to make simple and cool little games in 2010, and work my way in the indie scene in the last months. I would really like to keep this as a full time job. But currently its impossible to do this for a living in South America, at least not working alone.

      I don't have any money, but how can I help?

      If you don't have, or simply just don't want to invest money on this project, all I'm asking for you to do is: Tell a few friends about it, and show them how cool this game is!

story:
Hi, we are mobile4D, a student project at the University of Bremen in Germany. Over the last two years, we developed a smartphone-based disaster alerting and management system for Laos.

Our partner in Laos, the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry (MAF), plans to deploy a pilot installation of mobile4D covering a whole province of the country. To realize that, at least two of us need to travel to Laos - to install the system, distribute hardware, and train government staff to use the software.

The mobile4D system is ready to be deployed - all we need now is the money to realize travel from Germany to Laos. 

Why do we need funding?

For the pilot installation, we will distribute smartphones in all the districts of a province in Laos and train government staff to use our system. The pilot installation will be running for at least two months and will provide important insights about the use of the system and the requirements for scaling the system up to the country level.

It is of critical importance that we can be on site in Laos to provide installation and training. 

While the cost for hardware and running mobile4D is secured by a grant of the German Ministry for Research and Education (BMBF), the only missing link is the money for travel. This is what we are asking for:


Description

Costs

Flight & Transport from Germany to Laos          

1,000 € / person

Health and Accident Insurance

50 € / person

Visa for Laos

25 € / person

Accommodation for two weeks

300 € / person            

Total:

2,750 €

plus 4% fees for Indiegogo

110 €

Funding Goal:

2,860 €

This covers the minimal requirements for a successful deployment  of the system. However, if we raise more money, we could bring a third student to Laos, which would help considerably. mobile4D is a distributed system running at various different places, and every additional person will make training and deployment more effective. 

About the mobile4D System

In case of natural disasters such as floods, draughts, and animal diseases, a fast and secure flow of information is essential to be able to cope with the situation. mobile4d is a disaster information and alerting system for Android smartphones to allow both for timely notification of affected stakeholders and easy and barrier-free crowdsourcing of disaster information on the local level. It is tightly connected into administrative and provides a bi-directional communication channel: from reporters on the ground level to the administration, and vice versa.

Our system basically consists of three parts:


  • An Android app which allows people in the villages to send and receive information about natural disasters in Laos.   

  • A web frontend which allows different administrative layers to send out warnings and provide further information, such as safety advice and contact information for questions.        

  • The disaster management server, which handles incoming disaster warnings and sends out notifications to the people who are affected.

The system uses state-of-the-art technology to ensure a reliable workflow:

        barrier-free disaster reporting at local level and open for everyone

           mobile application

          enables crowdsourced communication

            allows real-time notifications

                location-based information

              mobile4D has been successfully tested in a large field study in Luang Prabang, Laos, in April 2013. After another year of development, deployment of the pilot installation is also supposed to be the final stage of our student project. Please support us to bring the project to a successful finalization.
              For more information about the mobile4D project visit our website as linked below.

              mobile4D Project Timeline



              Thank You!

Why do we need funding?
For the pilot installation, we will distribute smartphones in all the districts of a province in Laos and train government staff to use our system. The pilot installation will be running for at least two months and will provide important insights about the use of the system and the requirements for scaling the system up to the country level.
It is of critical importance that we can be on site in Laos to provide installation and training. 
While the cost for hardware and running mobile4D is secured by a grant of the German Ministry for Research and Education (BMBF), the only missing link is the money for travel. This is what we are asking for:



Description
Costs


Flight & Transport from Germany to Laos           

1,000 € / person



Health and Accident Insurance
50 € / person


Visa for Laos
25 € / person


Accommodation for two weeks 
300 € / person            


Total: 
2,750 €


plus 4% fees for Indiegogo
110 €


Funding Goal: 
2,860 €


This covers the minimal requirements for a successful deployment  of the system. However, if we raise more money, we could bring a third student to Laos, which would help considerably. mobile4D is a distributed system running at various different places, and every additional person will make training and deployment more effective. 
About the mobile4D System
In case of natural disasters such as floods, draughts, and animal diseases, a fast and secure flow of information is essential to be able to cope with the situation. mobile4d is a disaster information and alerting system for Android smartphones to allow both for timely notification of affected stakeholders and easy and barrier-free crowdsourcing of disaster information on the local level. It is tightly connected into administrative and provides a bi-directional communication channel: from reporters on the ground level to the administration, and vice versa.
Our system basically consists of three parts:

An Android app which allows people in the villages to send and receive information about natural disasters in Laos.    
A web frontend which allows different administrative layers to send out warnings and provide further information, such as safety advice and contact information for questions.         
The disaster management server, which handles incoming disaster warnings and sends out notifications to the people who are affected.


The system uses state-of-the-art technology to ensure a reliable workflow:

    barrier-free disaster reporting at local level and open for everyone

     mobile application

  enables crowdsourced communication

  allows real-time notifications

    location-based information

mobile4D has been successfully tested in a large field study in Luang Prabang, Laos, in April 2013. After another year of development, deployment of the pilot installation is also supposed to be the final stage of our student project. Please support us to bring the project to a successful finalization.
For more information about the mobile4D project visit our website as linked below.
mobile4D Project Timeline



Thank You!

story:
http://www.chewker.com 

          Fun, Fast, Edgy, and Mind-sharpening!   

  Chewker is an exciting, revolutionary blend of Chess with Luck.

        The game Chewker was created as an enjoyable way to connect all people beyond language, country, or culture.

  • Cards and chess take a long time to play.  Chewker is very fast.

  • Loaded with surprises, it keeps everyone engaged!

  • Defeated by a friend in Cards or Chess?  It’s time for payback! 

  • You’ll even get smarter playing it!

        I, Matthew Clyde Overfield, am from Buffalo, N.Y. 

        I am committed to improving our communities.  Both local and global.

        I have invested a great deal to deliver Chewker to the world.

        I was awarded a U.S. patent (#7,296,798); produced Chewker gameboards, and created http://www.chewker.com. 

        Now I would like your support to develop the Chewker game software, in order to make the game accessible to a worldwide audience.  I am asking for $ 25,000 USD to realize this dream. 

                                     Spread the word.              

                               Tweet it , Text it, Blog it,                  

                            Talk about it,  Share the link.

                  Join our vision.   Make history.   Co-create !  

          Choose a perk.   Enjoy.   Contribute NOW!

Links to Patent http://www.google.com/patents/US7296798

story:
Short Summary

My name is Kit LaHaise, and I'm a game master.  Anima: Beyond Fantasy is a thematically stunning and incredibly detailed roleplaying game released through Fantasy Flight Games.  Unfortunately, there can be a lot that needs to be kept track of, both for the players and the game master.

I'm teaming up with coder H. Arnold Jones to create the Anima Character Editor - a program for Windows that will help players and game masters with character and creature creation.  This program will make character creation much quicker, and handle the majority of the mechanics for keeping track of the details.

I know what a good character editor can do to help make a game easier and faster to play, so I decided to make one.  I would be grateful for anyone who would be willing to contribute to this project and see it through to completion.

What We Need & What You Get

We're asking for $500, which is about the cost of the program needed to build the GUI.  That's really all we're asking for - the cost of getting the program to build this character editor.  Anything beyond that will help to cover personal time and effort - data entry, programming, and the time we're taking away from other projects to get this done.

Having the project fully-funded will keep this at the top of our priority list and ensure the project gets completed.  If we do not meet our goal we will continue the effort at our own pace with an aim to release the project “eventually”.  Help us and help the community by making ACE possible!

Perks

For $25, we'll put your name into the special thanks in the program, showing our gratitude for the donation.  Every little bit helps, of course!

For $50, I'll make a character to be included with the program, made to your specifications.  It has to be a legal character, designed using the Anima game system, and can include rules from any of the English-released rulebooks.  The character will be built using the ACE generator, and a piece of original art for the character will be created and used for the character's icon. I'll be paying for this art out-of-pocket, so we're limiting this to ten people.  Of course, we'll also add you to the special thanks!  You will also be given a digital copy of the character art, independent of the editor, for personal use.

For $100, not only will you get the chance to have a personalized character included with the generator, along with a unique character portrait, you will also get original music inspired by the character!  This piece of music will be unique to your character, and sent only to you - to keep for yourself or share with anyone you wish.  This music will not be released with the editor - it will only go to those who donate at this level.  To keep this a special treat, only five people are allowed this perk.  The music will be composed by H. Arnold Jones of CFX Music (http://www.cfxmusic.com/), one of the programmers for ACE.

The Impact

Anima: Beyond Fantasy is a wonderful blend of Final Fantasy-esque and anime-inspired themes, but character creation and creature generation can slow the action down.  The ACE generator intends to make character creation much faster and easier. It’s a great place for storing campaign notes and taking the headache out of character management, so players and game masters to get into what's important - playing and enjoying the game.

While the program will make playing the game easier, we will not be copying rules - you will still need the proper books to play the game.  However, the ACE will helpfully cross-reference source  books and page numbers for ease of reference, and you will be able to select optional rules and  which books are allowed for character creation and play.

We also support updates!  Any time a new book comes out, we will strive to include the information for that book in the next version of the editor, and all editors will be updated with this new information.

Once the project is completed, we intend to release the program as a free, open-source service to the community, allowing anyone to modify and customize their own version of ACE, or contribute fixes or new material.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help to spread the word, and make ACE more than a fantasy!

story:
What we're trying to accomplish

By contributing you are supporting WWII Online's Marketing effort to push knowledge of our game to a mass of gamers currently active at MMORPG.com.

  • We will be in 8 newsletter circulations
  • Each circulation includes 250,000 impressions

How your contribution helps

You will be directly supporting the game by populating the battlefield with new free to play users.

How soon we get started

As soon as we get the required funds to get going, we begin the immediate weekend following.

Why you should contribute

If you're a die hard WWII Online fan who has wondered how you could help press our marketing potential, now is the perfect time!

What is a featured partner?

For the first 50 contributors you will be listed as a "Featured Partner." This is a list of folks who have pledged their support to WWII Online's Marketing Expansion project of August-September 2012 by increasing awareness of the game to the users of mmorpg.com newsletter.

Once we have reached our goal this list will be compiled and sent to our social media outlets, our forums, and front page to show our appreciation for your help.

story:
My name is Max Anders.  I am a graduate of Dallas Seminary and earned my doctorate at Western Seminary.  I have taught at the college and seminary level, have pastored for many years, am an author of over 25 books, including the bestselling 30 Days to Understanding the Bible, and am the creator and general editor of the 32-volume Holman Bible Commentary Series. 

I have recently created a DVD-based discipleship curriculum entitled, The Brave New Discipleship System.  It includes four courses, 36 lessons, 18 hours of instruction, that enable a person to learn more, easier, and faster than any other resource I know of.  I am preparing to convert the hard-copy version to an Internet course to make it more affordable and more accessible to a greater number of people, including international destinations where hardcopies are difficult and expensive to send. 

Most Christians would like to know the Bible better and how to live it.  But it can be overwhelming. We help you learn what you need to know, what you were meant to be, and what you are gifted to do - easier and faster - giving you the biblical foundation to realize your God-given potential. 

I would like to get this life-changing information into the hands of everyone who wants it.  However, the hardcopy of the curriculum is expensive and is typically only available if a church purchases it and provides it for its members.  However, if the information is converted to an Internet course, then for a modest monthly fee, anyone can have affordable access to it, and build a foundation of biblical knowledge that will enable them guide and accelerate their spiritual growth. 

For those who contribute, you will play a vital role in making this breakthrough Bible teaching available to a very large population from all over the world, helping spread the gospel and understanding of Scripture, and helping to improve lives for time and eternity.  Individuals from countries where Christian material is restricted, or very hard to come by, would find it especially valuable.  You could help make a life-changing difference for many people all over the world. 

We need $10,000 to help make this happen.  That money will go toward:

  • Web-site creation, tech support, programming, graphics, etc.
  • Training and hardware updates
  • Marketing, search-engine optimization, split-testing, Google ad-words, social media ads, etc. 

Learning what the Bible teaches and how to live it can be overwhelming.You cannot live what you don’t know or understand, and you cannot know and understand a very complex subject unless someone does a superior job of teaching you. 

It is not possible to reduce the Bible/Christian life to the snap of a finger, but it is possible to make it clearer and easier than it often is. If you want to get up to speed quickly, you have to have the essentials distilled into a compact and easy-to-learn summary, and conveyed in an enjoyable and effective way.That’s just what I’ve done.

This material was field-tested by over 1500 people from over 50 churches across the United States.The results were enthusiastic and convincing. Here are some testimonies:

  • Going through these courses changed my life.  There’s no other way to say it.  D. V. N.
  • This is really superb stuff.  Very impressive.  This is way beyond what I expected.  – K. A.
  • The quality of this seems inspired. – B. L.
  • Awesome!  More, more, more!  This study was easy to facilitate and encouraged me to further study on a personal level. – P. D.
  • This is an excellent course for the mature believer and the spiritual “infant” alike.  I went into it thinking it might be a little too elementary for me.  It is very elementary, and yet profound.  I loved the course and plan to use it in my own discipleship ministries. – J. N.
  • I am over 50 years old and have been a Christian all my life.  As a layperson, I have been delighted by the depth this class has taken me to.  It’s incredible in its depth, and ability to take even mature Christians to the next level of devotion and commitment. – J. H.

The subject is compelling, the product is groundbreaking, and the results are confirmed. All that remains is to make it available to the world in an acceptable and affordable format. Your contributions will help make that possible.

I was once a new Christian, and for years had to slog my way through mountains of hard-to-understand information before I was able to see the forest for the trees.  But after 12 years of higher education, forty years of ministry and thousands of hours of research and development to create The Brave New Discipleship System, I have done much of the hard work for others, making this one of the most valuable and effective Bible teaching tools available. 

This is not talking-head instruction.  Rather, it includes eye-popping pictures, creative visuals, graphics and effective use of on-screen text, with riveting teaching that makes a 25-minute lesson seem like 10 minutes!  It uses the latest in educational methodology to drive home truth in a groundbreaking way, and reaches the heart as well as the head. See samples in this 12-minute video.

Because the material has already been created and field-tested, risk is modest.  The money is being raised simply to create the Internet presence necessary to allow those interested to know about it, and to make it affordable for an average person, as well as to make it available worldwide. 

If you have a heart for discipleship, for life transformation in Christ, for new believers being established, and growing Christians being strengthened in the their faith, then jump in to help.  You'll notice some of the perks we are offering for your participation.

If you can help - and even if you can't - please share this opportunity with your friends… Facebook… Twitter… personal contact.   Indiegogo has share tools you can use as well.

story:
This year after returning to the Default World in Sparks, NV from the Burn, fellow Barbie Death Villager CJ Crucial had her full BASE jumping rig burglarized from behind the Golden Guns Tattoo parlor in the Pyramid Center strip mall. (BASE jumping, for those who don’t know, is a sport in which participants jump off of fixed objects such as bridges and buildings with a parachute.) 

After spending 8 years in Brazil (having spent nearly 3 of those cycling across Brazil and living in a tent), she came here to the USA for the Burn and to travel, BASE jump, and earn certifications. CJ has spent the past 5-6 years traveling and trying to change the world for the better through her project "Be Crucial." 

 She's organized numerous charity events with various sports (slackline, skydiving, running, and martial arts) trying to encourage people to improve their own lives, thereby improving their communities and ultimately the world. CJ holds several records in highlining, BASE jumping, and skydiving. 

She came here with the clothes on her back and her rig. Now her rig is gone and her future here is uncertain. 

 Our aim is to drum up the generous and loving support of the Burner community that is so important to all of us. We would like to replace her rig, restore her faith in humanity, and put her back on the path she set out on when she arrived here in America. Any donations, support or networking that can be provided to help CJ in her goal of finding a new rig will be greatly appreciated!!!

Payments of any amount can be made by credit/debit cards or paypal through this website. The money will be held for sixty days throughout the duration of this campaign and then donated to CJ for the sole purpose of replacing her stolen rig and continuing her work. Thank you all for your time, consideration and donations. The world is a better place with a bit of adventure!

story:
This is a fixed funding campaign, which means Dragons Hunter will only happen if we reach our goal. 

If funded, Dragons Hunter will be released on App Store, Google Play, and Steam Windows / Mac . The final product will support the English,Japanese,French,Italian,German and Spanish languages.

                                    Overview

Earth, sky, living in the times that all the residents, Synthetic filled with the greatest vitality of the times. Compared to the world now, has become very simple. That is - hunting, or hunting. 

In Dragons Hunter , the player can act as a hunter, and enjoy the different hunting life.continue to complete the task, access to money and equipment with a wide range of material, and to their increased level of hunters. 

The game system are colorful, such as: hunger, can kill monsters, access to raw meat, can the Kao Shu added that the stores do not have to go look at the boss's face . 

The type of task is more. Owners. Collection. Crusade. Catch. No level of the game set.'s General Naiwan degrees for the game is very good.

Adding the concept of game time, players at different times will be out for different kinds of monster, the monster's activities during the day temperature than pure, and at night appear to be more ferocious monster of the main carnivorous monsters.

a large number of new elements, players will bring both familiar and new hunting experience. So first let’s see some picture. Aren’t they cool?

                                  Dragons

Dragons are the central aspect of the Game series. Dragons are creatures in the World of Game. Many look natural, but some of them have a mythical appearance, and some of them possess mystical, supernatural, and even divine powers. Each of these Dragons have abilities that can make them pose a challenge to any hunter. Dragons provide materials, success, fame and glory as hunting them progresses the hunter through the game.


                                  Weapon Types

As for now, according to four generations accumulation , there are 6 kinds of weapon for players to choose.They are:

Great Sword：It is large, slow weapons. Whilst charging an attack, Hunters are hard to knock over with low-damage monster attacks. 

Tachi：long, slender blades designed for elegant movements. 

Sword and Shield：it is very quick ,small and accompanied by a shield that allows the Hunter to block most attacks they are very quick.

Dual Swords:  it is similar to Sword and Shields but with a stronger focus on .Like Sword and Shields, individual Dual Sword attacks cause a small amount of damage, but they are fast and flow easily into combos.

Hammers:  it is large, heavy weapons which are capable of dealing the vast amounts of damage in a single combo. 

The Bow:  it is a fast, unique ranged weapon. An infinite quiver of arrows is automatically provided, although each individual doesn't do a great deal of damage.

                                   Armor

Many players on the suit of armor to create and collect great interest.

                                  Elements

Elements are the secondary damage done by a Weapon's or a Monster's attack. Like raw damage, it is done directly. How much the Element effects a Monster or a Hunter is dependent on the monster's weaknesses, resistances, or the Hunter's equipped Armor Pieces or Armor Sets. Specific parts in a Monster's body may have differing Elemental Weaknesses and Resistances.The Elements in the game are Fire, Water, Thunder and Ice.  

Fire is a common element found in nature. Many species of wyverns are imbued with it. Using Flame Sacs or other flammable materials, hunters can forge weapons with fire element, as well as armor. 

Water is an element that is extremely abundant in nature. Weapons and armor can be imbued with the element of water.

Thunder is an element that is rarely found in nature.

Ice attributed attack induces Iceblight, which causes the hunter's Stamina to be depleted rapidly while sprinting or other similar actions. 

                                   Status Effects

Poison:  A common status effect that causes a gradual loss of health over a period of time. Depending on the monster and the rank of the quest, the Poison can drain the health bar at a faster rate than normal. The duration of Poison can be increased, decreased, or negated altogether with an appropriate skill. Poison is indicated visually by purple bubbles emitted by the victim.

Paralys:  It is A dreaded status effect that completely immobilizes for a certain period of time, leaving the victim helpless. Upon being Paralyzed, the Hunter will fall down on their face (or remain motionless in an arched position underwater) and yellow sparks of lightning will be seen passing through their body. 

Sleep:  Some monsters have the potential to put Hunters to Sleep. It is similar to Paralysis in that it leaves the Hunter unable to do anything. However, damage taken when asleep is greatly increased and will end the status after one hit. The duration of Sleep can be increased, decreased, or negated altogether with an appropriate skill.

Stun:  Occurs when a Hunter receives many attacks in a short period of time. When Stunned/Knocked Out, movement, attacking and items are completely disabled. The visual indication is a ring of yellow stars spinning above the affected target's head. All monsters can inflict Stun by means of repeated physical attacks, but some can inflict it immediately by emitting an extremely bright flash of light, or another special technique. 

                                   Boss site damage

Some boss of specific parts, such as the head, tail or wings, can be destroyed.

                                   Life & Hunting

 Life is just like a dragon hunting , the big dragon is our aim in life, it’s also the things we want or we dream. But the way to success is long and rigor, because in our daily life, we always meet many problems, just like the small monsters which always disturb you when you are on the way to search the boss.

Now,do you want to be a brave hunter?not only in game ,but also in life, when I meet challenges, I could face them bravely. And I also want to say, Dragons Hunter is an endless game, life is an endless hunting, a hunting is over and a new one is start. Of course we sometimes fail again and again, but we can’t give up. Never Never give UP!!!

Owners. Collection. Crusade. Catch. No level of the game set.'s General Naiwan degrees for the game is very good.Adding the concept of game time, players at different times will be out for different kinds of monster, the monster's activities during the day temperature than pure, and at night appear to be more ferocious monster of the main carnivorous monsters.a large number of new elements, players will bring both familiar and new hunting experience. So first let’s see some picture. story:
USE IT AS YOU WOULD LIKE – MADE IN GERMANY



WHAT IS THE MAGNO© Seat?

The MAGNO© Seat is a magnetic based chair that gives you a hovering feeling. The seat uses magnets to levitate it and move it in every direction.

Play all your games and listen to your music from all other electronic devices with ease,  Such as computers, mobile phones, and tablets.

Gravity, what is that? Fully detached, the MAGNO© Seat floats in the air, ready for the new generation of players, ready for absolute realism in In-Game feeling.
The highlight: whoever sits in the floating armchair becomes the operator and will have the full steering control in all 3 dimensions.

The MAGNO© Seat was specially designed for the world of games and is available in different variations.

As „Cineastic Start“, the MAGNO© Seat is the most futuristic TV armchair a living room has ever seen. Equipped for any position and inclination – operated easily by the supplied APP-Control. An absolute „must have“ for real cineaste.

Who ever really wants to get actively immersed into the third dimension of gaming it is capable to transform the MAGNO© Seat into a cockpit of the next generation by adding several AddONs, like a modular system.


CONVENIENCE AND FUNCTIONALITY

Many people use an armchair with headphones to relax comfortably. These chairs are mostly designer furniture, limited in their options and usually very expensive.

The materials used, depending on the model, fiberglass or carbon fiber for the outer sides

and high quality durable fabric or leather for upholstery.

The MAGNO© Seat is currently available in 6 different colors. Black, Red, Yellow, Blue, White, Sand / Cream for the fiberglass models, and pure carbon fiber for the carbon fiber model.

It is also possible at the time of ordering to select a color of their own wish.  (A small fee will apply)

The AddON part are made of aluminum but can also be requested in carbon fiber.  (A small fee will apply)



INTRODUCTION ... THE MAGNO© Seat

MAGNO© Seat owners can now enjoy all the benefits of an armchair with an adjustable seat position.

MAGNO© Seat supports most input devices such as steering wheel, joystick, cyclick, throttle and pedals with most of the popular consoles that are used today.

The MAGNO© Seat comes with everything you need to get started.


COMFORT FOOTREST


Relaxation on a high level. Manufactured in high quality aluminum, comfortable, height adjustable and freely tilt able.
You do not need to be living the high life, to enjoy this comfortable AddON- element.
If you don’t need it, it folds away to the side. The element can also be removed when not needed. An elegant supporting cushion fitting the design complements the accessory.
The footrest is simultaneously the basis for the comfort pad and supporting the different pedal controls by e.g. using the MAGNO© Seat as game seat.


Entertainment SOUNDSYSTEM Ready


Expectations can be high. Appealing to all of the senses – for the ears only the best by Bose®.
The crystal clear sound of the MAGNO© Seat Sound system is perfectly tuned to your requirements and leaves nothing to be desired.
Experience the fine-tuned sound technology and allow yourself to be inspired and float in the air.


JOYSTICK Ready


For breathtaking maneuver. The High-End-Joystick ensures optimal steering control in the MAGNO© Seat, either with the pilot-variation or the racing gear change lever like in a car.
The function of this game- and steering element gives you total control for the entire implemented computer system. Steer a car or a plane, determine the movement of a person or position the cursor on your own user interface.

Multidirectionally operate able. This joystick with the multidirectional head is available for left- or right-handed people.
hether by Logitech or Saitek: a slip-proof surface including an ergonomic shape provides the necessary haptic.
A stable version, high- standard fitted parts and a modern timeless design characterize this new AddON.


THROTTLE Ready


FullThrottle – step in the gas. Whether car or racing boat - with the THROTTLE Ready you will be at the top in every race.
The throttle provides the necessary speed and can be assembled optionally on the left or right side of the armchair. It’s has a pleasantly smooth surface and the stepless control system gives the player secureness and a real life experience.






OCULUS RIFT Ready


Believe your eyes. Virtual reality meets the highest demands. Games in Full HD (or 4k) experience even more realism!!
These glasses have an OLED Display with a visibility field of 110° (diagonal, 90° horizontal) replay in 16:10 picture ratio, a 3-axis-gyrometer and an acceleration sensor.
Head Tracking provides an ideal alignment of your position within the seat. Current Oculus Rift devices are supported by integrated interface.
The virtual reality AddON is suitable for professionals or those who want to fully submerge in a game and bear the tingling sensation of the kick from free-falling.


CYCLICK Ready


Ground Control to Major Tom. With Cyclick by Saitek flight acrobats can experience their personal high-altitude flight.
Securely mounted, you can even easily perform the most complex flight maneuver so that reality and simulation merge.
The MAGNO© Seat with this AddON, can be used as a simulator for the training of future pilots. Become a Highflyer with CYCLICK.


STEERING WHEEL Ready


Total reality by Force Feedback. This race steering wheel lets you feel every single bump, every collision and all drift movement in breathtaking authenticity. Are you ready for the adrenalin kick?
Applying steer-, gear change-, brakes- and acceleration functions of the MAGNO© Seat every race simulation becomes so realistic that you instantly want to fasten your seatbelt.

With Force Feedback to Pole Position. Thanks to realistic steering resistance additionally equipped with Force Feedback, this steering wheel brings formula 1 race directly to your living room. If the steering wheel is not needed, it can be easily folded away to the side.


PEDALS Ready


Ready, Set, RACE. Get in and step on the gas.
Racing games become even more realistic with the Logitech progressive pedals, fulfilling the game package of MAGNO© Seat.
They allow precise and comfortable braking as well as acceleration of the simulation, it’s almost feels real.
The pedals adapt elegantly in the foot rest – this is how your MAGNO© Seat transfers from a Cineast-Seat into a „Ten Second Car“ within seconds.



For Developers


For Developers the MAGNO© Seat offers a new game generation playground. Ranging from extensive functional access through SDK to sandbox for the control in all 3 dimensions.

Enter the developer Pack and easily create personal realistic simulations and games.
We offer the adjusted DEVKIT Design as well as entrance to the developers network. Share your progress steps and exchange experiences or simply be State of the Art yourself.
Be the measure of all things and make your MAGNO© Seat be the 360-degree experience of a special kind.



The developer Kit provides interfaces which enables all functional elements of the MAGNO© Seat - game developments and applications simulate even more realistic.
MAGNO© Seat APIs can comfortably be integrated in the Microsoft Visual Studio.



App + App Store


With the MAGNO© Seat App your new world can be controlled without any problem. For example: your inclination or position of the seat can easily be configurated. The App is available for Windows Phone, Android and iOS.
All steering options of the MAGNO© Seat can be obtained in App Stores.



CONSOLES – PLUG & PLAY
Simply connect and get started. Currently we support PS3, PS4 as well as XboxOne and Xbox360.
The MAGNO© Seat provides a suitable interface so the mentioned consoles can easily be connected. Experience games in a totally new dimension!

At the present time we support kinetic based hardware control „Kinect“ of Microsoft gaming console.
Connect directly your Kinect to MAGNO© Seat and experience the maximum of realistic control.



PC – PLUG & PLAY
Simply connect your PC to the MAGNO© Seat and you will not only experience emotions – enjoy the 3rd dimension even with traditional games.
The MAGNO© Seat offers you all kinds of Plug and Play variations. Get in and get started!
The MAGNO© Seat- gaming experience from a different world. For all those who think of board games when it’s only 2 dimensional. Experience the gaming armchair of the next generation – either for cineast movie pleasure of a different kind or the complete simulator of a new type - for all professional players.



PLUG & PLAY - SUPPLIES (MAGNO© Seat DELUXE)
In package MAGNO© Seat DELUXE we supply an IPad mini. We provide it pre-configured with the MAGNO© Seat App.
Connect to the MAGNO© Seat and enjoy!




PLUG & PLAY - SUPPLIES OPTIONAL
For control via MAGNO© Seat App optional an IPod can be ordered.
We provide it pre-configured with the MAGNO© Seat App.
Connect to the MAGNO© Seat and enjoy!

WHAT EXACTLY CAN THE MAGNO© Seat do?

The MAGNO© Seat floats by means of magnets over the base unit.
With control magnets the desired position can be set by the use of an app.


For the living room for reading, watching television or just for relaxing and enjoying...

With the MAGNO© Seat, you can relax and listen to music while their Bluetooth or W-LAN enabled device, watch TV or just read a book in a relaxed position. To change the seat position, it is possible to turn the chair using our easy-to-use app 360 degrees and tilt up to 15 degrees forwards or backwards.

For real action & In-Game feeling
For Racers & Pilots or just Simulators

The MAGNO© Seat communicates via standard interfaces with your game console or PC.
Play with your phone or tablet while sitting in your MAGNO© Seat and enjoy the synchronized movements of the chair with the game.

Movements in all directions are possible.
The integrated sound system will give you a feeling of being part of the game.


TECHNICAL DETAILS

 The MAGNO Seat weights only <50kg and has a lifting capacity of 200kg.


WORKS WITH PHONES, TABLETS, PC & GAME CONSOLES

The MAGNO© Seat works with most models. By using the easy access over Bluetooth or W- LAN you will have control over the seat. If only to listen to the music or to obtain realistic game feedback.


FAST, POWERFUL, EASY-TO-USE APP

The first time you plug in your MAGNO© Seat you will be prompted to download our free Apple, Android or WIN phone app. The app requires no setup, and you will immediately see the options to use the MAGNO© Seat.

In the settings you can connect your devices. Now you can instantly listen to music, change your seating position or play your favorite game on your tablet or game console.



For developers: There will be an interface available in the developer pack.


WHO WE ARE

The team of MAGNO© Seat is based in Munich/Germany.
We develop "High Performance Applications" for companies and self made hard & software projects for customers.
Finding customized solutions for customers- this is what the MAGNO© team stands for.


THE TEAM

The team behind MAGNO© Seat has more than 30 years of experience. Headed by Andy Schuller, founder, CEO & product designer. 

The MAGNO© Seat business unit concentrates on both the research and development of new technologies and opportunities for the production of clever & smart products in the hardware and software sectors.

CSC - clever - simple & cool


Magno© Seat is the revolution in the world of modern furniture.
This dream begins with a comfortable seat which floats by the force of the magnets! Feet lie on a footrest. Along with the soundsystem you can find rest after the stressfull work.


The Magno© Seat App controls your seat tilt or let your seat be a seesaw. If you still have energy put the pedals into the footrest, waving the arm of steering wheel and joystick and use it as a game seat.

More accessories of Magno© Seat are throttle and cyclick. With the optional 3D virtual Oculus Rift your games will be much more real. Conquer the skies from home! Connect your console (PS3, PS4, XboxOne/Xbox360) or your PC with the Magno© Seat module and enjoy your games. Your Kinect will be also supported.
Game Developers have an extensive feature access via a SDK. The developer package enables you to develop real games. We offer an adapted DEVKIT Design and an access to the Developer Network. Magno© Seat API can be integrated into Microsoft Visual Studio.

ONE SEAT, MANY SCOPE TO USE IT!


FEATURES

• The first magnetic levitation chair

• Free universal app for Apple devices, Android and WIN phone. (Phone & tablet).

• Music player function with direct playback via the integrated highend speaker
   system.

• Interfaces to game consoles such as X Box 360 / X-Box ONE Playstation 3 and 4

• Tilt and rotation of the MAGNO© Seats - controlled via free MAGNO© Seat APP.

• Connection of external devices such as a steering wheel, throttle stick, joystick,
  Cyclick, pedals, ...

• Can be extended with new functions and hardware - such as the MAGNO© Surf

• Easy to use: Plug and Play

• Fully developed and manufactured in Germany



LET THIS DREAM COME TRUE AND SUPPORT US
Any amount from the development to the series production will be needed. The first 100 pieces are for the Kick-off.

The first protypes we have produced handmade to evaluate it in form, mode and physics. We are already in negotiation with producers of parts for this seat. In series production the parts will at least time matched to give you a qualitative good product.

WHERE WE ARE AT

If you check our timeline below, we started this project back in December 2013. 

Currently we are building the second prototype and developing the Apps and software devices.  So the selection of suppliers and manufacturers are almost complete.

However we need your help to improve the software and hardware.   We need larger machines for making the cups and attached parts.

If we get funding we will be able to complete all models and can start to ship them in early August.


OUR PROMISE TO YOU

Each of our MAGNO© Seats corresponds to the highest quality and will be further developed by us under constant examination.

The entire production is being carried out exclusively in Germany, so for all production steps quality control can be assured and intervened immediately if necessary.

Become part of this world innovation which enables people all over the world something else as the known chill factor or games enjoyment.


We will basic new products and innovations to realize our dreams of products, which can be used all over the world at reasonable prices.


TIMELINE

The MAGNO© Seat provides a suitable interface so the mentioned consoles can easily be connected. 
Experience games in a totally new dimension!
At the present time we support kinetic based hardware control „Kinect“ of Microsoft gaming console.Connect directly your Kinect to MAGNO© Seat and experience the maximum of realistic control.








PC – PLUG & PLAY 

Simply connect your PC to the MAGNO© Seat and you will not only experience emotions – enjoy the 3rd dimension even with traditional games.  The MAGNO© Seat offers you all kinds of Plug and Play variations. Get in and get started! 
The MAGNO© Seat- gaming experience from a different world. For all those who think of board games when it’s only 2 dimensional. Experience the gaming armchair of the next generation – either for cineast movie pleasure of a different kind or the complete simulator of a new type - for all professional players.








PLUG & PLAY - SUPPLIES (MAGNO© Seat DELUXE) 

In package MAGNO© Seat DELUXE we supply an IPad mini. We provide it pre-configured with the MAGNO© Seat App. Connect to the MAGNO© Seat and enjoy!  









PLUG & PLAY - SUPPLIES OPTIONAL
For control via MAGNO© Seat App optional an IPod can be ordered.  We provide it pre-configured with the MAGNO© Seat App. Connect to the MAGNO© Seat and enjoy!   


WHAT EXACTLY CAN THE MAGNO© Seat do?
The MAGNO© Seat floats by means of magnets over the base unit.With control magnets the desired position can be set by the use of an app.
For the living room for reading, watching television or just for relaxing and enjoying...With the MAGNO© Seat, you can relax and listen to music while their Bluetooth or W-LAN enabled device, watch TV or just read a book in a relaxed position. To change the seat position, it is possible to turn the chair using our easy-to-use app 360 degrees and tilt up to 15 degrees forwards or backwards.For real action & In-Game feeling
For Racers & Pilots or just Simulators
The MAGNO© Seat communicates via standard interfaces with your game console or PC.Play with your phone or tablet while sitting in your MAGNO© Seat and enjoy the synchronized movements of the chair with the game.Movements in all directions are possible. The integrated sound system will give you a feeling of being part of the game.

TECHNICAL DETAILS


 The MAGNO Seat weights only <50kg and has a lifting capacity of 200kg.

WORKS WITH PHONES, TABLETS, PC & GAME CONSOLES

The MAGNO© Seat works with most models. By
using the easy access over Bluetooth or W- LAN you will have control over the
seat. If only to listen to the music or to obtain realistic game
feedback. 


FAST, POWERFUL, EASY-TO-USE APP
The first time you plug in your MAGNO© Seat you will be prompted to download our free Apple, Android or WIN phone app. The app requires no setup, and you will immediately see the options to use the MAGNO© Seat.
In the settings you can connect your devices.
Now you can instantly listen to music, change your seating position or play your favorite game on your tablet or game console.



For developers: There will be an interface available in the developer pack.

WHO WE ARE

The team of MAGNO© Seat is based in Munich/Germany. We develop "High Performance Applications" for companies and self made hard & software projects for customers. 
Finding customized solutions for customers- this is what the MAGNO© team stands for.



THE TEAM
The team behind MAGNO© Seat has more than 30 years of experience. Headed by Andy Schuller, founder, CEO & product designer. 
The MAGNO© Seat business unit concentrates on both the research and development of new technologies and opportunities for the production of clever & smart products in the hardware and software sectors.
CSC - clever - simple & cool

Magno© Seat is the revolution in the world of modern furniture.
This dream begins with a comfortable seat which floats by the force of the magnets!
Feet lie on a footrest. Along with the soundsystem you can find rest after the stressfull work.



The Magno© Seat App controls your seat tilt or let your seat be a seesaw.
If you still have energy put the pedals into the footrest, waving the arm of steering wheel and joystick and use it as a game seat.
More accessories of Magno© Seat are throttle and cyclick. With the optional 3D virtual Oculus Rift your games will be much more real. Conquer the skies from home!
Connect your console (PS3, PS4, XboxOne/Xbox360) or your PC with the Magno© Seat module and enjoy your games. Your Kinect will be also supported.
Game Developers have an extensive feature access via a SDK. The developer package enables you to develop real games. We offer an adapted DEVKIT Design and an access to the Developer Network.  Magno© Seat API can be integrated into Microsoft Visual Studio.


ONE SEAT, MANY SCOPE TO USE IT!
FEATURES

•
The first magnetic levitation chair

•
Free universal app for Apple devices, Android and WIN phone. (Phone &
tablet).

• Music
player function with direct playback via the integrated highend speaker   system.

•
Interfaces to game consoles such as X Box 360 / X-Box ONE Playstation 3 and 4

•
Tilt and rotation of the MAGNO© Seats - controlled via free MAGNO© Seat APP.

•
Connection of external devices such as a steering wheel, throttle stick,
joystick, 
  Cyclick, pedals, ...

• Can be extended
with new functions and hardware - such as the MAGNO© Surf

• Easy
to use: Plug and Play

•
Fully developed and manufactured in Germany

LET THIS DREAM COME TRUE AND SUPPORT US


Any amount from the development to the series production will be needed.
The first 100 pieces are for the Kick-off.The first protypes we have produced handmade to evaluate it in form, mode and physics. We are already in negotiation with producers of parts for this seat. In series production the parts will at least time matched to give you a qualitative good product.



WHERE WE ARE AT
If you check our timeline below, we started this project back in December 2013. 
Currently we are building the second prototype and developing the Apps and software devices.  So the selection of suppliers and manufacturers are almost complete.
However we need your help to improve the software and hardware.   We need larger machines for making the cups and attached parts.
If we get funding we will be able to complete all models and can start to ship them in early August.




OUR PROMISE TO YOU
Each of our MAGNO© Seats corresponds to the
highest quality and will be further developed by us under constant examination.


The entire production is being carried out exclusively in Germany, so for all
production steps quality control can be assured and intervened immediately if
necessary.
Become part of this world innovation which enables people all over the world something else as the known chill factor or games enjoyment.



We will basic new products and innovations to realize our dreams of products, which can be used all over the world at reasonable prices.


TIMELINE

story:
Short Summary

Hello, and thank you for checking out my project!  My name is Becca Carr and, with your help and contributions I will open what we have termed a “barcade” – my partners and investors are opening an arcade, dance floor, and bar called The Arcade Asylum, LLC.   This arcade will be located in the downtown area of Birmingham, AL, close to where I currently live.

I am extremely excited to be owner and operator of The Arcade Asylum, LLC.  I feel that this is a chance to give back to the city that has helped shape me and has given me a future in a business that I love and frequent.  I want Birmingham, AL to grow and prosper its entertainment sector and one day I hope that this city will rival nearby Atlanta and New Orleans with a thriving interest in culture, history, fun, and atmosphere.  To be a part of this exciting time in Birmingham is an amazing opportunity of which I want to take full advantage.

My ultimate goal for funding is $250,000.  I will utilize grants, bank and SBA loans, investor and angel contributions, personal loans and gifts to reach this goal.  The money I make will go into start up costs for The Arcade Asylum, LLC, including but not limited to building and lease fees, employment, renovation, and inventory.  Any and all donations are welcome and even if I should not reach $250,000 immediately, I will still be able to use all funds given to further the business.

The Impact

Birmingham, AL is a beautiful city, but sometimes I fear that it gears itself more to small children and families.  The Arcade Asylum, LLC is an outlet for the adults to let loose and be a kid again.  We cater to those aged 21 and up who have a love for video gaming and remember how it felt to step into the arcade on Saturday once the mall opened up and game the day away.  To keep my patrons refreshed during their time spent at The Arcade Asylum, LLC I will provide adult beverages and invite patrons to order food from nearby establishments.  When patrons tire of video gaming they can hop on the dance floor and groove to the local DJ spinning records for the masses.  I also invite patrons to lounge on the patio and engage in a rousing board game with friends.

Other Ways You Can Help

In this economy, not everyone will be able to give financially.  That's ok!  Your moral support is much appreciated, and would you also consider spreading the word about my endeavor so that more people can share in the fun?  

 

Thanks!

story:
*This is a 30 Days Campaign

 

all 6 Updates !

 

What is Cropling ?

Well, do you remember gaming classics like "Harvest Moon" and "Zelda"?
"Cropling" is the best of both worlds and you are in for a treat if you like them.
 

Gameplay

Cropling is designed to be an action adventure game with strong harvesting and farming influences. It will be released on mobile platforms, PC(Win&Linux) and Mac.

 

Besides managing your own wonderful farm you can explore the exciting world of "Cropling",
master perilous quests and fight ravenous Monsters.
 
I want you to be creative, and to come up with your own ways

to cope with difficulties,

to personalize your farm and style and discover the secrets,

treasures and plots in the world of "Cropling".

Decide what and when to plant !

Veggie-friendly? Plant, water and harvest a wide range of vegetables, fruits or
even foliage that only provides raw materials for house constructions.
Your decisions directly affects the future of your farm and the ones

of the adjacent towns.

Extend your Farm !
Personalize your farm and boost your business by building a shed,

barn, mill, brewery tank, greenhouse and more !

Keep your own livestock !
Take care of cows, chickens, horses and/or other animals.

Befriend with pets !

Accompanying you and helping you out with your daily duties,
each animal comes with unique ability and teachable skills.

Trust your dog with guarding the livestock or let your cat chase away

harmful rodents.

Go on adventures !

Explore the world of "Cropling", discover great treasures and solve challenging riddles.
Defend the nearby city from raging beasts,
challenge them on their hunting ground or defeat them in their lairs.

Start a family !
Find the partner of your dreams and become a dad or a mom.
Raise and take care of your children.

Story

You're a young boy/girl on the way to your uncles farm.
Simply because your parents sent you over to help out for spring season. Well, kids can be adventurous sometimes, so when you find your uncle's farm deserted you simply write a letter to your parents that you arrived and are well -

Eventhough you realize that this circumstance is out of the ordinary.

But still the question about the whereabouts of your uncle waits to be answered! So you make contact with the citizens of a nearby village but everything you
come to know is that they don't know where your uncle is neither.
He cant be gone for to long ! There should be some fresh traces around...

You find some footprints who are leading to a riverside. Unfortunaly you

have to cross the river to keep following them, but you cant swim yet.
Mmh... Maybe you should come back in winter, when its frozen !

Apart from that you cant let your uncles lifework go to waste and take on

responsibilty for his farm, for as long as he isnt to be found.

To solve the mystery of the current whereabouts of your uncle,

you need your common sense and good investigation skills.
For keeping you fed and maintaining the farm you need devotion and patience.


What qualifies me going through the odyssee of making a game ?


I worked on 2 AAA titles which are namely

The Settlers 7: A Path to a Kingdomn by BlueByte | Ubisoft and

Risen 2 : Dark Waters by Piranha Bytes | Koch Media.

I was fortunate enough to learn from the professionals for 3 solid years.

I was both designing graphics and writing Tools for the graphics crew.

Furthermore I like popping bubble wrap for hours.

(Can you now tell how dedicated I am?)

 

How does your pledge affect Cropling ?

Your pledge is my basis for developing "Cropling".
The money will be used to update software
but mainly it will help me pay my rent as I keep developing the game.
And since I don't have an uncle whose farm I could take care of with
vegetables and fruits to eat, I have to feed myself the old fashioned way:
with money.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

There is no funding limit !

The dimension of the funding also dictates when the game will come out
and what the full game will include.
I could pay professional freelance artists which
help with animations, textures, etc -
So I can focus on programming the game.
That would lead to an earlier release of the game as much as to a wider/bigger content.

Every pledge adds to the quality of "Cropling".

 

What are the Stretch goals ?

I have alot in mind, but most of all I want a Coop-mode !

So:


#1 Stretch goal is reached at 15.000 and will unlock a Coop-mode !

 

How can you help besides from pledging money  ?

Tell your friends!
Some of them surely loved the "Harvest Moon" or "Zelda" series so
it's likely that they would love "Cropling" too! Everybody wants to be loved.
So does my game.


Telling your friends over Facebook, Twitter, etc. is very powerful.
Thank you in advance, for helping a small indie-developer to survive and to see his vision come true.

story:
El Proyecto

Hace dos años, desde Questron [[[ http://www.questrongroup.com ]]] iniciamos un proyecto de la nada para empezar a sacar ediciones limitadas en español de las nuevas ediciones de juegos de rol clásicos. Hoy en día, ya hemos sacado una edición limitada de la edición 25 Aniversario del juego rol "Paranoia" [Mongoose, 2009] y actualmente, queremos hacer lo mismo con el juego de rol clásico "Traveller" [Mongoose, 2008]




[de la wikipedia]

"Traveller es el primer título de una serie de juegos de rol de ciencia ficción, publicada inicialmente en 1977 por Game Designers' Workshop. Originariamente se pretendía que Traveller fuera un sistema de juego para aventuras de ciencia ficción con temática genérica de space opera, de la misma forma que Dungeons & Dragons es un sistema para aventuras de fantasía genérica. Sin embargo, una ambientación denominada El Tercer Imperio fue desarrollada con la publicación de diversos suplementos y a partir de entonces se ha identificado con el juego, de forma que para los seguidores el nombre Traveller y Tercer Imperio son sinónimos.

Las reglas de Traveller permiten construir una sociedad del futuro lejano que extrae su inspiración de las historias de la Fundación de Isaac Asimov, Dune de Frank Herbert, Espacio conocido de Larry Niven, CoDominio de Jerry Pournelle, la Liga Polesotécnica de Poul Anderson y varias otras obras de literatura de ciencia ficción. Se espera que los personajes viajen entre sistemas estelares, luchen en batallas terrestres y espaciales y se involucren en la economía interestelar. Los personajes de Traveller se definen en menor medida por la necesidad de incrementar las habilidades y capacidades iniciales. En cambio intentan lograr ventajas posicionales en forma de riquezas, aparatos tecnológicos, títulos y poder político. A pesar de que cualquiera de los sistemas de juego podría ser usado en muchas ambientaciones de ciencia ficción, la mayoría de los suplementos publicados ha tenido que ver en alguna forma con el Tercer Imperio, también denominado habitualmente «Universo Oficial de Traveller» (OTU, Official Traveller universe)"



Desde hace más de veinte años, este juego no ha visto una edición en español, ahora, gracias a la ayuda concedida por los amigos de QuestronRol a través de su página de Facebook  [ https://www.facebook.com/Questronrol ] ya hemos conseguido sacar una edición de este manual en PDF (de venta en la página de Mongoose Publishing) ...


Actualmente con esta campaña lo que queremos sacar es una edición limitada IMPRESA, con tapa dura satinada, compuesta por 210 páginas en blanco, negro y grises, utilizando papel satinado de 105gsm, de la traducción al español del juego original en inglés.

Tal y como hemos explicado, el juego ya está traducido, maquetado y editado en PDF, por lo que esta campaña sería para recaudar fondos los gastos de impresión y envío a los colaboradores/mecenas.

En el precio incluímos el % que se lleva la plataforma de mecenazgo, los gastos de envío por mensajería 48h, caja de envío, y por supuesto, los gastos de producción. El margen de beneficio es 0 para Questron.

Anteriormente, en nuestra campaña personal, ya recogimos fondos para hacer una primera tirada impresa, pero debido a que la repercusión de esa primera recaudación fue bastante reducida, llegando a oídos tan sólo del núcleo que formábamos en Questron-Rol, decidimos, tras recibir numerosas peticiones por parte de aficionados y tiendas del ramo, abrir una nueva campaña una vez el juego estuviera traducido y maquetado para que todo el mundo tuviera la oportunidad de hacerse con un ejemplar.

No existe ningún riesgo a la hora de contribuir a esta campaña. Tal y como hicimos en nuestras campañas personales, Questron se compromete a sacar adelante este proyecto se recaude lo que se recaude. Simplemente queremos respaldarnos con toda la ayuda posible, pero el juego impreso SALDRÁ, repetimos, se recaude lo que se recaude.

Lo que más necesitamos, además de vuestro apoyo económico, es que esta campaña no padezca el mismo mal que padeció nuestra primera campaña personal, y esto es: NECESITAMOS QUE LA GENTE SEPA QUE ESTE PROYECTO EXISTE. Por favor, difúndelo como veas oportuno y puedas. De igual manera que necesitamos vuestro dinero, también necesitamos vuestra voz.
El tiempo de espera a la hora de recibir vuestras recompensas será mínimo. Como hemos dicho ya en este texto, el juego ya está traducido, maquetado y editado en PDF. Una vez finalizada la campaña, se daría orden de impresión, y una vez recibidos todos los ejemplares, les haríamos llegar sus ejemplares correspondientes a cada mecenas a través de mensajería (no correos, mensajería, servicio 48h)... Esto es, nos comprometemos a que los libros estarán en vuestra casa a los dos meses de finalizar la campaña.

Obviamente, todo este proyecto cuenta con el consentimiento y apoyo de la editorial Mongoose Publishing, poseedora de los derechos sobre este juego.

Por favor, no dudéis en hacernos llegar cualquier duda o pregunta que se os pueda plantear al respecto de este proyecto a través de esta misma página, o a través de nuestro mail traduciendorol@gmail.com
