story:
I'm proud to announce that a portion of the profit made from the development of Syndemic will be donated to the Canadian Cancer Society! This includes money from this Indiegogo campaign and any future campaigns in 2013.  
 
However, this association does not mean that Syndemic has been 'endorsed' by the Canadian Cancer Society, and the science I present in the game does not reflect the actual research that they do. To read up on what the money will go towards, check out their site: www.cancer.ca. 
 
The portion I donate is based on whether I reach my goal of $7650 US: 
 
  • 5% of all profit under this goal is donated. 
  • 10% of all profit over this goal is added to the initial donation. 
 
For more details about the fees and the calculations I will use, check out the update page here. 
 
My goal with Syndemic is to inspire people to dig into real science and learn about the cool processes that occur all around us. Because of the subject matter, I have a unique opportunity to support real disease research. And if I can provide some empowerment and catharsis by letting players destroy diseases with satisfying weapons, then even better!



Syndemic is a randomly-generated action shooter game that emphasizes upgrades, quick reflexes, and microbial puzzle-solving in a biological setting.

Take control of a unique microbe that can dodge, tumble and weave through bodily tissues and avoid swarms of invasive pathogens. Accumulate a massive arsenal of antibiotic weaponry, upgrade your genome and cell structure, and unleash powerful metabolic abilities. Explore the human body, destroy invading diseases, assist the immune system, and ultimately, discover your origin and the fate of your host.

Are you a biological weapon designed to spread misery? Are you a genetic mutation, born of chance and driven by adaptation? Or are you the first of a divine plague, sent to bring microbial justice to a sinful world?

Play the Action Demo immediately HERE.

This demo represents a much more arcade-like experience than the full game. I aim to release a second demo featuring more adventure and loot-driven gameplay.






This project represents two of my interests: biology and games. While I am passionate about science, Syndemic is not intended to be true-to-life. My aim is to exaggerate the weirdness and coolness (and action) of real microbial ecology, and hopefully inspire players to dig deeper into the actual research that's out there.

My presentation of biology will be less about mechanics and more about the big-picture themes and ideas. I want people to question everything in the game, and I want them to come to their own conclusions about the issues raised. Genetic engineering, herd immunity, antibiotic resistance, and biological altruism are some of the themes I want to explore.

However, in keeping with the spirit of science, the game will include 'Reality Checks' that point out inaccuracies within the game when compared to real-life biology. Some examples include:

“Viruses are actually much smaller than bacteria, and can range in size from 1/10 to 1/100 of a bacterium.”

“Bacteriophages are viruses that target bacteria specifically. They are highly specialized to attack individual strains.”

“The presence of pathogens in the bloodstream is a serious and potentially fatal condition called Septicemia. If untreated, it can lead to septic shock and organ failure."






Syndemic represents a fusion of elements from two of my favourite genres: the 'roguelike' (Diablo, Torchlight, Borderlands), and the 'shoot-em-up' (Gradius, R-Type). There will also be elements of puzzle-solving based on human diseases.

Unlike generic action RPGs, Syndemic does not wholly rely on statistics and numbers to determine your success in battle. Your reflexes and anticipation are just as important as the power of your weapons or the activation of your abilities. Likewise, unlike generic action shooters, mashing the fire button is not a guarantee of success – you must use the right tool for the right enemy, and adapt your style of play to the environment.

Planned Features:

- Randomly-generated levels and environments filled with microscopic enemies and biological hazards.

- Experience events inspired by real biology: chase down a cancer cell before it metastasizes, investigate prion sightings in the brain, clear cholesterol from the bloodstream, and guide immune cells to sites of infection.

- More than 100 possible antibiotic weapon combinations, each with their own strengths and weaknesses, including rare 'designer drugs' capable of mowing down dozens of enemies in a single blast.

- Enlist or exploit the immune system; use the body's cells as shields, tools to solve puzzles, or feed them your slain enemies to gain powerful allies.

- Stylized, living backgrounds that simulate the interior of the human body... travel the bloodstream, survive the stomach, and wage war in the brain!

- Enemies range from tiny viruses to screen-sized amoeba, each with unique behaviour patterns and abilities. Beware of the Genetically-Modified Abominations that stalk the body...

- See how long you can survive in a special Resistance mode, where hordes of enemies adapt to your weapons and strategies.

- To simulate the true fragility of the microbe world, try Hardcore mode, where one death means the permanent loss of your microbe.




I chose crowdfunding for Syndemic because I want to involve as many people as possible as early as possible. I don't want to be beholden to some faceless shareholder or publisher – I want to be beholden to people like myself, who care about the same issues that I do. And because I'm an indie developer, I can minimize costs on almost all aspects of design.

Unfortunately, software licenses aren't free, and neither is hardware. The resources I collect from your pledges will be used to hire contractors who specialize in sound and art and fill in the gaps I can't do myself.

The project will be completed whether I get fully funded or not, but your support will accelerate the process and produce a much more polished game.

Additionally, I hope to use this project as a platform to spread awareness about human disease and the evolutionary processes that drive microbiological ecology.

Syndemic represents my livelihood and my future, so you can be sure I'll give it everything I have. I welcome and encourage all supporters to voice their opinions.

Guaranteed to be in Full Version:

- 7 unique environments (Bloodstream, Brain, Stomach, etc.)

- 50 types of normal enemies (including variants)

- At least 20 'Champion' enemy types (boss versions of normal enemies)

- At least 100 weapon combinations, plus at least 15 rare versions

- At least 8 biology-inspired scenarios (Chase down cancer cell, investigate prion sightings, break-up cholesterol build-up, etc.)

- A Hero Microbe that gains in power via genetic and metabolic upgrades

- A Resistance Mode where you fight against increasingly difficult swarms of enemies

Almost all of these features have some level of randomness to them. Champion enemies will have randomly selected interchangeable traits (Pyrogenic, Rapid Cloning, Biofilm-Forming) in addition to whatever boost they receive naturally. Weapons have ranges of damage and cost depending on their type and effect. Environments will have different layouts and enemy placement each time they are played.

Each body you explore will be a unique experience.




I'm not a veteran developer with a dozen titles under my belt. I'm just a gamer who enjoys making games as much as playing them. I have one other game, Ex Vitro, which represents what I can do with NO funding. I've worked in several evolutionary biology labs, and I've been involved in academic research for many years. Now, I want to create a project that's accessible and fun, while at the same time evoking a sense of wonder at the processes that are happening under our very noses.

Get in direct contact with me at: exvitrogamedev [at] gmail [dot] com




*NEW*
NANOCOCCUS
Your name or a name of your choosing will be added to a PDF file that accompanies ALL game builds... alpha, beta, demo, and full game! (Send me a message telling me what name you want me to use, otherwise I'll use your Indiegogo handle.)

MICROCOCCUS
You receive the full game in its entirety when it's completed, as well as early access to Promotional Demos and Beta Builds as they become available. Includes the first reward.

DIPLOCOCCUS
You will receive unique weaponry and items available only to early backers. These items will have unique properties not found in the regular game! Also, your name will be added to a special credits section so that all will know of your dedication to microbes and science. Includes the first two rewards.

TETRACOCCUS
You will receive MP3s of all music tracks in the game. The music is 100% original and scored by Sam Saluci (HeadPhaze). Includes first three rewards.

STREPTOCOCCUS
You can name an entire species of enemy microbe. My only condition is that they be vaguely Latin-sounding to fit in with the rest of the enemies. You can choose from a virus, bacteria or fungus. Examples are M. gruntus, G. sporalis, S. twistii. Includes first four rewards.

OPTOCOCCUS
Your eyeball will serve as a level in the game! Send me a high-resolution picture of your iris (with as little glare as possible) and I'll digitally process it and insert it as a playable level. It's best to get a friend to help take the photo! Includes first four rewards.

STAPHYLOCOCCUS
You can design a unique weapon! You specify the behaviour and graphics and what the overall feel of the weapon should be. Do you want a ricocheting projectile that bounces between enemies? Do you want a slow-moving orb that detonates on impact? Or do you want a stream of toxic goo that coats enemies as it kills them? I will work with you to design a weapon that fits your playstyle. Includes first four rewards.

MEGACOCCUS
Your company or charity will be added as an official sponsor of Syndemic. Your logo will be displayed prominently in the credits section. Includes first four rewards.

GIGACOCCUS
Design a scenario based on a real-life disease or illness. Spreading awareness of microbiology and science is the primary goal of this game, but if there is a specific disease you believe deserves special attention, I'll work with you to translate it into a playable experience. Examples:

Type 1 Diabetes: Enter the pancreas and destroy auto-immune cells that attack insulin-producing beta cells.

Cystic Fibrosis: Explore the lungs while dislodging mucus secretions and clearing out antibiotic-resistant biofilms.

Celiac Disease: Prevent glutenous food particles from entering intestinal villi while allowing non-gluten particles through.

This is a massive investment, and I may not be able to translate every disease into a playable form. Contact me with your ideas and I'll do my research to see if I can make it work. Generally, systemic diseases that lack an obvious cellular component (Down Syndrome, Autism) are probably not possible for me to do. In addition, if you wish, I can release your scenario as a free, standalone tool that can be used to promote awareness about the basics of the disease. Includes first four rewards.



OTHER SUPPORT

If you are interested in supporting me but don't have the resources to do so, you can help me by spreading the word about Syndemic. If you run or work with a charity and would like to use the game as a platform to spread your message about a certain disease, please contact me and we can discuss the details.
story_txt:
I'm proud to announce that a portion of the profit made from the development of Syndemic will be donated to the Canadian Cancer Society! This includes money from this Indiegogo campaign and any future campaigns in 2013.  
 
However, this association does not mean that Syndemic has been 'endorsed' by the Canadian Cancer Society, and the science I present in the game does not reflect the actual research that they do. To read up on what the money will go towards, check out their site: www.cancer.ca. 
 
The portion I donate is based on whether I reach my goal of $7650 US: 
 

5% of all profit under this goal is donated. 
10% of all profit over this goal is added to the initial donation. 
 
For more details about the fees and the calculations I will use, check out the update page here. 
 
My goal with Syndemic is to inspire people to dig into real science and learn about the cool processes that occur all around us. Because of the subject matter, I have a unique opportunity to support real disease research. And if I can provide some empowerment and catharsis by letting players destroy diseases with satisfying weapons, then even better! Syndemic is a randomly-generated action shooter game that emphasizes upgrades, quick reflexes, and microbial puzzle-solving in a biological setting. Take control of a unique microbe that can dodge, tumble and weave through bodily tissues and avoid swarms of invasive pathogens. Accumulate a massive arsenal of antibiotic weaponry, upgrade your genome and cell structure, and unleash powerful metabolic abilities. Explore the human body, destroy invading diseases, assist the immune system, and ultimately, discover your origin and the fate of your host. Are you a biological weapon designed to spread misery? Are you a genetic mutation, born of chance and driven by adaptation? Or are you the first of a divine plague, sent to bring microbial justice to a sinful world? Play the Action Demo immediately HERE.This demo represents a much more arcade-like experience than the full game. I aim to release a second demo featuring more adventure and loot-driven gameplay.This project represents two of my interests: biology and games. While I am passionate about science, Syndemic is not intended to be true-to-life. My aim is to exaggerate the weirdness and coolness (and action) of real microbial ecology, and hopefully inspire players to dig deeper into the actual research that's out there.My presentation of biology will be less about mechanics and more about the big-picture themes and ideas. I want people to question everything in the game, and I want them to come to their own conclusions about the issues raised. Genetic engineering, herd immunity, antibiotic resistance, and biological altruism are some of the themes I want to explore.However, in keeping with the spirit of science, the game will include 'Reality Checks' that point out inaccuracies within the game when compared to real-life biology. Some examples include:“Viruses are actually much smaller than bacteria, and can range in size from 1/10 to 1/100 of a bacterium.”“Bacteriophages are viruses that target bacteria specifically. They are highly specialized to attack individual strains.”“The presence of pathogens in the bloodstream is a serious and potentially fatal condition called Septicemia. If untreated, it can lead to septic shock and organ failure."Syndemic represents a fusion of elements from two of my favourite genres: the 'roguelike' (Diablo, Torchlight, Borderlands), and the 'shoot-em-up' (Gradius, R-Type). There will also be elements of puzzle-solving based on human diseases. Unlike generic action RPGs, Syndemic does not wholly rely on statistics and numbers to determine your success in battle. Your reflexes and anticipation are just as important as the power of your weapons or the activation of your abilities. Likewise, unlike generic action shooters, mashing the fire button is not a guarantee of success – you must use the right tool for the right enemy, and adapt your style of play to the environment. Planned Features:- Randomly-generated levels and environments filled with microscopic enemies and biological hazards.
- Experience events inspired by real biology: chase down a cancer cell before it metastasizes, investigate prion sightings in the brain, clear cholesterol from the bloodstream, and guide immune cells to sites of infection.
- More than 100 possible antibiotic weapon combinations, each with their own strengths and weaknesses, including rare 'designer drugs' capable of mowing down dozens of enemies in a single blast.
- Enlist or exploit the immune system; use the body's cells as shields, tools to solve puzzles, or feed them your slain enemies to gain powerful allies.
- Stylized, living backgrounds that simulate the interior of the human body... travel the bloodstream, survive the stomach, and wage war in the brain!
- Enemies range from tiny viruses to screen-sized amoeba, each with unique behaviour patterns and abilities. Beware of the Genetically-Modified Abominations that stalk the body...
- See how long you can survive in a special Resistance mode, where hordes of enemies adapt to your weapons and strategies.
- To simulate the true fragility of the microbe world, try Hardcore mode, where one death means the permanent loss of your microbe.
I chose crowdfunding for Syndemic because I want to involve as many people as possible as early as possible. I don't want to be beholden to some faceless shareholder or publisher – I want to be beholden to people like myself, who care about the same issues that I do. And because I'm an indie developer, I can minimize costs on almost all aspects of design. Unfortunately, software licenses aren't free, and neither is hardware. The resources I collect from your pledges will be used to hire contractors who specialize in sound and art and fill in the gaps I can't do myself. The project will be completed whether I get fully funded or not, but your support will accelerate the process and produce a much more polished game. Additionally, I hope to use this project as a platform to spread awareness about human disease and the evolutionary processes that drive microbiological ecology. Syndemic represents my livelihood and my future, so you can be sure I'll give it everything I have. I welcome and encourage all supporters to voice their opinions.Guaranteed to be in Full Version:- 7 unique environments (Bloodstream, Brain, Stomach, etc.)
- 50 types of normal enemies (including variants)
- At least 20 'Champion' enemy types (boss versions of normal enemies)
- At least 100 weapon combinations, plus at least 15 rare versions
- At least 8 biology-inspired scenarios (Chase down cancer cell, investigate prion sightings, break-up cholesterol build-up, etc.)
- A Hero Microbe that gains in power via genetic and metabolic upgrades
- A Resistance Mode where you fight against increasingly difficult swarms of enemies
Almost all of these features have some level of randomness to them. Champion enemies will have randomly selected interchangeable traits (Pyrogenic, Rapid Cloning, Biofilm-Forming) in addition to whatever boost they receive naturally. Weapons have ranges of damage and cost depending on their type and effect. Environments will have different layouts and enemy placement each time they are played.Each body you explore will be a unique experience.I'm not a veteran developer with a dozen titles under my belt. I'm just a gamer who enjoys making games as much as playing them. I have one other game, Ex Vitro, which represents what I can do with NO funding. I've worked in several evolutionary biology labs, and I've been involved in academic research for many years. Now, I want to create a project that's accessible and fun, while at the same time evoking a sense of wonder at the processes that are happening under our very noses.Get in direct contact with me at: exvitrogamedev [at] gmail [dot] com*NEW* NANOCOCCUSYour name or a name of your choosing will be added to a PDF file that accompanies ALL game builds... alpha, beta, demo, and full game! story:
Language: English - Click HERE to read in Turkish!
Hi, It's Cengiz. I know you have seen me before, at the World Series of Poker! Well, ok, maybe I wasn't the guy with the champion bracelet, but I am the guy who's going to shake up the world of virtual poker. I know you have experienced the same things that I have experienced on all the online poker sites. You get on the site, sit down to play a few rounds, looking for some challenge and what happens? Two seconds into the table, 5 people go all-in just to try to grab chips as fast as possible. I mean - sure - if you had a great hand, maybe it would be worth it, but 5 people at a 9 person table don't have a great hand.So, this gets very boring - because it's just like pulling a lever and playing the slot machines, right? Where is the strategy - where is the competitive element? This is what I miss when I play online. You don't see people doing this in person. So, I said to myself, there must be a way to change this!

It turns out - there is! I am excited to announce to you the beginning of an entirely new approach to online poker - Virtual Poker World, Road to Las Vegas. What makes this different is that we get to play for points, earn reputation, play in different cities and face consequences for bad play. A great poker game is possible again! Now, it's time for me to find a way to bring this to you and I need your help. Whether through direct contributions to my campaign or from spreading the word, it takes a passionate community to make a new world of poker exist. I'm here to share my passion for poker with you - please help me to succeed by putting whatever contribution that you are comfortable with whether $10 or $1000 and let's bring virtual poker to a new level across the globe. And don't forget, no matter what you do - spread the news - on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, Tumblr, Pinterest, Youtube and LinkedIn even. Help us to bring you the best online poker game in the world!

So what does it take a to launch a successful online poker RPG game - well it's not an impossible amount, but it is a lot. According to our best estimates, in order to produce a great game, we need to raise approximately $100,000. This will include software development, artwork/illustrations, marketing, advertising, game design, server hosting and more! But where did this all begin?

It began with this realization that playing poker online was just not satisfying. After talking to other poker players, we kept hearing the same thing - so my partner and I sat down and tried to imagine a way to improve this situation. We looked at the games we had most enjoyed playing growing up and what it was about poker that we liked as well. Soon, it became clear - there was a way to connect the two kinds of games that we enjoyed most - Role Playing Games and Poker!

You see, in a Role Playing Game - you fight dragons and loot dungeons and buy equipment and ... wait wait - I'm getting to it - the biggest thing you do in a Role Playing Game - you create a character and you build up that character's reputation. This is very much like poker. And the techniques can be very similar. And so, here we have this great opportunity to play virtually with avatars, travel from tournament to tournament in major poker cities and stop the "all in" madness! You must think this is incredible right? I do too! So what can we do to help each other to realize this dream you ask? Let me tell you...
It begins in Kyrenia - the player is transported to this starting city upon entering the game. From this point, the player begins to develop his or her "character" - improving position and reputation through playing the game effectively.

As players succeed in overcoming early rounds of play and early tables, the player is advanced to succeeding cities. The next city to come is Athens. The player begins to develop ranking. This continues from city to city across the globe. The player is not forced to start over at the bottom just because of one bad decision.

Poor poker play such as going all-in over and over might get you started in Kyrenia, but it will not get you far down the path to Vegas as the weaker players wash out in the first city. This is not all that there is to Virtual Poker World though. As a game built by poker players for poker players, we ask you to directly contribute to our efforts to improve the game for you.

Not only can you help us through this crowdfunding campaign, but also through sharing with us your ideas that you want to see us incorporate in the game. Every idea is important, every contribution is important and your voice is critical to us. We are more than ready to create something great that all of us can play.

Now that you know a little about me, FameStar Games, our mission and our goal - Virtual Poker World - Road to Las Vegas -, I would like to talk to you more about what we need and what you will get by helping us make this dream real.

First of all - it takes a lot of dollars to hire all the developers and all of the artists to create a great game. So - as you can imagine we are seeking many thousands of dollars. To make it worthwhile to all of you great players who want to see this amazing experience come to live - we are committed to providing you great rewards:
  • Ante - $10 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 5th city.
  • Small Blind - $25 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 8th city.
  • Big Blind - $50 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 9th city.
  • Poker Life as Art - $75 - Get an incredible custom caricature of yourself just like the one above! Your unique custom caricature is created from your own photograph of course, so it is truly a reflection of you! All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 9th city.
  • Pot - $100 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 10th city.
  • Flop - $250 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 12th city.
  • Turn - $1,000 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 15th city.
  • River - $2,500 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 16th city.
  • Become a Character - $5,000 - We will use YOUR REAL PICTURE and design a character to be used in 1 city. You will be the in-game character all players will see. All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from the 17th city.
  • Become a Brand - Casino - $10,000 - We will give YOUR NAME to one of our Casinos (in 1 city) in the city layout of the game - for 1 year! Ex. "John's Poker Room" LIMITED - 7 BUILDINGS ONLY. All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from the 18th city.
  • Become a Brand - City - $25,000 - We will give YOUR NAME to one of our cities in the virtual world of our game - for 1 year! Ex. "City of John Carter" LIMITED - 1 CITY ONLY! All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from the 18th city.
  • World Famous in Poker World - $50,000 - We will design a special episode for you and there will be 3 cities all named after you and all the buildings will also have your name in some way! LIMITED - 1 SPECIAL EPISODE! All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from the 18th city.
  • Meet the Founders - $8,000 - We will meet you and tell you all about how to design an incredible Poker Game. We will show you our city - Istanbul for 1 weekend and share with you the experience of living in the cross-roads of civilization as well as giving you the chance to test your skills in an exclusive tournament for you and one other person. All expenses paid (NOTE: flight not included - you must get here, the rest we will take care of)!
These are all truly amazing and we are very impressed with the creation that our artists and designers have been able to produce. We are also considering creating special tournaments for our crowdfunding campaign contributors and other special rewards. We may even consider creating a special member's only society to give our earliest supporters first right of refusal and special opportunities in various great poker cities across the world. What could this be worth to you? The sky is the limit! We are very excited to work with you to realize this dream as we have said before.

Now to the budget - for us to succeed, we need to put at least over $100 thousand dollars to work. As you look at all of our missions, game mechanics, multiplayer and multiplatform support, you can imagine how this adds up. We know we can get there though and provide to you the best possible virtual poker experience in the world!

There are steps that we can get to at lower levels though. If our goal is 25 cities at 100K and being able to sponsor winners in tournaments around the world, then getting to $25K gets us fewer cities as you can imagine. We will have to build with what we have until we have what we need to create all of the amazing features. We are a lean team with big dreams but we apply the principles of the Lean Startup to getting there. If you are in America and building games, we are sure you have met others who are doing things this way as well.Before we even begin building toward this large goal though - we have realized that we must raise funds for marketing and developing our audience for this very big effort. We are going to conduct first this Beta Campaign. The Beta Campaign helps us to pull together the critical marketing and advertising dollars that we will require to progress successfully in our Main Campaign. We must reach the 300 million + social and cash poker players in the world if we can expect to be ultimately successful!
As we said before, in the beginning of our story - we could not do this without you. As Cengiz has said, "Whether through direct contributions to my campaign or from spreading the word, it takes a passionate community to make a new world of poker exist. I'm here to share my passion for poker with you - please help me to succeed by putting whatever contribution that you are comfortable with whether $1 or $1000 and let's bring virtual poker to a new level across the globe. And don't forget, no matter what you do - spread the news - on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, Tumblr, Pinterest, Youtube and LinkedIn even. Help us to bring you the best online poker game in the world!" We look forward to seeing you at the poker tables in person!


Language: Turkish - Click HERE to read in English!
Merhaba, ben Cengiz. Beni daha önce görmüştünüz, Dünya Poker Şampiyonasında! Tamam şampiyonluğu kazanan ben değildim ama bu proje ile poker dünyasını sarsan isim ben olacağım. Özellikle online sosyal poker oyunlarında her oyuncu aynı sorunları yaşıyor. Masaya oturuyorsunuz, biraz poker oynamak istiyorsunuz ama ne oluyor? 5 oyuncu aynı anda “All-in” diyor ve kimsenin elinde doğru düzgün bir kağıt olmuyor. İki As geldiyse neden olmasın tabi ki ama 09 kişilik bir masada 5 kişinin de eli iyi olamaz değil mi?

Dolayısı ile bu çok sıkıcı adeta kol çekip slot oynamaya benziyor di mi? Strateji nerede? Rekabet nerede? İşte bunları özlüyorum online oynarken. Bunu değiştirmek için bir yol bulmalıyım dedim ve buldum!

Size büyük bir heyecan ile online pokere yepyeni bir yaklaşım getiren projemi sunuyorum – Virtual Poker World – Road to Las Vegas. Farklı olan bu sefer puan için oynuyoruz, itibar kazanıyoruz, farklı şehirler dolaşıyoruz ve kötü oynayanlar sonuçlarına katlanıyorlar. Müthiş bir poker oyunu tekrardan mümkün oluyor! Şimdi bu projeyi hayata geçirmek için bir yol bulmalıyım ve yardımınızı ihtiyacım var. Direkt projeye maddi destek vererek ya da bu projeden herkesi haberdar ederek bana yardımcı olabilirsiniz. Bu projeyi hayata geçirebilmek için tutkulu bir topluluk gerekiyor. Bu oyunu yaratmaktaki bu büyük isteğimi sizler ile burada paylaşıyorum. Sizler de 1 usd ve ya 1000 usd destek olursanız sevinirim. Ama unutmayın ne olursa olsun projeyi Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, Tumblr, Pinterest, Youtube ve LinkedIn gibi sosyal ağlarda herkese duyurmama yardımcı olun.

Peki Poker RPG oyunu geliştirmenin maliyeti nedir derseniz imkansız bir rakam değil ancak maliyet yüksek. Hesaplamalarımıza göre gerçekten yüksek kalitede bir oyun yaratılması için 100.000 USD gerekli. Bu bedel yazılım geliştirmenin yanında yüksek kalite tasarım, oyun içindeki bina ve şehir çizimleri, server ve hosting ile beraber başarılı olabilmek için tüm reklam giderlerini içeriyor. Peki hikayemiz nasıl başladı?

Online sosyal poker oyunlarının yeterli olmadığı fark ettiğimiz ile bu şirketi kurdum. Etrafımızdaki poker oyuncuları ile konuşurken hep aynı sorunları duydum ve biz de bu sorunun çözümü üzerine kafa yordum. Çocukken oynarken en keyif aldığımız oyunları düşündüm ve poker oyununu nasıl olurda bu konsepte uyarlarım dedim. Aklımda fikir oluşmaya başladı ve iki farklı tarzı birleştirecek bir fikir geliştirdim. RPG Poker! Bilinen en büyük Role Playing oyunlarını hatırlayın, oyuncular dragonlar ile dövüşür tecrübe ve puanlar kazanarak daha güçlü silahlar ve kıyafetler alabilirler. Bunu pokere uyarlamak da çok zor olmadı.

Oluşturduğunuz poker karakteri oyunda başarılar elde ettikçe daha yüksek masalarda oynayabilecek, diğer şehirlere giderek daha büyük turnuvalar katılabilecek daha da güzeli tüm görevleri tamamlarsa sponsorlu oyuncu olacak ve gerçekten Las Vegas’a gidip bir süreliğine poker oyuncusu olma hayalini gerçekleştirebilecek. Bu hedeflere ulaşmak için artık kimse kolay kolay All-in diyemeyecek.
Oyun Kıbrıs – Girne’de başlıyor. Oyuncu oyuna girer girmez bu şehre gönderiliyor. Bu noktadan sonra kazandığı her el, her chip ve tamamladığı görevler sayesinde karakterini geliştirmeye başlıyor.

Kolaylık seviyesi en düşük olan bu şehirde görevler tamamlandıkça oyuncu diğer şehirlere seyahat edebiliyor. Sıradaki şehir Yunanistan, Atina. İlerledikçe zorluk seviyesi artıyor ve önünüzde toplam 25 şehir var ama eğer dikkatli olmazsanız tüm chiplerinin kaybedip başladığınız noktaya kadar geri gelebilirsiniz.

Tabi ki bu dünyanın içinde Girne’den Las Vegas’a uzanan bu yolda tüm özellikler bu kadar değil tabi ki. Bu oyun gerçek poker oyuncuları için poker oyuncuları tarafından geliştiriliyor ve bu doğrultuda sizlerin de önerileri bizim için önemli.

Oyunu geliştirmek için önerilerinizi bekliyoruz çünkü tüm poker oyuncuları için güzel bir proje geliştirmek istiyoruz.

Artık ben ve FameStar Games hakkında biraz bilgi sahibi olduğunuza göre şimdi sıra hedeflerimiz ve sonuçlarda. İhtiyacımız olanlardan ve bize yardım edenlere verilecek ödüllerden bahsetmek istiyorum. Öncelikle bu oyunun sağlıklı yazılması için tutulan programcılar ve tasarımcılar oldukça yüksek bir maliyete sahip. Tahmin edebileceğiniz gibi onbinlerce dolara ihtiyaç duyacağız. Bu oyun projesinin gerçekleşmesi için elinden geleni yapacak sizler için değerli hediyeler hazırlamaya çalıştık.
  • Ante – 10 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 5. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
  • Small Blind – 25 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 8. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
  • Big Blind – 50 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 9. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
  • Sanatsal Poker – 75 usd : Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Bunun yanında kendi gönderecekleri fotoğraftan yapılacak bir karikatür hediye edilecek (email olarak) Ve oyuna 9. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
  • Pot - 100 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 10. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
  • Flop – 250 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 12. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
  • Turn – 1.000 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 15. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
  • River – 2.500 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 9. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
  • Oyunda Karakter Ol – 5.000 usd - Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 17. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız. Sizi oyuna karakter olarak transfer ediyoruz! Oyun içi karakterlerden biri olarak ölümsüzleşiyorsunuz.
  • Marka Olun - Casino – 10.000 usd Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 18. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız. Adınızı oyunun içindeki Casinolardan birine veriyoruz. (1 Yıl süreyle) Örneğin: “John’un Poker Salonu” – 7 adet ile sınırlıdır.
  • Marka Olun – Şehir – 25.000 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 18. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız. Haritada bulunan şehirlerden birine sizin isminizi veriyoruz. Örneğin: “John Carter Şehiri” – 1 adet ile sınırlıdır.
  • World Famous in Poker World - $50,000 - We will design a special episode for you and there will be 3 cities all named after you and all the buildings will also have your name in some way! LIMITED - 1 SPECIAL EPISODE! All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from the 18th city.Dünya Poker Yıldızı – 50.000 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 18. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız. Sizin için özel bir bölüm design ediyoruz. 3 şehir içeren bir harita üzerinde sadece siz özel bir bölüm tasarlıyoruz. Tüm içerik sizin isteğiniz doğrultusunda yaratılıyor. 1 adet ile sınırlıdır.
  • Şirket Kurucuları ile Tanış – 8.000 usd – Sizleri bir haftasonu İstanbul’da ağırlayıp oyunun geliştirilme süreçlerinde yaşadıklarımız konusunda sohbet edeceğiz. İstanbul gibi tarihi bir yer görmenin yanında size özel bir poker oyunu da sizi bekliyor olacak. (Not uçak ücretinizi kendiniz karşılamanız gerekiyor)!
Bunların hepsi mükemmel hediyeler ama bunların yanında daha farklı hediyeler de planlıyoruz. Sadece destekçilere özel açılacak turnuvalar, özel üyelikler gibi avantajlar da sağlayacağız. Hatta sizin bulunduğunuz şehirde özel bir partiye davet etmek de hediyeler arasında. Hayallerimizi gerçekleştirmek için sizlerle ortak hareket etmekten çok heyecan duyuyoruz.

Şimdi gelelim bütçeye; bu projenin istenilen kalitede geliştirilmesi ve pazarlanabilmesi için 100.000 usd üzerinde bir desteğe ihtiyacımız var.

Tabi ki bizim hedefimiz bu parayı toplayarak hayal ettiğimiz 25 şehirlik dünyayı kurmak ve başarılı poker oyunculara sponsor olarak onları gerçek hayatta turnuvalara gönderebilmek ancak paranın tamamını toplayamasak da toplanılan kadarı ile bu oyunu yine de hayata geçireceğiz. Biraz daha az şehir ve biraz daha az özellik olacak ama gerçekleştireceğiz. Büyük hayallerimiz var ama en öncelikli hedefimiz en küçük hali ile de olsa oyunu hayata geçirebilmek. Bu oyun için para toplama projemizi duyurabilmek için de bir reklam bütçesine ihtiyacımız var. İşte bu yüzden bu Beta kampanyayı yayınlıyoruz. Burada amacımız projenin tanıtım bütçesini toplamak ve ana projeyi en kısa sürede yayınlamak. Hedefimiz zor; projemizin yeterli desteği alması için 300 milyon üzerinde kişiye ulaşmamız lazım.
En başında da belirttiğim gibi bu projeyi sizler olmadan hayata geçiremem. Söylediğim gibi direkt maddi destek dışında bu projeyi herkese duyurarak da bana yardımcı olabilirsiniz. Bu proejnin gerçekleşmesi için gerçekten tutkulu bir topluluğa ihtiyaç var. Bu oyunu yaratmaktaki bu büyük isteğimi sizler ile burada paylaşıyorum. Sizler de 1 usd ve ya 1000 usd destek olursanız sevinirim. Ama unutmayın ne olursa olsun projeyi Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, Tumblr, Pinterest, Youtube ve LinkedIn gibi sosyal ağlarda herkese duyurmama yardımcı olun.

Dünyadaki en başarılı poker oyununu yaratmamda yardımcı olun! Sizleri de oyunu oynarken görmek için sabırsızlanıyorum!
story_txt:
Language: English - Click HERE to read in Turkish!
	


		Hi, It's Cengiz. I know you have seen me before, at the World Series of Poker! Well, ok, maybe I wasn't the guy with the champion bracelet, but I am the guy who's going to shake up the world of virtual poker. I know you have experienced the same things that I have experienced on all the online poker sites. You get on the site, sit down to play a few rounds, looking for some challenge and what happens? Two seconds into the table, 5 people go all-in just to try to grab chips as fast as possible. I mean - sure - if you had a great hand, maybe it would be worth it, but 5 people at a 9 person table don't have a great hand.So, this gets very boring - because it's just like pulling a lever and playing the slot machines, right? Where is the strategy - where is the competitive element? This is what I miss when I play online. You don't see people doing this in person. So, I said to myself, there must be a way to change this!
		It turns out - there is! I am excited to announce to you the beginning of an entirely new approach to online poker - Virtual Poker World, Road to Las Vegas. What makes this different is that we get to play for points, earn reputation, play in different cities and face consequences for bad play. A great poker game is possible again! Now, it's time for me to find a way to bring this to you and I need your help. Whether through direct contributions to my campaign or from spreading the word, it takes a passionate community to make a new world of poker exist. I'm here to share my passion for poker with you - please help me to succeed by putting whatever contribution that you are comfortable with whether $10 or $1000 and let's bring virtual poker to a new level across the globe. And don't forget, no matter what you do - spread the news - on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, Tumblr, Pinterest, Youtube and LinkedIn even. Help us to bring you the best online poker game in the world!





		So what does it take a to launch a successful online poker RPG game - well it's not an impossible amount, but it is a lot.  According to our best estimates, in order to produce a great game, we need to raise approximately $100,000.  This will include software development, artwork/illustrations, marketing, advertising, game design, server hosting and more!  But where did this all begin?
		It began with this realization that playing poker online was just not satisfying. After talking to other poker players, we kept hearing the same thing - so my partner and I sat down and tried to imagine a way to improve this situation. We looked at the games we had most enjoyed playing growing up and what it was about poker that we liked as well. Soon, it became clear - there was a way to connect the two kinds of games that we enjoyed most - Role Playing Games and Poker!
		You see, in a Role Playing Game - you fight dragons and loot dungeons and buy equipment and ... wait wait - I'm getting to it - the biggest thing you do in a Role Playing Game - you create a character and you build up that character's reputation. This is very much like poker. And the techniques can be very similar. And so, here we have this great opportunity to play virtually with avatars, travel from tournament to tournament in major poker cities and stop the "all in" madness! You must think this is incredible right? I do too! So what can we do to help each other to realize this dream you ask? Let me tell you...
	





		It begins in Kyrenia - the player is transported to this starting city upon entering the game. From this point, the player begins to develop his or her "character" - improving position and reputation through playing the game effectively.
		As players succeed in overcoming early rounds of play and early tables, the player is advanced to succeeding cities. The next city to come is Athens. The player begins to develop ranking. This continues from city to city across the globe. The player is not forced to start over at the bottom just because of one bad decision.
		Poor poker play such as going all-in over and over might get you started in Kyrenia, but it will not get you far down the path to Vegas as the weaker players wash out in the first city. This is not all that there is to Virtual Poker World though. As a game built by poker players for poker players, we ask you to directly contribute to our efforts to improve the game for you.
		Not only can you help us through this crowdfunding campaign, but also through sharing with us your ideas that you want to see us incorporate in the game. Every idea is important, every contribution is important and your voice is critical to us. We are more than ready to create something great that all of us can play.
		






		Now that you know a little about me, FameStar Games, our mission and our goal - Virtual Poker World - Road to Las Vegas -, I would like to talk to you more about what we need and what you will get by helping us make this dream real.
		First of all - it takes a lot of dollars to hire all the developers and all of the artists to create a great game. So - as you can imagine we are seeking many thousands of dollars. To make it worthwhile to all of you great players who want to see this amazing experience come to live - we are committed to providing you great rewards:
		
Ante - $10 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 5th city.
Small Blind - $25 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 8th city.
Big Blind - $50 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 9th city.
Poker Life as Art - $75 - Get an incredible custom caricature of yourself just like the one above! Your unique custom caricature is created from your own photograph of course, so it is truly a reflection of you! All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 9th city.
Pot - $100 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 10th city.
Flop - $250 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 12th city.
Turn - $1,000 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 15th city.
River - $2,500 - All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player. You can start the game from 16th city.
Become a Character - $5,000 - We will use YOUR REAL PICTURE and design a character to be used in 1 city.  You will be the in-game character all players will see. All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player.  You can start the game from the 17th city.
Become a Brand - Casino - $10,000 - We will give YOUR NAME to one of our Casinos (in 1 city) in the city layout of the game - for 1 year! Ex. "John's Poker Room" LIMITED - 7 BUILDINGS ONLY. All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player.  You can start the game from the 18th city.
Become a Brand - City - $25,000 - We will give YOUR NAME to one of our cities in the virtual world of our game - for 1 year! Ex. "City of John Carter" LIMITED - 1 CITY ONLY! All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player.  You can start the game from the 18th city.
World Famous in Poker World - $50,000 - We will design a special episode for you and there will be 3 cities all named after you and all the buildings will also have your name in some way! LIMITED - 1 SPECIAL EPISODE! All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player.  You can start the game from the 18th city.


Meet the Founders - $8,000 - We will meet you and tell you all about how to design an incredible Poker Game.  We will show you our city - Istanbul for 1 weekend and share with you the experience of living in the cross-roads of civilization as well as giving you the chance to test your skills in an exclusive tournament for you and one other person.  All expenses paid (NOTE: flight not included - you must get here, the rest we will take care of)!

		These are all truly amazing and we are very impressed with the creation that our artists and designers have been able to produce. We are also considering creating special tournaments for our crowdfunding campaign contributors and other special rewards. We may even consider creating a special member's only society to give our earliest supporters first right of refusal and special opportunities in various great poker cities across the world. What could this be worth to you? The sky is the limit! We are very excited to work with you to realize this dream as we have said before.
		Now to the budget - for us to succeed, we need to put at least over $100 thousand dollars to work.  As you look at all of our missions, game mechanics, multiplayer and multiplatform support, you can imagine how this adds up.  We know we can get there though and provide to you the best possible virtual poker experience in the world!
		There are steps that we can get to at lower levels though. If our goal is 25 cities at 100K and being able to sponsor winners in tournaments around the world, then getting to $25K gets us fewer cities as you can imagine. We will have to build with what we have until we have what we need to create all of the amazing features. We are a lean team with big dreams but we apply the principles of the Lean Startup to getting there. If you are in America and building games, we are sure you have met others who are doing things this way as well.Before we even begin building toward this large goal though - we have realized that we must raise funds for marketing and developing our audience for this very big effort. We are going to conduct first this Beta Campaign. The Beta Campaign helps us to pull together the critical marketing and advertising dollars that we will require to progress successfully in our Main Campaign. We must reach the 300 million + social and cash poker players in the world if we can expect to be ultimately successful!
	




		As we said before, in the beginning of our story - we could not do this without you. As Cengiz has said, "Whether through direct contributions to my campaign or from spreading the word, it takes a passionate community to make a new world of poker exist. I'm here to share my passion for poker with you - please help me to succeed by putting whatever contribution that you are comfortable with whether $1 or $1000 and let's bring virtual poker to a new level across the globe. And don't forget, no matter what you do - spread the news - on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, Tumblr, Pinterest, Youtube and LinkedIn even. Help us to bring you the best online poker game in the world!" We look forward to seeing you at the poker tables in person!

		Merhaba, ben Cengiz. Beni daha önce görmüştünüz, Dünya Poker Şampiyonasında! Tamam şampiyonluğu kazanan ben değildim ama bu proje ile poker dünyasını sarsan isim ben olacağım. Özellikle online sosyal poker oyunlarında her oyuncu aynı sorunları yaşıyor. Masaya oturuyorsunuz, biraz poker oynamak istiyorsunuz ama ne oluyor? 5 oyuncu aynı anda “All-in” diyor ve kimsenin elinde doğru düzgün bir kağıt olmuyor. İki As geldiyse neden olmasın tabi ki ama 09 kişilik bir masada 5 kişinin de eli iyi olamaz değil mi?Dolayısı ile bu çok sıkıcı adeta kol çekip slot oynamaya benziyor di mi? Strateji nerede?  Rekabet nerede? İşte bunları özlüyorum online oynarken. Bunu değiştirmek için bir yol bulmalıyım dedim ve buldum!
		Size büyük bir heyecan ile online pokere yepyeni bir yaklaşım getiren projemi sunuyorum – Virtual Poker World – Road to Las Vegas. Farklı olan bu sefer puan için oynuyoruz, itibar kazanıyoruz, farklı şehirler dolaşıyoruz ve kötü oynayanlar sonuçlarına katlanıyorlar. Müthiş bir poker oyunu tekrardan mümkün oluyor! Peki hikayemiz nasıl başladı?
		Online sosyal poker oyunlarının yeterli olmadığı fark ettiğimiz ile bu şirketi kurdum. Çocukken oynarken en keyif aldığımız oyunları düşündüm ve poker oyununu nasıl olurda bu konsepte uyarlarım dedim. İhtiyacımız olanlardan ve bize yardım edenlere verilecek ödüllerden bahsetmek istiyorum. Öncelikle bu oyunun sağlıklı yazılması için tutulan programcılar ve tasarımcılar oldukça yüksek bir maliyete sahip. Tahmin edebileceğiniz gibi onbinlerce dolara ihtiyaç duyacağız. Bu oyun projesinin gerçekleşmesi için elinden geleni yapacak sizler için değerli hediyeler hazırlamaya çalıştık.
		
Ante – 10 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 5. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
Small Blind – 25 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 8. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
Big Blind – 50 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 9. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
Sanatsal Poker – 75 usd : Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Bunun yanında kendi gönderecekleri fotoğraftan yapılacak bir karikatür hediye edilecek (email olarak) Ve oyuna 9. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
Pot - 100 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 10. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
Flop – 250 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 12. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
Turn – 1.000 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 15. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
River – 2.500 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 9. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız.
Oyunda Karakter Ol – 5.000 usd - Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 17. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız. Sizi oyuna karakter olarak transfer ediyoruz! Oyun içi karakterlerden biri olarak ölümsüzleşiyorsunuz.
Marka Olun - Casino – 10.000 usd Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 18. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız. Adınızı oyunun içindeki Casinolardan birine veriyoruz. (1 Yıl süreyle) Örneğin: “John’un Poker Salonu” – 7 adet ile sınırlıdır.
Marka Olun – Şehir – 25.000 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 18. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız. Haritada bulunan şehirlerden birine sizin isminizi veriyoruz. Örneğin: “John Carter Şehiri” – 1 adet ile sınırlıdır.
World Famous in Poker World - $50,000 - We will design a special episode for you and there will be 3 cities all named after you and all the buildings will also have your name in some way! LIMITED - 1 SPECIAL EPISODE! All contributors will earn a "Founder" badge that will never be earned or be able to be bought in-game by any other player.  You can start the game from the 18th city.Dünya Poker Yıldızı – 50.000 usd: Destek verenler “Kurucu” amblemi kazanacaklar ve bu amblem oyun oynarken hiçbir şekilde kazanılmayacak veya satın alınamayacak. Ve oyuna 18. Şehirden başlayabilme hakkı kazanacaksınız. Sizin için özel bir bölüm design ediyoruz. 3 şehir içeren bir harita üzerinde sadece siz özel bir bölüm tasarlıyoruz. Tüm içerik sizin isteğiniz doğrultusunda yaratılıyor. 1 adet ile sınırlıdır.


Şirket Kurucuları ile Tanış – 8.000 usd – Sizleri bir haftasonu İstanbul’da ağırlayıp oyunun geliştirilme süreçlerinde yaşadıklarımız konusunda  sohbet edeceğiz. İstanbul gibi tarihi bir yer görmenin yanında size özel bir poker oyunu da sizi bekliyor olacak. (Not uçak ücretinizi kendiniz karşılamanız gerekiyor)!

		Bunların hepsi mükemmel hediyeler ama bunların yanında daha farklı hediyeler de planlıyoruz. Sadece destekçilere özel açılacak turnuvalar, özel üyelikler gibi avantajlar da sağlayacağız. Hatta sizin bulunduğunuz şehirde özel bir partiye davet etmek de hediyeler arasında.  Hayallerimizi gerçekleştirmek için sizlerle ortak hareket etmekten çok heyecan duyuyoruz.
		Şimdi gelelim bütçeye; bu projenin istenilen kalitede geliştirilmesi ve pazarlanabilmesi için 100.000 usd üzerinde bir desteğe ihtiyacımız var.
		Tabi ki bizim hedefimiz bu parayı toplayarak hayal ettiğimiz 25 şehirlik dünyayı kurmak ve başarılı poker oyunculara sponsor olarak onları gerçek hayatta turnuvalara gönderebilmek ancak paranın tamamını toplayamasak da toplanılan kadarı ile bu oyunu yine de hayata geçireceğiz. Biraz daha az şehir ve biraz daha az özellik olacak ama gerçekleştireceğiz. Büyük hayallerimiz var ama en öncelikli hedefimiz en küçük hali ile de olsa oyunu hayata geçirebilmek. Bu oyun için para toplama projemizi duyurabilmek için de bir reklam bütçesine ihtiyacımız var. İşte bu yüzden bu Beta kampanyayı yayınlıyoruz. Burada amacımız projenin tanıtım bütçesini toplamak ve ana projeyi en kısa sürede yayınlamak. Hedefimiz zor; projemizin yeterli desteği alması için 300 milyon üzerinde kişiye ulaşmamız lazım.
	




		En başında da belirttiğim gibi bu projeyi sizler olmadan hayata geçiremem. Söylediğim gibi direkt maddi destek dışında bu projeyi herkese duyurarak da bana yardımcı olabilirsiniz. Bu proejnin gerçekleşmesi için gerçekten tutkulu bir topluluğa ihtiyaç var. Bu oyunu yaratmaktaki bu büyük isteğimi sizler ile burada paylaşıyorum. Sizler de 1 usd ve ya 1000 usd destek olursanız sevinirim. Ama unutmayın ne olursa olsun projeyi Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, Tumblr, Pinterest, Youtube ve LinkedIn gibi sosyal ağlarda  herkese duyurmama yardımcı olun.
		Dünyadaki en başarılı poker oyununu yaratmamda yardımcı olun! Sizleri de oyunu oynarken görmek için sabırsızlanıyorum!

story:
Hi !
My name is Kamil "Smok" Milaniuk and I would like to welcome you to my first Indiegogo pre-sale.

 

I'm an autodidact freelance sculptor and it is my dream to constantly improve my skills and sculpt high quality miniatures that will be suitable for gamers, collectors and hobbyists.

 

Project "Myconids from Gloom Glade" is my first attempt in creating a themed miniature range, based on fictional race of humanoid mushrooms called Myconids.
As the sculpting is my full time job this campaign will help me not only to provide necessary equipment and tools for my workshop to further develop my skills but also to sustain myself while developing future themed miniature ranges.

 

 You may ask why this amount of money ?
It will help me to provide my miniatures to greater audience. All miniatures from this range will be casted in high quality resin that will guarantee that every detail will be visible and as precise as original sculpt it would also make the price more affordable than any other form of production. It would be also use to fill my workshop with much needed equipment for sculpting and photographing miniatures as well as to finance future projects.

In case You've been wondering what if we don't reach campaign goal. We have chosen flexible founding so that even if the final goal isn't achieved we can still produce and deliver high quality products.

 

>>>   NEWS!!   <<<

We are super excited cause today we got first resin cast of miniatures for our Myconids from Gloom Glade project.
First picture is a resin cast of King Mactus and a sprue with mushroom hats that will fit on the model to complete his crown.

Second picture shows Awakened mushrooms in all their glory, so that You can judge the quality of the resin cast for Yourselves

------------------------------

Now time for some explanations concerning perks.
First of all there are two types of models in "Myconids from Gloom Glade".


1. Myconids- mushroom herders, sacred guardians. There are 2 different Myconid models:

- Adactus the Old


- Actus the Erratic



2. Awakened Mushroom's - these are mushrooms animated by Myconid magic to help them defend their deity. There are 6 different Awakened Mushroom models:

-Jawshroom

-Corrodshroom

-Roamshroom

-Crossocclushroom

-Fatshroom

-Youngshroom



There is also special model of Myconid King Mactus the Wise who stands as the leader of the myconids, the wisest and oldest of them all. This miniature is limited to 80 numbered copies that will not be available anywhere else. Once their gone their gone forever.



Miniatures will be casted in high quality resin. Price in the perks includes worldwide shipping. Miniatures will be packed extra carefully and shipped in traceable package.

Estimated shipping time is 15th July but this may change pending o amount of orders.

 

New perk: Mushroom Familiar set


In the spare time I have decided to sculpt few smaller mushroom familiars. You can see the difference in size on photo.
If the goal is reached one set of those familiars would be included as a bonus to all those who ordered "Court of Gloom Glade". All who got other perks ( including Mushroom Familiar set) will also receive one random familiar if the campaign reaches its goal.

 

Roamshroom in resin:

Warning:
This product is not a toy. Box may contain small parts. Product is not suitable for children under 14 years

story:
Short Summary

Little Witch Story is a game about coming to terms with an identity you don't get to choose, but you can't pretend doesn't exist. You'll struggle with being accepted, being understood, being judged and being abandoned, but whatever happens, you won't have to survive alone. 

What We Need & What You Get

So here's the thing. I'm a writer, and a damn good one. I have a fantastic story to tell, but sometimes, words aren't enough. Little Witch Story needs art, it needs music, and to get those things, I need money. By contributing to this campaign, you'll be helping take Little Witch Story from an interesting piece of interactive fiction to a rich, emotionally resonant experience.

As for what you'll get, this project will initially release as a web-based game, and then I will be working on porting it to run natively on iOS and Android. After that, who knows?

The Impact

Lots of projects need funding. Why does LWS need it more than them?

Let me put it this way. I see a lot of people complaining about the lack of diversity and representation in media, especially games. I do it to, because come on. I don't need the same characters and the same story over and over again. Give me something different.

I didn't set out to make LWS a diverse story, but given how I feel about the industry, it's no surprise it turned out that way. It has a cast full of people of colour, trans, genderqueer and agender characters, asexual and poly romance options and more. I wasn't setting out to check boxes, but I did want a story full of interesting, different people, and that just doesn't happen without diversity.

Risks & Challenges

To be honest, I'm not risking a whole lot with this project. I'm not aiming for commercial success. I just want to share this story with anyone who's interested. I've already put a lot of my own money into it, not to mention a whole lot of time, but I can't afford any more. I just want the money to finish the project and make it the best it can be.

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course, even if you can't donate, please talk about it! Share it on social media, tell your friends, write a blog post about it, whatever. Or just tell me you're interested or excited!

Interested? Play the trial!

Stretch Goals

$1,080 - An extra $80 will let me submit to Indiecade MADE IT
$1,180 - $100 after that will get me an iOS developer license. 
$1,280 - Another $100 for Steam Greenlight
$1,780 - Art for every character
$2,780 - Expressions for the main characters
$7,780 - This will let me go to GDC again next year

story:
Regarding Release Date

If you have any concerns about the project, direct them to Jeremiah Alinea (GriMagia's Director/Creator), who is in charge of and responsible for printing/shipping/IGG rewards/finances/refunds/any future updates and can be reached at: grimagia@gmail.com

____________________________________________________________________________


WE DID IT!! We've reached our $13k goal and GriMagia is now funded! Thank you so much, everyone, for helping us reach our goal - we're overwhelmed by your support!!


STRETCH GOAL #1 - $16,000: GOAL REACHED!! - EGYPT-THEMED EXPANSION (50 more cards!)

An expansion with monsters based off of Egyptian gods and desert residents! Booby traps galore!

Monsters include: Anubis, Scarab, Mummy, Sphinx, Horus


STRETCH GOAL #2 - $19,000: GOAL REACHED!! BACKER-CHOSEN EXPANSION (50 more cards!)

Backers will be able to vote on their favorite themed expansion out of 10 different choices!

Choices include: Tropical Paradise, Japan, Greek, Legendary Weapons, Monster Fans Collection (working titles)


STRETCH GOAL #3 - $25,000: GOAL REACHED!! CORE EXPANSION: DRAGONIC AWAKENING! (100+ more cards!!)

A HUGE expansion with a wide variety of monsters and character cards with player abilities!


STRETCH GOAL #4: $30,000: NEW ARTISTS!
We'll hire more artists onto our team! We already have some artists in mind, and being able to have them on the team would speed up our production rate.


GriMagia (gri-MUH-gi-uh) is a 2-6 player anime-themed card game about fighting and capturing monster girls! Take up the role of a GriMeister, specializing in summoning and confining monsters with the aid of magical books known as Grimoires!

GriMagia, while NOT a TCG, borrows some familiar elements that are found in many TCGs and RPGs, throws in some unique mechanics, and mixes them together in a simple and fun game that anyone can pick up! It's possible to learn the basics in as quick as 10-15 minutes (as proven during our live demos at Anime Expo 2014), and there are many layers of depth and strategy to the game that make it entertaining for experienced players as well!

Above Image: GriMagia at Anime Expo 2014!


** Note for International Contributors: If you live outside the US, please add +$10 USD to your contribution in order to cover international shipping costs and ensure you get your perks in good condition. **




In GriMagia, each player assumes the role of a GriMeister, specializing in summoning and confining monsters with the aid of magical books known as Grimoires. Learn how to play by watching the above video or reading the description below!

The objective of GriMagia is to either capture 3 of your opponents' monsters OR reduce every opponent's HP to 0 (each player has 5 HP). These caps are flexible depending on how long you'd like the game to last.

At the start of each game, the 100 card deck is shuffled and players must decide the turn order. In a standard game of GriMagia, each player starts with 5 cards in hand. All players share the same deck and draw 2 cards each turn (except the first turn; draw 1 card). There's a hand limit of 6 cards, so if you have more than that at the end of your turn, you discard cards until you have 6 again.

SUMMONING BASICS: You can summon monsters from your hand to the field to aid you in battle! Each monster has individual strengths and weaknesses depending on which of the three basic types it is (ATK, DEF, HP). Attack unarmed opponents directly, weaken monsters for capture, or defeat every monster in sight - it's up to you!

SUMMONING GAUGE: Each GriMeister has a Summoning Gauge of 8 hearts, meaning that they may only control a maximum amount of monsters that have a printed total of 8 hearts on the field. Exceeding that limit will cause Fatigue to the GriMeister, slowly draining away their life force.

BATTLE BASICS: In battle, compare the ATK stat of your monster to the DEF stat of the opponent's monster; if your monster's ATK is higher than the opposing monster's DEF, the attack goes through. The hearts in the upper right corner of each Monster Card represent its HP (1 heart = 1 HP). Each attack does -1 HP worth of damage, and if a monster takes damage equal to its HP, it's destroyed and sent to the discard pile.

INTERCEPTING: Monsters are able to intercept incoming attacks to take damage instead of the intended target. If the monster that intercepts has higher DEF than the attacking monster's ATK, however, then it won't take any damage.

ACTIVE/RESTED POSITIONS: When a monster attacks, defends, or intercepts an attack, it gets shifted from Active position (face-up, forwards) to Rested position (sideways). Monsters in Rested position are unable to attack/defend/intercept until they're shifted back to Active position at the start of your next turn.

MOBBING: A monster in Rested position cannot defend, and is thus vulnerable to any attack, regardless of its DEF. Therefore, you can mob a high DEF monster with multiple attacks from different monsters. Because that monster cannot defend itself from all those incoming attacks, it will take damage.

CAPTURING BASICS: Your role as a GriMeister is to capture your opponents’ monsters with the mystic power of Grimoires - magical books with immense powers of confinement. Each basic Grimoire corresponds to one of the three basic types (ATK, DEF, HP). In order for a Grimoire to be able to capture a monster, its type must match the monster's type, and its MP must be greater than or equal to the remaining HP of the monster.

CATCH BLOCKING: If you don't want your opponent to capture your monsters, you can block a capture with a Catch Block! Discard a card from your hand (monster or Grimoire) of the basic type that beats the basic type of Grimoire your opponent played, rock-paper-scissors style.

ATK beats HP, HP beats DEF, and DEF beats ATK.

BLOCK REVERSALS/FINAL BLOCK: If you've performed a Catch Block, your opponent can retaliate with a Block Reversal by discarding a card of the basic type that beats yours to make the capture successful. However, you can respond with a Final Block; again, discard a card of the type that beats your opponent's card type. After a Final Block, no more cards can be discarded to influence the outcome of the capture, and it is deemed unsuccessful.

RELIC BASICS: GriMeisters are able to wield Relics, ancient items that can be used at any time during the game, even during an opponent's turn or in response to an action! If utilized properly, they can turn the tides of a game in your favor! Use them wisely, as there can be only one of each unique Relic in the deck!

RESOLUTIONS: If two or more Relics activate in response to one another, the effect of the last Relic that was played resolves first, and so on. In other words, effects resolve backwards.

ABILITY MONSTERS: Some monsters have abilities that they can use in order to gain the upper hand over an opponent! Ability Monsters generally have weaker stats than regular monsters, but they make up for it with their useful powers. Different Ability Monsters function in different ways: some monsters' abilities activate on summon, some can be activated on command by shifting the ability monster to Rested position, some activate automatically under certain conditions, and some have effects that last indefinitely.

SP MONSTERS:  There exist Special (SP) Monsters with abilities so powerful that they can alter the course of the game, for better or worse. These mystical beings are so rare that there can only be up to 4 SP Monsters in a standard deck, and there can be only one of each unique SP monster in the deck!

FUTURE EXPANSIONS: In each expansion, we will be able to add more mechanics to the game to make it even more interesting! All future mechanics will be optional, but will provide new options for players, as we'd like to keep the game fresh and exciting while keeping it as flexible as possible. In other words, players will be able to pick-and-choose which mechanics they like best and play with them while not feeling like they're missing out on something.

All of the 100 cards you'll ever need to play a standard game of GriMagia are included in a single box. This includes:

• 40 Monster Cards (4 SP Monsters)

Monsters are powerful creatures that roam the world of GriMagia, but can be tamed or sealed away with the power of magic.


• 40 Grimoires

Grimoires are magical books used by GriMeisters to capture monsters.


• 20 Relics

Relics are mysterious one-of-a-kind items that, when used at the right time, can aid their wielder in combat.


  • It's NOT a TCG! Instead, GriMagia is packaged like a board game - all you'll ever need to play the game is in the box! Our primary focus with GriMagia was to make a fun game with great art, not to make tons of money selling booster packs.
  • The core gameplay is simple enough that it only takes a single game to get the hang of, but at the same time it achieves complexity in that there are many different options for players depending on which cards you decide to play and when, thus leaving a wide range of strategies open. Each cards' effects/abilities have different uses depending on when/how you use them, and each person will use them differently; it's up to you to determine your playstyle!
  • You can unite two monsters you control into one stronger monster; the types of monsters you unite will determine which of the monster's stat(s) gets boosted, and by how much. This has strengths and drawbacks; on one hand, the Unioned monster is more powerful and better suited to battle, and it may gain useful abilities. On the other hand, it means you have less monsters on the field, and it's a greater loss if that monster is captured by an opponent.
  • Since it's not a TCG, the standard mode of GriMagia is played with a shared deck of 100 cards instead of having each player build their own deck (though in non-standard modes, players will be able to build their own unique decks using expansions, if they choose). Each player draws from the same deck and discards to the same pile. This means that anything you can do to your opponent, they can also do to you, so watch out!
  • It's versatile and encourages creativity in players. There are multiple ways to play GriMagia; for example, in addition to standard mode, we've created a split deck mode and an RPG mode as well as a deckbuilding mode for more advanced players. Since all of the game's mechanics were designed to be flexible, the creation of new game modes is highly encouraged as well - the only limit is your imagination!
  • Board/card games with anime themed art like GriMagia's are extremely hard to come by in countries besides Japan, due to the effort required to translate, import, and localize those games, especially when it comes to physical board/card games.

Since GriMagia was created by a small company, we can't afford to print the game on a mass scale at high quality. And if we don't print GriMagia on a mass scale, we won't be able to get a bulk discount on printing in order to sell the game at a reasonable price. Therefore, we turned to crowdfunding for help, in order to ensure we can produce a high quality product at an affordable price!

Since we're doing a Fixed Funding (all or nothing) campaign, if we don't meet our goal, everyone will be refunded and we won't be able to print the game. That would be a huge shame considering the game's art and gameplay are complete, and it's already been rigorously playtested in several locations, including Anime Expo, card shops in Japan, and multiple colleges. So hopefully, with your support, we can reach our goal!

If we surpass our goal, the additional funds will go towards future additions to GriMagia, including the creation of expansions, additional promo cards, or even a possible digital version of the game for PC/mobile. These additions will all be displayed in Stretch Goals if our initial $13k goal is reached. The more we raise, the more we'll be able to create!


GriMagia: Monster Girl Card Game

A physical copy of GriMagia! Includes all you need to play the game with up to 6 people. There are 100 cards: 40 unique Monster Cards, 40 Grimoires, and 20 unique Relics! The cards will be standard 2.5×3.5'' sized (roughly 6.3×8.8 cm).
Estimated delivery: December 2014

Set of Promo Cards

A set of 9 Indiegogo-exlusive promo cards. Includes 4 alternate art monsters, 1 new Relic, 3 new Ability Monsters, and 1 new SP Monster!

Set of Prints

A set of 3 full art prints! Will be 8.5x11'' and include Slime, Nekomata, and Lamia.

Uncut card sheets are considered collectors' items, and are usually only given out to tournament winners. The fact that this uncut sheet will be of the Indiegogo-exclusive promos only adds to its collector value!

So it’s not just ONLY a palette swap, per se, where we would just hue shift the drawing – there’s more freedom to it than that in what can be altered (and thus it is more work on our part).

DESIGN AN EXPANSION!
