Other ways you can help
If you can't contribute financially, please, please, please spread the word around your family, friends and colleagues.
Thank you so much.

story:
The first MMORPG/TCG with a 2D RPG open world experience, MMO game play!

Duel of Heroes: Chronicles of the Lost Planet is a free to play online trading card game, combining elements of an open world MMORPG, fantasy and strategy to create a rich and immersive gaming experience for everyone.

Our ultimate stretch goal is to introduce cross platform TCG online gaming through Facebook, iOS and Android, offering an immersive gaming experience- anytime, anywhere.

Stay with us and visit our DoH Facebook page for continued news, videos and updates of Duel Of Heroes.


Card Anatomy:

The Battlefield:

Battlefield Formation

  • The Deck: Your 40-card deck, containing at least one Lvl. 1 Hero Card.

  • Hero Card: The hero card is the cornerstone of your army strengthen your troops, use magic and execute your strategies in battle.

  • Creature Cards:  There are five creature types, with any of eight elemental attributes.

  • Magic Cards: These are support cards used in tandem with your creature and Hero cards.

  • Graveyard: Your fallen creatures and used magic cards are sent here. You can bring back some of your fallen troops using special magic and techniques.

  • Hand: These are the cards that make up your hand.

Concept Art and Original Sound Tracks:




Duel of Heroes takes place in Allaxia, an original fantasy world created especially for the game.  It tells a thrilling story filled with complex characters, wondrous creatures, and exotic settings.

At release, we plan to have the following:

300 unique cards including Characters, Creatures, Spells & Environments.

Characters will each have five levels and are instrumental in the battles you will face. Your hero’s army is comprised of Creature Cards that engage your enemies with special attacks. Magic Spells add an element of surprise to your attack and take your opponent off guard. Develop your own strategy using a variety of styles, from fast and burn to slow and deadly. Updates will bring new sets of innovative cards that build upon the game’s depth and story line.


Heroes evolution:

Each Hero has 5 different levels. In order to evolve your hero, you need to draw the next  level version of the hero and have enough Command Points to upgrade it.

You can also exchange your current hero on the battlefield with another hero of the same level from your hand without having to pay command points.

Different Factions:

Choose between one of Four factions: 

  • The Anarchists who spread chaos to control planet Allaxia  and enslave their enemies
  • The Fallen Legion of Allaxia who fights for the liberation of their homeland.
  • The Conclave the group who absorb the released magic and use it to keep balance in the land.
  • The Valiant who fight to undermine The Anarchists without aligning themselves fully to The Fallen Legions.

Friends, Allies and Foes:

The game grants you the freedom to make friends, allies or foes. Whom you befriend or feud with can totally change the balance of powers within the game, so choose carefully.

Library:

Every player will have their own personal library with easy to use features for quick deck building.

You will be able to freely buy, sell or trade from your personal library using the Base Auction House.  If you need to trade quickly, you can use the Live Auction House to trade in real time with live auctioneers.  This will allow for quick trades so you can get exactly what you need, right when you need it.  An Escrow House will also be available for secure private trades, and is designed to protect players from being cheated or having items stolen.

Clan War System:

Control your Hero and your strongest creatures in a clan war that will take you to new heights, fighting against opposing clans in a 2D RPG mode in a struggle for domination of the regions’ castles.

The Grand Labyrinth:

Playing in a labyrinth can be deadly. Lead your army of creatures through the deadly maze, but beware! Your hero’s wounds are not going to heal after each battle, so it will take a great strategist in order to finish the grand labyrinth safely.

Card Trading:

Negotiate with friends or foes to trade cards in your quest to build the strongest army in Allaxia!



Totally Awesome Games Inc. is fast-growing gaming house founded in 2010, focused on satisfying the online gaming community’s desires in an ever growing, fast paced world. We are a promising new group of game developers and publishers, adopting a strategy to suit everyone’s taste when making our games. That is why we go for different gaming styles each time we take on a project. The company currently has various other projects in the works, and our latest and greatest is Duel of Heroes: Chronicles of the Lost Planet. At Totally Awesome Games, everyone adopts the view of taking online games to the next evolution of your fantasies, so what you want is what we make!


We chose Indiegogo so we could reach out to the real people behind why we work so hard to make games. That’s why we need your support; it’s not just the funds, but it is every comment, suggestion and encouragement you provide that will help make this project the game of everyone’s dreams. We want you to walk this path with us, and it is only with your support that we can make this one of the most successful online games ever made.

Rewards:

To See the picture in full size; click Here.

Thank you in advance for your support!

Creature
Cards:  There are five creature types,
with any of eight elemental attributes.
Magic
Cards: These are support cards used in tandem with your creature and Hero
cards.
Graveyard:
Your fallen creatures and used magic cards are sent here. You can bring back
some of your fallen troops using special magic and techniques.
Hand:
These are the cards that make up your hand. 
Concept Art and Original Sound Tracks:

Duel of Heroes takes place in Allaxia, an original
fantasy world created especially for the game. 
It tells a thrilling story filled with complex characters, wondrous
creatures, and exotic settings. 
At release, we plan to have the following:300 unique cards including Characters, Creatures, Spells & Environments.Characters will each have five
levels and are instrumental in the battles you will face. Your hero’s army is
comprised of Creature Cards that engage your enemies with special attacks. Magic
Spells add an element of surprise to your attack and take your opponent off
guard. Develop your own strategy using a variety of styles, from fast and burn
to slow and deadly. Updates will bring new sets of innovative cards that build
upon the game’s depth and story line.Heroes evolution:
Each Hero has 5 different levels. In order to evolve
your hero, you need to draw the next 
level version of the hero and have enough Command Points to upgrade it.
You can also exchange your current hero on the
battlefield with another hero of the same level from your hand without having
to pay command points. 
Different Factions:Choose between one of Four factions: 

The Anarchists who spread chaos to control planet Allaxia  and enslave their enemies

The Fallen Legion of Allaxia who fights for the liberation of their homeland.

The Conclave the group who absorb the released magic and use it to keep balance in the land.

The Valiant who fight to undermine The Anarchists without aligning themselves fully to The Fallen Legions.

Friends, Allies and
Foes:
The game grants you the freedom to make friends,
allies or foes. Whom you befriend or feud with can totally change the balance
of powers within the game, so choose carefully.
Library:
Every player will have their own personal library
with easy to use features for quick deck building.
You will be able to freely buy, sell or trade from
your personal library using the Base
Auction House.  If you need to trade
quickly, you can use the Live Auction
House to trade in real time with live auctioneers.  This will allow for quick trades so you can
get exactly what you need, right when you need it.  An Escrow
House will also be available for secure private trades, and is designed to
protect players from being cheated or having items stolen.
Clan War System:
Control your Hero and your strongest creatures in a
clan war that will take you to new heights, fighting against opposing clans in
a 2D RPG mode in a struggle for domination of the regions’ castles.
The Grand Labyrinth:
Playing in a labyrinth can be deadly. Lead your army
of creatures through the deadly maze, but beware! Your hero’s wounds are not
going to heal after each battle, so it will take a great strategist in order to
finish the grand labyrinth safely.
Card Trading:
Negotiate with friends or foes to trade cards in
your quest to build the strongest army in Allaxia!

Totally Awesome Games Inc. is fast-growing gaming
house founded in 2010, focused on satisfying the online gaming community’s
desires in an ever growing, fast paced world. We are a promising new group of
game developers and publishers, adopting a strategy to suit everyone’s taste
when making our games. That is why we go for different gaming styles each time
we take on a project. The company currently has various other projects in the
works, and our latest and greatest is Duel of Heroes: Chronicles of the Lost
Planet. At Totally Awesome Games, everyone adopts the view of taking online
games to the next evolution of your fantasies, so what you want is what we
make!

We chose Indiegogo so we could reach out to the real
people behind why we work so hard to make games. That’s why we need your support;
it’s not just the funds, but it is every comment, suggestion and encouragement
you provide that will help make this project the game of everyone’s dreams. We
want you to walk this path with us, and it is only with your support that we
can make this one of the most successful online games ever made. Rewards:To See the picture in full size; click Here.Thank you in advance for your support!

story:
About RedCubed

RedCubed is a Minecraft server with a focus on Youtubers making good content. With our combined audience we decided it was time to bring YOU, the fans, into the game; but we need your help! Starting and hosting a server is expensive, and we want to do our best to give everyone the best minecraft server experience! This gives YOU a chance to be part of the RedCubed community! All the members of RedCubed will be making series on the server which will include you guys! Keep an eye on everyones channel they will be making videos promoting the campaign! And who knows maybe some of the fans like you who make videos on the server might get noticed and become a Cuber!

 

Minecraft Server Startup

If you remember we have had public servers in the past but they have been plagued with problems due to us having a lack of funding to properly rent a server. Doing this indiegogo ensures we have the proper funds to get this thing going off with a bang. To help convince you guys to donate we have added prizes! We will get the funds from IGG on the 15th of September and we are going to go for a smooth launch of the server on the first of October or a bit before then for all the people who donated for early access!

 

What the funds are for

This time we are going to start the server right. In the past we rented cheap servers from sketchy websites. This time around we are looking at either buying a physical server if demand is super high or renting a verry nice one. If we buy a server our startup costs will be around eight hundred dollars with lesser monthly costs. Otherwise we will rent a server and that will cost around $180 a month and if this campaign is successful will run the server until the end of the year in which case we will reevaluate how much traffic the server is getting.

 

Stretch Goals

Depending on how awsome you guys are here are a couple more things that will happen if we get the funding!

500 The public server launches!
1000

Dedicated RedCubed Website!

Will feature fan videos screenshots and forums!
2500 Closed Public FTB Server!
5000 Public FTB server!
7500 The Minecraft Chronicles Season 4 Begins!
10000 ?!?!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help us. Get the word out and make some noise about the campaign. It was you guys the fans that built RedCubed up as an excellent community and private server and all the cubers believe that you will come through again so you can join us!

 

What you can expect from this campaign as it goes on

As the month goes on we will post teaser screenshots to this page. Also keep an eye on the cubers channels as they will be making videos to promote this campaign!

 

REDCUBED Members

SilentMyst - http://www.youtube.com/user/SilentMystification

Shiro/Oman/Tommo - http://www.youtube.com/user/ShirosHeroes

Liam - http://www.youtube.com/user/lLiiam

PoetPlays - http://www.youtube.com/user/poetplays

Zapper984 - http://www.youtube.com/user/Nicholas2

Remco - http://www.youtube.com/user/stackstabber

Novonia - http://www.youtube.com/user/Novonia

TheDavee - http://www.youtube.com/user/TheNerdHerd42

Mogswamp - http://www.youtube.com/user/Mogswamp

TheLMNOSteve - http://www.youtube.com/user/TheLMNOSteve

Icecube3343 - http://www.youtube.com/user/Icecube3343

PatchM142 - http://www.youtube.com/user/patchm142mc

Dizzydood - http://www.youtube.com/user/Dragoyle42

Jake - http://www.youtube.com/user/ijakexd123

ArcAngel - http://www.youtube.com/user/ArcAngelGamingHD

Yuki - http://youtube.com/Inuyasha624

Wyntr - http://www.youtube.com/user/WyntrFrost

HiBoy - http://www.youtube.com/user/hiboymc

JackksWorld - http://www.youtube.com/user/JackksWorld

CB - http://youtube.com/user/colonelchisato

Mur - http://youtube.com/user/DexterityLevel

story:
/// Shplem Jam Update ///

We had our own game jam at the end of April. We managed to get the whole team in one place for three days.

And this is the fruits of our labour:

- designed some new exciting game mechanics,

- programmed an editor for building levels,

- started work on integrating OpenFeint,

- made 5 new character designs and some new animations,

- created lots of mood boards for different game worlds,

- planned and made icons for achievements and challenges .

>> Watch a wee trailer with new features <<

 

Those guys are our new playable Shplems. We gave them temporary names but they can be called anything you like if you choose to support us with the $100 or more. Common, name a Shplem!

What is Shplem?

Shplem is a new game born from a simultaneous labour of a few students and freelancers at the 2012 Scottish Game Jam. In just 48h we managed to develop a 3 level working demo.

We were pretty pleased. Check it out! It looks a bit like this:

^_^ Download Shplem Prototype ^_^

Please visit our website to see the trailer:

http://www.shplem.com/

Also you can watch a first impression video review done by Indi:

--- Watch review! ---

We were even more pleased when we won the Best Artwork award and were nominated in the Best Tech Award.

So we thought: “We did a lot in just two days. Maybe we should continue this project?”

Couple of days later we won IGDA Scotland’s Top 4 Play Party Games (as voted by play party attendees).

So then we thought: “People seem to really like it. We should develop this further... right?”

Recently we were nominated for the Scottish BAFTA New Talent Award! We didn't win the prize but it sure was a fun night out in Glasgow!

And so now we are thinking: “Yeah! Let’s do this!”

Do what?

Release a full game with a minimum of 3 worlds - each with a minimum of 12 levels of increasing difficulty and challenges. We will have a challenge system so you can try out different gameplay styles.

Make it cross-platform. We will start with a Windows 7 Mobile version. Possibly venture into a port for PC. Than invade iPhone and iPad. Then take over the rest of the known mobile world. Basically we want Shplem to be available for any Smartphone that you might be using.

In time we will update the game with new worlds, skins and features available for download.

Due to the way you control Shplem we think this would be an ideal game for any touch screen device. It’s just simple and addictive fun!

How about the gameplay?

Basically you project Shplem using a spring like mechanism. The goal is to gather small Shplems and avoid hostile obstacles. If you gather enough of your small friends you give birth to a new character that spawns in mirror like world.

Well... that is what we have after 2 days of development. But we want so much more.

These are the features we are currently working on:

  • Sequential collectables - a slightly puzzle element, where you will need to collect small Shplems in the right order.
  • Exploding collectables - excitable little Shplems that don’t like groups and have to be handled with extra care.
  • Moving Terrain - to make the world less static.
  • Moving enemies – to make the world even less static.
  • Portals – change the way you explore the worlds by introducing teleportation.
  • Multi-Shplem – control more than one Shplem at once.
  • Lightouts - the only source of light is the Shplem and environmental elements.

Hopefully we will be able to do much more than this. Drop us a message if you have any suggestions!

If I help what happens with the funding?

The most important thing for us is to get our team working together. We are talking about 7 people from different parts of UK . Lot of the work will be done remotely. Although that becomes troublesome and we need to organise regular meetings.

This is why we need to rent studio space, consider transport and communication costs. Every 2 week we will be organising 2-3 days of development under the same roof. We are used to this method of working due to our Game Jam experiences. This way we can synchronise our work and assure quality control over a complicated both technically and artistically project. Most of us have been together for 18 months doing game jams so we aren't new to each other and our strengths and weaknesses as a team.

Actually, we already organised our first meeting! We will be working in Edinburgh on 27-29 April and hopefully expand Shplem world with new levels and features!

Another barrier for us is the lack of equipment. We need to get a Macbook for our programmers. This would greatly improve our development process and make those guys life much more easier. After pushing the game to Windows 7 Phone we will need to equip ourselves with an iPhone and iPad for testing the port to iOS. Our art team needs two Photoshop and one After Effects licenses. They are crazy talented people but need professional software to fully use their potential and meet tight time limitations of a development process. Our sound designer sure could use some basic reference speakers.

We are UK based so we humbly ask for $8000 which is roughly equal £5000.

First of all we will focus on organising development meetings. Secondly, we will focus on the most essential equipment. If we raise anything above our goal we will invest this money in promotion to ensure we get some decent publicity.

We are not paying ourselves for this. We just need a start-up fund so we can make Shplem a professionally developed, healthy looking blob.

What’s in it for me?

Every person which contributes any amount of money is entitled to the game after its release! It basically works like a pre-order. You can also get access to all game versions and all future DLC for just $5.

Of course with higher contributions come extra prizes and possibilities to influence the game development from the very beginning.

Don't worry we will make sure that you are well informed and truly take part in creating something awesome, with weekly updates.

Who are you guys anyway?

Oh right, sorry we forgot to introduce ourselves.

Meet the team:

  • Art team: Michael Douglas Kirby, Fee Stewart, Corinna Bruce, Adam Gierasimiuk
  • Programming: Alastair Zotos, Stephen Biggerstaff
  • Music and Sound: Simon Wood

Basically we are a bunch of people from all over UK that met on various game jams, some of us having done several together. We are strongly passionate about making games and believe we can make great content together.

What we need though is your help so we can overcome financial barriers and be able to put our creative juices into good use.

Useful Links

If you want to play the demo you can download it from here: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/22051112/shplem.zip

Downloaded demo might require using Microsoft .NET Framework: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/netframework/aa569263.aspx

Shplem website: http://www.shplem.com/

Any other way of support?

Please help spread the word! Share this campaign with your friends on Facebook, check us out on Twitter or sign up to the Newsletter. Let your friend know using Google+ or Tumbler. Any good word helps. The more people know about this the more can become part of the development. In the end this game is made for you!

Thx for listening. Shplem Out!

story:
The cosmic adventure of a round Scottish hero… kind of.

SPRINGRINS... WHAT?

Fast-paced action? Check. Galactic explosions? You bet. Rupture of the time and space continuum? Got it. Mind-blowing special effects? OF COURSE. This is a list of some, but certainly not all, of the things that you are not going to find in Springrins - and yet you will be enthralled and, without a doubt, you will fall in love with the adorable blue springrin in his vertical ascension trough the universe.

Join the most brave hero of Scotland, SpringrinBluck (Or just Bluck), in his not-so-epic adventure. He just wants to return to Earth, like every other springrin on the universe, in time for spring. However, space is full of dangers like black holes, wormholes, supernovas and asteroids!

HERE! HAVE SOME SCREENSHOTS!

HOW CAN YOU HELP HIM?

Well, the game is simple: Bluck must always go up. To achieve this, you can paint lines on which he can bounce and keep going up. The more you do, the better your score. Moreover, that is just the main game mode! Springrins counts with three very different gameplay modes (You still have to go up and make points and all that...)

YOU MAY OR MAY NOT, BUT MOST PROBABLY MAY NEED A PHONE TO PLAY THIS.

We intend to release Springrins for the iPhone App store, and eventually Android. Even more eventually, we may release it on the web. The game is already complete, it is functional and it is fun; we just need the final push to release it. Your final push.

HERE, HAVE A WALLPAPER!

Bigger version.

WHY SHOULD YOU HELP HIM (AND US, IN THE PROCESS)?

We are very aware that the concept is most probably not revolutionary or innovative. But then again, our whole team consists of only two; the game developers of a micro-company yet-to-exist. Since time immemorial, we always dreamt of making videogames. We love them, they sometimes love us; it is the circle of life.  To make this game we had to learn the basics of game making, programming and even graphic design; and we are still learning, always and daily, to make better games.

We have many ideas (Some of them are revolutionary and/or innovative, mind you) but we choose to start with the most simple of them all: Springrins. Surprisingly enough, it quickly grew into its own franchise, and we are already making Springrins: Atmosphere Entry and Springrins: Maze.

And while it may be a game of simple design, it’s incredibly fun, lovable, difficult and rewarding.

NO. WE WILL NOT USE THE MONEY TO BUY SNACKS AND DVDS.

We would not be pledging money if we still had any. We didn’t wanted to come here and ask right away for your kindness, so we used most of our savings during the three-month developing time. However, once the game was finished we still needed to pay for the license of the graphic motor we used, Unity, which cost around 3,000 dollars. The remaining 2,000 dollars are to pay the Apple Developer License, for the music, some of the freelancers we hired from time to time and other minor things that we need to address.

HERE! HAVE... UH... SOMETHING RANDOM!

Bigger Version.

AND WHAT DO YOU GET FOR YOUR AWESOMENESS?

Well, as we have already said, we are tremendously poor and with one or two pending debts... so must of the stuff we can offer you is not material goodies. We will immortalize your name in all the games we make, from Springrins to the last. We can also give you an early copy of the game, amongst other things like, perhaps, a Bluck figurine.

No matter how much you give us, you will always, forever and ever, have our eternal gratitude and everlasting love.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP US

Maybe you can’t contribute economically, that's okay. We love you anyway, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • It would be of great help if you can let the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Also, you can use the Indiegogo share tools!

HERE, HERE! HAVE OUR LOVE FOR YOU

No bigger version, because our love for you is so big, you head would EXPLODE.

HOW CAN YOU HELP HIM?
Well, the game is simple: Bluck must always go up. To achieve this, you can paint lines on which he can bounce and keep going up. The more you do, the better your score. Moreover, that is just the main game mode! Springrins counts with three very different gameplay modes (You still have to go up and make points and all that...)
YOU MAY OR MAY NOT, BUT MOST PROBABLY MAY NEED A PHONE TO PLAY THIS.
We intend to release Springrins for the iPhone App store, and eventually Android. Even more eventually, we may release it on the web. The game is already complete, it is functional and it is fun; we just need the final push to release it. Your final push.
HERE, HAVE A WALLPAPER!

Bigger version.
WHY SHOULD YOU HELP HIM (AND US, IN THE PROCESS)?
We are very aware that the concept is most probably not revolutionary or innovative. But then again, our whole team consists of only two; the game developers of a micro-company yet-to-exist. Since time immemorial, we always dreamt of making videogames. We love them, they sometimes love us; it is the circle of life.  To make this game we had to learn the basics of game making, programming and even graphic design; and we are still learning, always and daily, to make better games.
We have many ideas (Some of them are revolutionary and/or innovative, mind you) but we choose to start with the most simple of them all: Springrins. Surprisingly enough, it quickly grew into its own franchise, and we are already making Springrins: Atmosphere Entry and Springrins: Maze.
And while it may be a game of simple design, it’s incredibly fun, lovable, difficult and rewarding.
NO. WE WILL NOT USE THE MONEY TO BUY SNACKS AND DVDS.
We would not be pledging money if we still had any. We didn’t wanted to come here and ask right away for your kindness, so we used most of our savings during the three-month developing time. However, once the game was finished we still needed to pay for the license of the graphic motor we used, Unity, which cost around 3,000 dollars. The remaining 2,000 dollars are to pay the Apple Developer License, for the music, some of the freelancers we hired from time to time and other minor things that we need to address.
HERE! HAVE... UH... SOMETHING RANDOM!

Bigger Version.
AND WHAT DO YOU GET FOR YOUR AWESOMENESS?
Well, as we have already said, we are tremendously poor and with one or two pending debts... so must of the stuff we can offer you is not material goodies. We will immortalize your name in all the games we make, from Springrins to the last. We can also give you an early copy of the game, amongst other things like, perhaps, a Bluck figurine.
No matter how much you give us, you will always, forever and ever, have our eternal gratitude and everlasting love.
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP US

Maybe you can’t contribute economically, that's okay. We love you anyway, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

It would be of great help if you can let the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
Also, you can use the Indiegogo share tools!


HERE, HERE! HAVE OUR LOVE FOR YOU

No bigger version, because our love for you is so big, you head would EXPLODE.

story:
Picture this: You just bought a multi-player game and you’re extremely excited to play. You get into the game and you’re met with long queue times, bad match ups, afk players, or bad mannered individuals. Sometimes you get to deal with all of those at the same time. Why is it game companies are able to create visually stunning and entertaining games, but still end up making the same mistakes as their predecessors? It has been over 15 years since gaming has become something more than just a few friends at an arcade, its past time these mistakes were fixed.

Game Nectar is the solution every gamer has been praying for. We aim to implement improved ways to group you with other players so you may enjoy your game and also ensure that you’re not staring at a queue timer for an eternity. We wish to introduce an advanced algorithm which takes into consideration not only your MMR, but also your playstyle and synergy with other playstyles. Everyone enjoys winning, but they also enjoy competitive games.

Our goal is to create a matchmaking solution that can be applied to every game, regardless of genre, that is affordable to gaming companies, so they can put their resources where it matters: into the game itself.

Our team consists of 2 software developers, a CFO, a project manager, and a creative genius who brought this idea in its primitive form to our attention. We are all gamers with careers, however, when we did find the time to play a game together, we were frustrated at the lack of...well, everything. The games were either too easy or too hard. There were very few close matches where we felt both sides had a chance at winning, until the very end. Games were decided within the first 3-5 minutes, which resulted in the other team either giving up or just abandoning the game.


Matchmaking is clearly overdue for an update.  Matchmaking systems and algorithms have long utilized only one or two data points, MMR (or ELO) which is a measurement of your win:loss ratio and sometimes your ping is utilized to pair you up with other players. This system is outdated, and more often than not causes more problems and may even be one of the biggest causes of player toxicity that we have seen. 





This is where you guys come in. If you feel this change is needed, then help us bring it about. Reaching our goal will ensure that we can afford the talent and servers we need. This project's scope is looking to encompass every multi-player game out there, regardless of genre. If there's a group finder or matchmaking system in place, our goal is to update it, so that it utilizes more than just your MMR/ELO/Ranking to match you with and against other players.


Every contribution helps, but there are milestones that will allow us to push ahead. Our current schedule based upon the funds looks a little like this:





VPoM stands for Virtual Peace of Mind. VPoM is our contribution to parents everywhere.  It is a way to control who your children are playing with and what language they are being exposed to in their online gameplay. We've all heard the news stories of the cyber stalkers and sexual predators that prey on our children.  An online game is just as unsafe as any chat room our children may enter. However, there is very little a parent can do currently to protect their child from this sort of threat and it's about time that changed.

VPoM aims to give parents more power over who their children play with. Game Nectar aims to do this by utilizing both public and private databases to ensure that the person named "Swift Hikari" is not a sex offender or convicted of any crime you do not want your child exposed to.

VPoM does not stop there, one of our developers works closely with the Federal Aviation Association (FAA) and realized that the software utilized within air traffic control towers can be re-engineered and applied to gaming voice communications. This software will allow parents to censure any foul language their children may be exposed to and will also flag people who excessively use foul language in voice chats to ensure your children do not play with these individuals again.

In this era of technology, we feel it is about time that parents have more control. Before, the only alternative was to not let your children play online games. That is a very extreme measure and we feel that parents need to know their children are being taken care of, when they start to play online games. Just as our core product aims to evolve, VPoM will also evolve and have new features to give parents the control they need to ensure a healthy online gaming experience for their children.

No matter what you play, how you play, or how good you are playing, we want to give everyone that plays video games the best overall experience.  We play for enjoyment and it should never be anything but enjoyable. 

Newcomers: Our vision is to make every video game approachable to everyone, giving you the best gaming environment to grow and get better. Our goal is to have others be available to give advice and teach you as you progress. Playing against others who are truly just starting out, will give you the best possible chance at improving you skills


Core Gamers: Our vision for you is to provide the most competitive and enjoyable experience possible, by allowing you to play the role you want at all times and be matched against others who are truly on your level. 

If you do not feel like you are able to donate, No worries! You can assist us by getting the word out! Link our commercial and tell other people who share your passion. With your help we can improve the way video games work and make it better for everyone! No matter what you play, how you play, the amount you play and what you play on. We want to give you the best possible experience while doing so!

story:
Engineerius - the quiz board game about important stuff

Have you ever experienced playing a quiz board game where all the questions you know are missing? There are several types of these quiz board games available for the curious and inquiring minds. These games have several different categories and editions, specializing within eras, areas of interest, different age groups and other differentiating factors. Even though these board games have various categories that appeal to a specific area of interest and knowledge, there is a lack of educational and entertaining quiz board games specifically specializing within the areas of engineering, science and technology.

It's not rocket science. Or is it?

This is where we come in. Engineerius is a quiz board game developed by engineers for engineers, scientists and techies, originated from Norway. Engineerius offers you, as a scientist, engineer and techie, to show off your knowledge and skills. The board game offers high quality and challenging questions and answers within categories such as:

    

After selling out most of our board games in Norway, we want to offer others the same joy of winning. Not for knowing random information, but knowing important and interesting information. So we are launching the first English edition of Engineerius and we are very excited to have you join us! Do you have an above average interest in science, engineering and technology? Then this is the game for you!

 

“A very cool concept and the product look amazing. I will definitely buy a copy of this game.” - Christopher Mirabile, Launchpad Venture Group

 

                               Why Enginerius? Why Indiegogo?

All of our crowd sourced questions are translated into English and just waiting to challenge the young and healthy minds of United States. The is one thing though. We need some help to get started with production of the first English edition. This is where you come in:

  • All of the pledged funds wil be used to cover production and shipping costs related to releasing the first English edition. We are so excited!
  • There is already great interest from stores, especially in the Boston and California area, that wants to sell this unique game. It will also be available for purchase online, which means you will be able to challenge others (and hopefully win) if we make the pledge. No pressure.                               
  • We will still try to complete production, even if the pledge goal is not reached. It will only take some more time.
  • In order to show our appreciation through the magic of internet, we have gathered a bunch of perks for those of you who decide to pledge.
  • Even if you don't pledge, we are very grateful that you kept on reading for this long. So thank you! You are still awesome! You can also like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter. It's free and it keeps you updated on what's going on. Know a geek? Of course you do! Help us by using the Indiegogo share tools and tell them about us.

 

“This game is exactly what we could use here in our shop. People would eat this stuff up! We want to buy it when it is ready for the US market” - Claudia Majetich, Store Manager MIT Museum

                          

                         Challenge by educating and entertaining

We take lots of pride in being able to offer you this unique and one of a kind board game and we believe that Norwegians shouldn't be the ones having all the fun. By giving us your pledge, you will not only help us release the first English edition of our game, but you will have an impact on the intellectual future of your fellow countrymen. Help us brighten people's minds and make science fun. For more information, please visit our website www.engineeri.us or shoot us an email. 

 

“I wanna buy a copy when you get it to market.” - Matt Witheiler, Flybridge Capital Partners

 

     

The game contains tiny pieces and hard questions. Not recommended for children, philosophers, lawyers, and politicians. May the best engineer or scientist win!

 

All rights reserved Heuristic Edutainment LLC.

©2012-2013 Engineerius

story:
Our Story


Hello!

My name is Erick Harding and I created a card game called Legacy!

i was tired of games being over simplified and not very creative. i mean simple is good, however my mind craves something where i have to really think and explore possibilities  to come up with new and interesting things.

i really like to make people think differently.

The game itself was converted from a Role playing game i made when i was younger, and converted it over the years to a card game.


The Impact

I am raising money to fund a Prototype of my card game at www.legacytcg.com.

i am hoping to create a new type of card game , adventurous and creative, i want this card game to FEEL like a role playing game.

If my goal is not met my card game may never see the light of day, as have no real job, i have a sleeping disorder which prevents me from working a normal job, so i have to work from home. this work is unsteady at best, so i have to pretty much sell everything i own in order to pay for a programmer.

this prototype will help me in ways you cannot imagine.
 


What We Need & What You Get


What we need is 2200 dollars for a Working prototype and a playable game. 

once this prototype is created we can begin Alpha and Beta testing. 

once this prototype is complete we can  raise more money with this prototype and hire artists and graphics gurus to come in and make the game and website look much better.

i intend to release this game on the Iphone/ipad and other devices as well as on PC and mac.

Should my goal not be reached the money will still go to the programmer to get as far as we can and i will scrape and sell what i can to try and meet the rest of the money.

well now for the fun part. the Perks!

The initial introductory set of this game has around 300 cards.  around 160 cards are going to be released upon Launch of the website.

several of those cards are completely unattainable by anyone other than investors.

i have set aside some Swag for people who are kind enough to donate for this cause.


1 - 1 dollar donation and above gets you a Unique card available to no one else but investors.

5 -  5 dollar donation or higher gets you into the beta as well as a unique card.
 
10 - 10 dollar donation gets you into alpha and beta, and unique card.

25 - 25 dollars or higher gets you into the pre-alpha and beta and 2 unique investor cards.

50 - 50 dollars or higher grants you access to pre-alpha and beta and 2 unique investor cards and all of the concept art not seen by anyone else as well as a Poster of your favorite card signed by the artist.

100 - a donation of 100 dollars or more gets you access to pre-alpha and beta, 2 unique investor cards all the concept art and a poster of your favorite card signed by the artist as well as a Hat and t-shirt sporting the Legacy logo.

500 - an amazing 500 dollar donation gets you into the pre-alpha and beta, 2 unique investor cards, all concept art available, a poster of your favorite card, a jacket, hat, poster,t shirt and a unique prize, a Custom card of a character made by you, with the way you want him to look and pose. within the game balance rules of course.



Other Ways You Can Help


This project cant succeed without help, im just a guy trying to make a very fun game, please help by telling people about legacy! 

www.legacytcg.com

or facebook it

http://www.facebook.com/pages/LegacyTCG/164547503579129?notif_t=page_new_likes

story:
Summary

  • This is Ray, I really hate traditional Server and do wish to create something less noisy and more extensible. That why I design Wingblade together with Gang. Wingblade can be used as:
    • A Debian/Ubuntu/Android box for daily use
    • A XBMC station capable of decoding 2160p H.264 video
    • A Wi-Fi disk transfer data between devices
    • A NAS station up to 2TB
    • LAMP server with 1.5W power consumption
    • Video surveillance server with computer vision
    • Your private dropbox using Owncloud
    • A TimeMachineee box
    • A music box with SDIF output
    • And more…..

  • It is not smallest nor the cheapest in its kind. But it do provide best feature set in limited size.

    • I’d like to hear from you to improve the design and create something more fun to use
    • You can help us refine our design and documents. Contribute to the open source so more people can be benefited



    Wingblade hardware specification:

    CPU
    •  ARM Cortex™-A7 Dual-Core 1Ghz
    GPU
    •  ARM Mali400 MP2
    •  Complies with OpenGL ES 2.0/1.1
    Video
    •  H.264 2160p video decoding
    •  H.264 1080p@30fps encoding
    Display
    •  HDMI 1.4
    •  RGB/LVDS LCD interface
    •  VGA
    Camera
    •  Supports dual 5M CMOS sensor **
    Memory
    •  1G DDR3
    •  8G NAND Flash controller *
    •  SATA 2.0 **
    Audio
    •  Integrated HI-FI 100dB Audio Codec
    •  Dual analog mic amplifiers
    •  Stereo and SDIF* output
    Network
    •  10/100/1000 Ethernet
    •  wireless 802.11b/g/n  *
    •  Bluetooth  *
    I/O
    •  x2 USB 2.0
    •  USB OTG
    •  x2 SDIO/SD
    •  x100 GPIO(SPI/I2C/UART……)
    •  USB OTG
    •  Bluetooth
    OS
    •  Android 4.2 and above
    •  Debian wheezy and Ubuntu 14

    *: only available in Wingblade WI-FI bundle

    **:  Wingblade has SATA/camera socket, but SATA HDD/camera not included in wingblade

    What is the Power consumption of Wingblade

    Wingblade is use Dual A7 processor and A7 is the most power-efficient application processor ARM has ever developed. Working as a network server (without HDD), it only require 1.5W to serve as a LAMP server.


    What is the use case for Wingblade

    A: Connect all your devices and enable data sharing


    As a geek, you can always find fun with wingblade



    Wingblade Journey:

    It takes more than 2 years our hobby project finally make it way to meet you


    What We Need & What You Get

    • We will need to make least 300 pcs PCB at one time to reduce the manufacturing cost to a reasonable range.
    • All the funders will be able to help us refine the design.
    • In return, all the funders will receive a product more suitable for their needs in lower price. Also, you will also get our design document at earliest time.

    The Impact

    • It is a perfect solution for storage, multimedia and DIY. The hardware and OS is ready, but it still need your help to show the world the power of wingblade
    • Make it real for people and build trust.

    Open Source

      Linux kernel for AllwinnerA20 is very active and there are lots of board based on A10/A20.

      Wingblade will release a debian(with XBMC and openMediaVault SAMBA service pre-installed) and Android(AndroidTV) image

      Risks & Challenges

      We had manufacture the wingblade early version for 3 times. And we did lots of improvement in previous design, but:

      • We still need to improve the design of Wi-Fi to improve the signal for PCB antenna.
      • We will also test different antenna as well as consult with RF engineer.
      • We still need to test different hard disks to see if there are compatible issue.

      Schematic download (click to download a20-wingblade-v2-20140514.pdf):


      Stretch Goals:

      1)  500 wingblade units

          Funders will receive a Micro HDMI cable together with the wingblade

      2)  1000 wingblade units

          We will add new perks to thanks all funders:

              1)  1$ USB power adaptor (5V==2.1A) and a high quality micro USB cable

             2)  1$ plastic case for wingblade

      3)  1500 units

          We will add more perks:

              1)  1$ to upgrade Wingblade base bundle NAND flash from 0 to 8GB

              2)  1$ 16G Micro SD card for Wingblade WIFI bundle


      Other Ways You Can Help

      Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

      • Visit our website at www.airlnk.co and give use feedback regarding our design, document, or, English :P.
      • Promote our project by sharing it on your Google+, Facebook and twitter! Or，click like :)
story_txt:
Summary

This is Ray, I really hate traditional Server and do wish to
     create something less noisy and more extensible. That why I design
     Wingblade together with Gang. Wingblade can be used as:

A Debian/Ubuntu/Android box for daily use

A XBMC station capable of decoding 2160p H.264 video
A Wi-Fi disk transfer data between devices

A NAS station up to 2TB

LAMP server with 1.5W power consumption
Video surveillance server with computer vision

Your private dropbox using Owncloud
A TimeMachineee box
A music box with SDIF output

And more….. 


It is not smallest nor the cheapest in its kind. But it do
provide best feature set in limited size.


I’d like to hear from you to improve the design and
     create something more fun to use
You can help us refine our design and documents.
     Contribute to the open source so more people can be benefited
Wingblade
hardware specification:
CPU•  ARM Cortex™-A7 Dual-Core 1GhzGPU•  ARM Mali400 MP2•  Complies with OpenGL ES 2.0/1.1Video•  H.264 2160p video decoding•  H.264 1080p@30fps encodingDisplay•  HDMI 1.4•  RGB/LVDS LCD interface•  VGACamera•  Supports dual 5M CMOS sensor **Memory•  1G DDR3•  8G NAND Flash controller *•  SATA 2.0 **Audio•  Integrated HI-FI 100dB Audio Codec•  Dual analog mic amplifiers•  Stereo and SDIF* output Network•  10/100/1000 Ethernet•  wireless 802.11b/g/n  *•  Bluetooth  *I/O•  x2 USB 2.0•  USB OTG•  x2 SDIO/SD•  x100 GPIO(SPI/I2C/UART……)•  USB OTG•  BluetoothOS•  Android 4.2 and above•  Debian wheezy and Ubuntu 14
*: only available in Wingblade WI-FI bundle **:  Wingblade has SATA/camera socket, but SATA HDD/camera not included in wingbladeWhat is the Power consumption of WingbladeWingblade is use Dual A7 processor and A7 is the most power-efficient application processor ARM has ever developed. Working as a network server (without HDD), it only require 1.5W to serve as a LAMP server.What is the use case for WingbladeA: Connect all your devices and enable data sharingAs a geek, you can always find fun with wingblade

Wingblade Journey:
It
takes more than 2 years our hobby project finally make it way to meet youWhat
We Need & What You Get

We will need to make least 300 pcs PCB at one time to
     reduce the manufacturing cost to a reasonable range. 
All the funders will be able to help us refine the
     design. 

In return, all the funders will receive a product more
     suitable for their needs in lower price. Also, you will also get our design document at earliest
     time.
The
Impact

It is a perfect solution for storage, multimedia and
     DIY. The hardware and OS is ready, but it still need your help to show the
     world the power of wingblade 
Make it real for people and build trust.
Open SourceLinux kernel for AllwinnerA20 is very active and there are lots of board based on A10/A20.Wingblade will release a debian(with XBMC and openMediaVault SAMBA service pre-installed) and Android(AndroidTV) image Risks
& Challenges
We had manufacture the wingblade
early version for 3 times. And we did lots of improvement in previous design,
but: 

We still need to improve the design of Wi-Fi to improve
     the signal for PCB antenna.
We will also test different antenna as well as consult
     with RF engineer.
We still need to test different hard disks to see if
     there are compatible issue.

Schematic download (click to download a20-wingblade-v2-20140514.pdf):Stretch
Goals:
1)  500 wingblade units
    Funders will receive a Micro HDMI
cable together with the wingblade
2)  1000 wingblade units
    We will add new perks to thanks
all funders:
        1)  1$ USB power adaptor (5V==2.1A)
and a high quality micro USB cable
       2)  1$ plastic case for wingblade
3)  1500 units
    We will add more perks:
        1)  1$ to upgrade Wingblade base bundle NAND
flash from 0 to 8GB
        2)  1$ 16G Micro SD card for Wingblade WIFI
bundle
Other
Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute,
but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Visit our website at www.airlnk.co and give use feedback regarding our
     design, document, or, English :P.
Promote our project by sharing it on your Google+,
     Facebook and twitter! Or，click like :)

story:
The Beta version is available on Google Play: Click here

Match 3 Quest becomes the best puzzle adventure. With your help we can add tons of  new monsters, locations and features. Let's do this together!

We are fans of the Puzzle Quest series and the entire genre of RPG. Our wives don't allow us to play the 'big' games on PCs. That's why, with your help, we're creating an exciting experience for mobile devices you can play anywhere - any time.

Why this game is better than Puzzle Quest.

  • You can choose up to 3 characters to include on your team (not only monsters but also your friends in the future).
  • PvP encounters on the map.
  • Advanced skill / talent system.
  • You don't need to wait for an opponent's move, you are always in control and proactive.
  • CCG system with Evolution features (each Common card can be upgraded up to the Epic card).

Why do we need funding?

  • More maps, more locations, more quests, more heroes, more stuff.
  • We look for great ideas and feedback that only you can provide and we like to offer as many cool features as possible to enhance the player experience: PvP, (social interaction) party with friends, guilds, auctions, dungeons, raid bosses, awesome music themes, etc.

About us: We are a team of professionals that have roots in old casual industry. Worked together on famous titles Mah Jong Quest, Jewel Quest and others. You can find much more information by clicking the link below:

More details about our team (Click here)

Goal $500

  • 1 new hero class: Cleric.

Goal $10,000

  • 1 new map;
  • 5 more locations;
  • 8 new monsters and 5 bosses.

Goal $50,000

  • 96 more monsters;
  • 6 more locations;
  • Invite friendly heroes into your party;
  • Dungeons (quests only for parties);
  • Raid bosses at the end of each dungeon.

Goal $100,000

  • 48 more monsters;
  • 3 more locations;
  • 2 more classes you can find and unlock (Witcher and Necromancer);
  • Global guilds (big sides) and Divinity guilds (made by our bigest backers).

Goal $200,000

  • 48 more monsters;
  • 3 more locations;
  • 2 more classes you can find and unlock (Monk and Psionic);
  • Global auction house (trading between players);
  • Additional talent tree for each hero where you can buy skills for Honor Points (PvP);
  • Big Olympics event - competitions between guilds.

Goal $500,000

  • Each character will be reworked and polished to meet the AAA class;
  • We'll provide the game with the solid story, beautiful cutscenes and dialogues;
  • 96 more monsters;
  • 6 more locations;
  • Equipment and artifacts for heroes;
  • Unique mini-game in which you collect different resources;
  • Unique mini-game for the crafting system.

Goal $1,000,000

  • 96 more monsters;
  • 6 more locations;
  • Change the world map system to allow players move on locations (i.e. map in Heroes of Might and Magic)
  • Launch on PC and Mac (online on Facebook).

Builder Birdy is an addictive new puzzle game  that is fun and challenging! Help Builder Birdy create bird colonies by arranging birdhouse blocks!

Version 1.0 of Builder Birdy is already live on the iOS store.
It can be downloaded from iTunes by clicking here.


The Builder Bird Story

With increasing urbanisation and reducing green cover, birds are loosing their natural habitat. With limited space on trees for placing birdhouses, unrest has been growing among the birds. 


Builder Birdy saves the day for birds with an innovative design for making birdhouse blocks that can be easily stacked and arranged.


Help Builder Birdy build colonies for birds by arranging birdhouse blocks. When forming colonies it is important that the bird chirping sounds stay in harmony. The simple requirment for that is to ensure that the NUMBER of birds in two OPPOSITE birdhouses is the same. 


Sounds easy? Wait till you start playing!!

The game currently has 100 levels divided into 5 level packs. There are lot of fun elements and tools :

How the funds will be used

I am not seeking you to fund the entire development cost of the project. A significant effort in time and money has already been put in to bring the game to bring it to the release stage. There has been very positive feedback from the users have tested the game so far and I am working on implementing their suggestions. Through this campaign I hope to achieve the following:

  • Improvements in gameplay before final launch
  • Voice artist, studio costs for some sound effects
  • Translation costs
  • Launch trailer
  • Android porting - this is a challenge because of the numerous screen sizes and specs of devices on the android platform. Also need to rent devices for testing the gameplay
  • marketing costs for both android and iOS

More than the money, i hope the campaign helps gather feedback on improving the gameplay and helps me learn for future releases as well!!

    Timelines

    Version 1.0 iOS - August 28,2014 (Already released)

    Version 1.1 iOS - October 1, 2014

    Version 1.1 Android - October 30, 2014

    Version 2.0 iOS and Android - November 30, 2014

    The major feature in version 2.0 will be a random level generator that will provide you with endless gameplay.


      About the Team

      Builder Birdy has been an indie development effort by a single person with a lot of support from family including our kids under 10 who have all pitched in for testing and even concept development. Oops, hope we are not picked up for child labour!!


      Risks & Challenges

      The version 1 of the game has already been released for iOS. Even if the campaign is not fully funded I will complete all the above goals on my own steam. The game may not become very popular if sufficient funds are not available for marketing. But you can help mitigate this risk by sharing the game with your friends :D and in your social networks !!

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Even if you cannot support the campaign, your feedback on the gameplay and how it can be improved would be invaluable. The game is a free download so download it on the Appstore and get building!! If you like the game, please share the game with your friends and follow us on Facebook and Twiter for the latest updates.

      And if nothing else just use less paper and save trees so birds keep their natural habitat :D
